GSP33brssgo2u:1980: athaikadeśena saṃyujyeta tathāpi niravayavatvābhyupagamakopa iti svapakṣe 'pi samāna eṣa doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:1988: pradhānasya niravayavatve kṛtsnaprasaktiḥ sāvayavatve ca niravayavatvābhyupagamavirodha ityatra śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:1995: atha niravayavā guṇā eva vividhapariṇāmānāṃ prakṛtiriti cet,
GSP33brssgo2u:1998_0: pratyekaṃ sattvādikamitaraguṇadvayasacivaṃ niravayavaṃ yadyupādānaṃ tarhi kṛtsnasyopādānasya
GSP33brssgo2u:2000: nanu guṇānāmavayavāstantuvadārambhakā na bhavanti kintu kāryavaicitryānumitāstadgatāḥ śaktaya ityāśaṅkya māyikaśaktibhirbrahmaṇo 'pi sāvayavatvaṃ tulyamityāha-athetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2005: na hyaṇoraṇvantareṇoparyadhaḥ pārśvataśca vyāptau tato 'dhikadravyaṃ saṃbhavatiḥ dvitīye paramāṇvoḥ sāvayavatvāpattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2006: nanu tvaṃ cora ityukte tvamapi cora itivaddoṣasāmyoktirayuktetyata āha-parihṛtastviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2008: ato niravayave brahmaṇi samanvayasyāvirodha iti siddham //29//
GSP33brssgo2u:2014: ekasyāpi brahmaṇo vicitraśaktiyogādupapadyate vicitro vikāraprapañca ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2021: yathāhi darśayati śrutiḥ sarvaśaktiyogaṃ parasyā devatāyāḥ - 'sarvakarmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ sarvamidamabhyātto 'vākyanādaraḥ' (chā. 3.14.4)
GSP33brssgo2u:2024: , 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgisūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ' (bṛ. 3.8.9)
GSP33brssgo2u:2031_0: māyāśaktimato brahmaṇo jagatsargaṃ vadataḥ samanvayasyāśarīrasya na māyeti nyāyena
GSP33brssgo2u:2031_1: virodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe nyāyasyānābhāsatvādastīti pūrvapakṣe pūrvoktaśaktimattvasamarthanādekaviṣayatvaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2039: vikaraṇatvān neti cet tad uktam / BBs_2,1.31 /
GSP33brssgo2u:2040: syādetat vikaraṇāṃ parāṃ devatāṃ śāsti śāstram- 'acakṣuṣkamaśrotramavāgamanāḥ' (bṛ.3.8.8)
GSP33brssgo2u:2042: kathaṃ sā sarvaśaktiyuktāpi satī kāryāya prabhavet /
GSP33brssgo2u:2043: devādayo hi cetanāḥ sarvaśaktiyuktā api santa ādhyatmikakāryakaraṇasaṃpannā eva tasmaitasmai kāryāya prabhavanto vijñāyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:2045: iti pratiṣiddhasarvaviśeṣāyā devatāyāḥ sarvaśaktiyogaḥ saṃbhavediti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:2048: naca yathaikasya sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathānyasyāpi sāmarthyena bhavitavyamiti niyamo 'stīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2050: tathāca śāstram- 'apāṇipādo javano grahītā paśyatyacakṣuḥ sa śṛṇotyakarṇaḥ' (śvaṃ. 3.19)
GSP33brssgo2u:2053: devādicetanānāṃ śaktānāmapi dehabhimāne satyeva kartṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadabhāve suṣupte tanna dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2058: tatra śarīrasya kalpitasya māyāśrayatvāyogānnirviśeṣacinmātrasyaiva māyādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ yuktamiti samādhānārthaḥ //31//
GSP33brssgo2u:2065: na khalu cetanaḥ paramātmedaṃ jagadbimbaṃ viracayitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2068: cetano hi loke buddhipūrvakārī puruṣaḥ pravartamāno na mandopakramāmapi tāvatpravṛttimātmaprayojanānupayogināmārabhamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2070: bhavati ca lokaprasiddhyanuvādinī śrutiḥ- 'na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatyātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati' (bṛ. 2.4.5)
GSP33brssgo2u:2071: iti gurutarasaṃrambhā ceyaṃ pravṛttiryaduccāvacaprapañcaṃ jagadbimbaṃ viracayitavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2072: yadīyamapi pravṛttiścetanasya paramātmana ātmaprayojanopayoginī parikalpyeta paritṛptitvaṃ paramātmanaḥ śrūyamāṇaṃ bādhyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2074: atha cetano 'pi sannunmatto buddhyaparādhādantareṇaivātmaprayojanaṃ pravartamāno dṛṣṭastathā paramātmāpi pravartiṣyata ityucyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2075: tathā sati sarvajñatvaṃ paramātmanaḥ śrūyamāṇaṃ bādhyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2081_0: sa kimabhrāntaścetano yaḥ sa niṣphalaṃ vastu na racayatīti nyāyena virudhyate na
GSP33brssgo2u:2081_1: veti saṃdehe pūrvamadehasyāpi śrutibalāt śaktatvoktyā kartṛtvamuktaṃ tadākṣepasaṃgatyā
GSP33brssgo2u:2082: īśvarasya phalābhāve 'pi paraprayojanāya sṛṣṭau pravṛttirastvityāśaṅkya śrutimāha-bhavati ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2096: yathā loke kasyacidāptaiṣaṇasya vā vyatiriktaṃ kiñcitprayojanamabhisaṃdhāya kevalaṃ līlārūpāḥ pravṛttayaḥ krīḍāvihāreṣu bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:2097_0: yathā cocchvāsapraśvāsādayo 'nabhisaṃdhāya bāhyaṃ kiñcitprayojanaṃ svabhāvādeva saṃbhavanti
GSP33brssgo2u:2097_1: evamīśvarasyāpyanapekṣya kiñcitprayojanāntaraṃ svabhāvādeva kevalaṃ līlārūpā pravṛttirbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2098: na hīśvarasya prayojanāntaraṃ nirūpyamāṇaṃ nyāyataḥ śrutito vā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2100: yadyapyasmākamiyaṃ jagadbimbaviracanā gurutarasaṃrambhevābhāti tathāpi parameśvarasya līlaiva kevaleyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2102: yadi nāma loke līlāsvapi kiñcitsūkṣmaṃ prayojanamutprekṣyeta tathāpi naivātra kiñcitprayojanamutprekṣituṃ śakyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:2113: uktanyāyasya rājñāṃ līlāyāṃ vyabhicāra iti siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-tuśabdeneti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2117_0: kadācidrājādīnāṃ līlāyā api kiñcit phalaṃ sukhollāsādikaṃ saṃbhāvyeta tathāpi niḥśvāsādau
GSP33brssgo2u:2117_1: prekṣāvatpravṛttitvamasti na tu svasya tatroddeśyaṃ phalaṃ kiñcidastīti vyabhicārasthalāntaramāha-yathā ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2126: kimiti svasyāphalāṃ pareṣāṃ duḥkhāvahāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ karoti,
GSP33brssgo2u:2141: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati / BBs_2,1.34 /
GSP33brssgo2u:2148: kāṃścinmadhyamabhogabhājo manuṣyādīnītyevaṃ viṣamāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ nirmimāṇasyaiśvarasya pṛthagjanasyeva rāgadveṣopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2150: tathā khalajanairapi jugupsitaṃ nirghṛṇatvamatikrūratvaṃ duḥkhayogavidhānātsarvaprajopasaṃhārācca prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2151: tasmādvaiṣamyanairghṛṇyaprasaṅgānneśvaraḥ kāraṇamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye neśvarasya prasajyete /
GSP33brssgo2u:2154: yadi hi nirapekṣaḥ kevala īśvaro viṣamāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ nirmimīte syātāmetau doṣau vaiṣamyaṃ nairghṛṇyaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:2161: yathāhi parjanyo vrīhiyavādisṛṣṭau sādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:2162: vrīhiyavādivaiṣamye tu tattadbījagatānyevāsādhāraṇāni sāmarthyāni kāraṇāni bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:2164: devamanuṣyādivaiṣamye tu tattajjīvagatānyevāsādhāraṇāni karmāṇi kāraṇāni bhavantyevamīśvaraḥ sāpekṣatvānna vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyābhyāṃ duṣyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2165: kathaṃ punaravagamyate sāpekṣa īśvaro nīcamadhyamottamaṃ saṃsāraṃ nirmimīta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2166: tathāhi darśayati śrutiḥ - 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣata eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣate' (kau.brā. 3.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2167: 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpena' (bṛ. 3.2.13) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:2168: smṛtirapi prāṇikarmaviśeṣāpekṣameveśvarasyānugrahītatvaṃ ca darśayati- 'ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃstathaiva bhajāmyaham' (bha.gī. 4.11)
GSP33brssgo2u:2172: yaṃ janumunninīṣate ūrdhvaṃ netumicchati taṃ sādhu kārayatyeṣa īśvara ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2175: sa kiṃ yo viṣamakārī sa doṣavāniti nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe pūrvatra līlayā yatsraṣṭṛtvamuktaṃ tadeva karmādisāpekṣasya na yuktamanīśvaratvāpatteḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2187: nanu tarhi dharmādharmābhyāmeva vicitrā sṛṣṭirastu kimīśvareṇetyata āha-īśvarastu parjanyavaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:2190: yaṃ janamunninīṣate ūrdhvaṃ netumicchati taṃ sādhu kārayatyeṣa īśvara ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2191: naca kañcijjanaṃ sādhu kañcidasādhu karma kārayato vaiṣamyaṃ tadavasthamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2192: anādipūrvārjitasādhvasādhuvāsanayā svabhāvena janasya tattatkarmasu pravṛttāvīśvarasya sādhāraṇahetutvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2197: na karmāvibhāgād iti cen nānāditvād / BBs_2,1.35 /
GSP33brssgo2u:2199: iti prāksṛṣṭeravibhāgāvadhāraṇānnāsti karma yadapekṣya viṣamā sṛṣṭiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2202: ato vibhāgādūrdhvaṃ karmāpekṣa īśvaraḥ pravartatāṃ nāma /
GSP33brssgo2u:2207: anādau tu saṃsāre bījāṅ kuravaddhetumadbhāvena karmaṇaḥ sargavaiṣamyasya ca pravṛttirna virudhyate // 35 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2209: tathā tathā taduttarakalpānāmapītyākṣipya samādhatte sūtrakāraḥ-na karmeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2212: ādāvekarūpatve madhye viṣamakarmotpattau hetvabhāvenottarasṛṣṭīnāmapi tulyatvasya durvāratvāditi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2230: anāditve tu bījāṅ kuranyāyenopapatterna kaściddoṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2233: iti sargapramukhe śārīramātmānaṃ jīvaśabdena prāṇadhāraṇanimittenābhilapannanādiḥ saṃsāra iti darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2234: ādimattve tu prāganavadhāritaprāṇaḥ san kathaṃ prāṇādadhāraṇanimittena jīvaśabdena sargapramukhe 'bhilapyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2240: smṛtāvapyanāditvaṃ saṃsārasyopalabhyate- 'na rūpamasyeha tathopalabhyate nānto na cādirna ca saṃpratiṣṭhā' (gī. 15.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2241: purāṇe cātītānāgatānāṃ ca kalpanāṃ na parimāṇamastīti sthāpitam // 36 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2242: prathamaḥ sargaḥ kaścinnāstītyatra pramāṇaṃ pṛcchati-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2245: nanu sukhādivaiṣamye īśvaro 'vidyā vā heturastvityāśaṅkya krameṇa dūṣayati-naceśvara ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2256: sargapramukhe sṛṣṭyādau prāganavadhāritaprāṇo 'pi san pratyagātmā bhāvidhāraṇanimittena jīvaśabdenocyatāmityatrāha-naca dhārayiṣyatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2258: asya saṃsāravṛkṣasya svarūpaṃ satyaṃ mithyā vetyupadeśaṃ vinā nopalabhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2271: cetanaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiścetyasminnavadhārite vedārthe parairupakṣiptānvilakṣaṇatvādīndoṣānparyahārṣīdācāryaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2272: idānīṃ parapakṣapratiṣedhapradhānaṃ prakaraṇaṃ prāripsamāṇaḥ svapakṣaparigrahapradhānaṃ prakaraṇamupasaṃharati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2273: yasmādasminbrahmaṇi kāraṇe parigṛhyamāṇe pradarśitena prakāreṇa sarve kāraṇadharmā upapadyante 'sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti mahāmāyaṃ ca brahma' iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:2276: nirguṇasya brahmaṇo jagadupādanatvavādivedāntasamanvayo viṣayaḥ sa kiṃ yannirguṇaṃ tannopādānaṃ yathā rūpamiti nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe,
GSP33brssgo2u:2278: natūpādānatvaṃ tadvyāpakasya saguṇatvasyābhāvāditi pratyudāharaṇena prāpte siddhāntasūtratātparyamāha-cetanamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2282: yadyapi sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ ca loke kāraṇadharmatvenāprasiddhaṃ tathāpi yo yasya kartā sa tasya sarvasya jñātā śaktaśceti prasiddham,
GSP33brssgo2u:2288: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 1 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2289: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamapādaḥ samāptaḥ //1//
GSP33brssgo2u:2290: // iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyayogakāṇādādismṛtibhiḥ sāṃkhyādiprayuktatarkaiśca vedāntasamanvayavirodhaparihārākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ // ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brssgo2u:2295: yasya tattvaṃ na jānanti taṃ vande raghupuṅgavam //1//
GSP33brssgo2u:2299: yadyapīdaṃ vedāntavākyānāmaidaṃparyaṃ nirūpayituṃ śāstraṃ pravṛttaṃ na tarkśāstravat devalābhir yuktibhiḥ kaṃcit siddhāntaṃ sādhayituṃ dūṣayituṃ vā pravṛttam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2300: tathāpi vedāntavākyam api vyācakṣāṇaiḥ samyagdarśanapratipakṣabhūtāni sāṃkhyādidarśanāni nirākaraṇīyāṇīti tadarthaḥ paraḥ pādaḥ pravartate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2301: vedāntārthanirṇayasya ca samyagdarśanārthatvāt tannirṇayena svapakṣasthāpanaṃ prathamaṃ kṛtaṃ taddyabhyarhitaṃ parapakṣapratyākhyānād iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2302: nanu mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣasādhanatvena samyagdarśananirūpaṇāya svapakṣasthāpanam eva kevalaṃ kartuṃ yuktaṃ kiṃ parapakṣanirākaraṇena paradveṣakareṇa /
GSP33brssgo2u:2304: tathāpi mahājanaparigṛhītāni mahānti sāṃkhyāditantrāṇi samyagdarśanāpadeśena pravṛttānyupalabhya bhavet keṣāṃcin mandamatīnām etāny api samyagdarśanāyopadeyānītyapekṣā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2305: tathā yuktagāḍhatvasaṃbhavena sarvajñabhāṣitatvācca śraddhā ca teṣvityatastadasāratopapādanāya prayatyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2311: taducyate- sāṃkhyādayaḥ svapakṣasthāpanāya vedāntavākyānyapyudāhṛtya svapakṣānuguṇenaiva yojayanto vyācakṣate,
GSP33brssgo2u:2312: teṣāṃ yadvyākhyānaṃ tadvyākhyanābhāsaṃ na samyagvyakhyānamityetāvatpūrvaṃ kṛtam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2313: iha tu vākyanirapekṣaḥ svatantrastadyuktipratiṣedhaḥ kriyata ityeṣa viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2314: tatra sāṃkhyā manyante- yathā ghaṭaśarāvādayo bhedā mṛdātmanānvīyamānā mṛdātmakasāmānyapūrvakā loke dṛṣṭāḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2315: tathā sarva eva bāhyādhyātmikā bhedāḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmatayānvīyamānāḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakasāmānyapūrvikā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2316: yattatsukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ sāmānyaṃ tatttriguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ mṛdvadacetanaṃ cetanasya puruṣārthaṃ sādhayituṃ svabhāvenaiva vicitreṇa vikārātmanā vivartata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2320: gehaprāsādaśayanāsanavihārabhūmyādayo hi loke prajñāvadbhiḥ śilpibhiryathākālaṃ sukhaduḥkhaprāptiparihārayogyā racitā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:2324: mṛdādiṣvapi kumabhakārādyadhiṣṭhiteṣu viśiṣṭākārā racanā dṛśyate tadvatpradhānasyāpi cetanāntarādiṣṭhitatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2325: naca mṛdādyupādānasvarūpavyapāśrayeṇaiva dharmeṇa mūlakāraṇamavadhāraṇīyaṃ na bāhyakumbhakārādivyapāśrayeṇeti kiñcinniyāmakamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2335_0: tathā parimitānāṃ bhedānāṃ mūlāṅ kurādīnāṃ saṃsargapūrvakatvaṃ dṛṣṭvā bāhyādhyātmikānāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2336: kāryakāraṇabhāvastu prekṣāpūrvakanirmitānāṃ śayanāsanādīnāṃ dṛṣṭa iti na kāryakāraṇabhāvādbāhyādhyātmikānāṃ bhedānāmacetanapūrvakatvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum // 1 // @#----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:2339: brahmaṇi sarvadharmopapattivat pradhāne 'pi tadupapattimāśaṅkya nirācaṣṭe-racanānupapatteśca nānumānam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2340: nanu mumukṣūṇāṃ vākyārthanirṇayapratibandhanirāsāya vedāntānāṃ tātparyaṃ niścetumidaṃ śāstramārabdhaṃ tacca nirdeṣatayā niścitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2341: tataḥ parapakṣanirāsātmako 'yaṃ pādo 'smin śāstre na saṃgataḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2346: nanu rāgadveṣakaraṇatvāt paramatanirākaraṇaṃ na kāryamiti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2349: sā ca teṣu bhrāntimūlatvaniścayaṃ vinā na sidhyati,
GSP33brssgo2u:2350: sa ca imaṃ pādaṃ vinā neti svasiddhāntasaṃrakṣaṇārthatvātpradhānasidhyarthatvādayaṃ pādo 'smin śāstre saṃgataḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2353: mandamatīnām teṣu śraddhānimittāni bahūni santīti tannirāsāya yatnaḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2356: parapakṣatvabuddhyā hi nirāso dveṣamāvahati na tu tattavanirṇayecchayā kṛta iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2359: saṃprati śrutyanapekṣāstadīyāḥ svatantrā yuktayo nirasyanta ityarthabhedānna punaruktirityāha-taducyataiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2360_0: pradhānamacetanaṃ jagadupādānamiti sāṃkhyasiddhānto 'tra viṣayaḥ sa kiṃ pramāṇamūlo
GSP33brssgo2u:2367: ye vikārā yenānvitāste tatprakṛtikā iti vyāptimāha-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2374: tadarthaṃ svabhāvata eva pravartate na tu kenaciccetanena preryata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2386: tathā ghaṭādīnāṃ kāraṇaśaktitaḥ pravṛttermahadādikāryāṇāmapi kāraṇaśaktitaḥ pravṛttirvācyā,
GSP33brssgo2u:2388: kiñca kāraṇātkāryasya vibhāgo janma dṛśyate kṣitermṛttikā jāyate tato ghaṭa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2389: evamavibhāgaḥ prātilomyena pralayo dṛśyate ghaṭasya mṛttikāyāṃ layaḥ tasyāḥ kṣitau kṣiterapsu apāṃ tejasīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2390: etau vibhāgāvibhāgau vaiśvarūpyasya vicitrasya bhāvajātasya dṛśyamānau pṛthakpakṣīkṛtau kvacitkāraṇe viśrāntau vibhāgatvādavibhāgatvācca mṛdi ghaṭavibhāgāvibhāgavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2397: svatantramacetanaṃ prakṛtirityetaddṛṣṭāntabalena tadā nirūpyeta yadi dṛṣṭāntaḥ kvacitsyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2400: parakīyasya sādhyasyāprasiddhimuktvā satpratipakṣaṃ vaktuṃ yadvicitraracanātmakaṃ kāryaṃ taccetanādhiṣṭhitācetanaprakṛtikamiti vyāptimāha-geheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2404: vipakṣe vicitraracanānupapattirūpaṃ sūtroktaṃ bādhakatarkaṃ vaktuṃ jagato vaicitryamāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2408: itthaṃ vicitraṃ jagaccetanānadhiṣṭhitā jaḍaprakṛtiḥ kathaṃ racayet /
GSP33brssgo2u:2419: tathā ca pariṇāmitve 'pi mūlaprakṛteracetanatvadharmeṇaiva yogo na cetanādhiṣṭitatvenetyāśaṅkya niṣedhati-naceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2420: mahānasadṛṣṭānte 'ntaraṅgasyāpi mahānasasvarūpasya dhūmavyāpakatvaṃ nāsti tadbhinnasya bahiraṅgasyāpi vahnestadastītyantaraṅgatvaṃ vyāpakatve prayojakaṃ na bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2421: kiñca yadacetanaṃ taccetanādhiṣṭhitameva pariṇamata ityaṅgīkāre bādhakābhāvāt pratyuta śrutyanugrahācca tathāṅgīkāryamityāha-na caivaṃ satīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2428: kiñca yadi ghaṭe mṛdvatsukhādikaṃ śabdādyanvitaṃ syāt tarhi sarvairaviśeṣeṇa sukhādikamupalabhyeta ghaṭe mṛdvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:2430: viṣayasyaikatve 'pi puruṣavāsanāvaicitryāt kasyacitsukhabuddhiḥ kasyacidduḥkhabuddhiḥ kasyacinmohabuddhirdṛśyate 'to viṣayāḥ sukhādyātmakā na bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2431: evaṃ samanvayāditi hetuṃ dūṣayitvā parimāṇādihetūn dūṣayati-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2432: buddhyādīnāṃ parimitatvena saṃsargapūrvakatvasiddhau saṃsṛṣṭānyanekāni sattvarajastamāmasi siddhyanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:2441: sattvādīnāṃ parasparaṃ bhinnatve satyapi sādhyābhāvena vyabhicārādityāha-sattveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2445: naca yaḥ kāryasya vibhāgaḥ sa cetanānadhiṣṭhitācetane samāpta iti vyāptirasti,
GSP33brssgo2u:2453: evaṃ cetanādhīnakāraṇaśaktitaḥ kāryapravṛttisaṃbhavāt śaktitaḥ pravṛttiliṅgamanyathāsiddhamiti bhāvaḥ //1//
GSP33brssgo2u:2459: tatsiddhyarthā yā pravṛttiḥ sāmyāvasthānātpracyutiḥ sattvarajastamasāmaṅgāṅgibhāvarūpāpattirviśiṣṭakāryābhimukhapravṛttitā sāpi nācetanasya pradhānasya svatantrasyopapadyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:2461: nahi mṛdādayo rathādayo vā svayamacetanāḥ santaścetanaiḥ kulālādibhiraśvādibhirvānadhiṣṭhitā viśiṣṭakāryābhimukhapravṛttayo dṛśyante dṛṣṭāccādṛṣṭisiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2463: nanu cetanasyāpi pravṛttiḥ kevalasya na dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2468: yasminpravṛttirdṛṣṭā tasya sota yatasaṃyuktasya dṛṣṭā tasya seti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2469: nanu yasmindṛśyate pravṛttistasyaiva seti yuktamubhayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2471: pravṛtyāśrayadehādisaṃyuktasyaiva tu cetanasya sadbhāvasiddhiḥ kevalācetanarathādivailakṣaṇyaṃ jīvadehasya dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2472: ata eva ca pratyakṣe dehe sati darśanādasati cādarśanāddehasyaiva caitanyamapīti laukāyatikāḥ pratipannāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2474: tadabhidhīyate- na brūmo yasminnacetane pravṛttirdṛśyate na tasya seti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2478: yathā kāṣṭhādivyapāśrayāpi dāhaprakāśalakṣaṇā vikriyānupalabhyamānāpi ca kevale jvalane jvalanādeva bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:2480: laukāyatikānāmapi cetana eva deho 'cetanānāṃ rathādīnāṃ pravartako dṛṣṭa ityavipratiṣiddhaṃ cetanasya pravartakatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2481: nanu tava dehādisaṃyuktasyāpyātmano vijñānasvarūpamātravyatirekeṇa pravṛttyanupapatteranupapannaṃ pravartakatvamiti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:2484: yathāyaskānto maṇiḥ svayaṃ pravṛttirahito 'pyayasaḥ pravartako bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2485: yathā vā rūpādayo viṣayāḥ svayaṃ pravṛttirahitā api cakṣurādīnāṃ pravartakābhavanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2486: evaṃ pravṛttirahito 'pīśvaraḥ sarvagataḥ sarvātmā sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiśca san sarvaṃ pravartayedityupapannam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2497: tadā na kiñcit kāryaṃ bhavati pralayābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2499: tataḥ kasyacidguṇasyāṅgitvamudbhūtatvena prādhānyaṃ kasyacidaṅgatvaṃ śeṣatvamityaṅgāṅgibhāvo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:2506: kecittu bhedānāṃ pravṛttiśaktimatvāccetanānadhiṣṭhatācetanaprakṛtikatvamiti śaktitaḥ pravṛttiriti liṅgaṃ vyācakṣate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2509: pravṛttiśaktimatve sati kāryatvasya ghaṭādiṣu cetanādhiṣṭitaprakṛtikatvenoktasādhyaviruddhena vyāptidarśanāditi 'pravṛtteśca'iti sūtreṇa jñāpitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2510: nanu loke svatantrācetanānāṃ pravṛtyadarśane 'pi pradhāne sā pravṛttiḥ sidhyatu,
GSP33brssgo2u:2513: nanu pradhānasya pravṛttiṃ khaṇḍayatā cetanasya sṛṣṭau pravṛttirvācyā sā na yukteti sāṃkhyaḥ śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2523_0: yasminnacetane rathādau pravṛttirdṛṣṭā tasyaiva sā na cetanastatra heturiti kiṃ sāṃkhyamataṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2523_1: sādhu uta yena cetanenāśvādinā pravṛttistatprayuktā seti vedāntimataṃ vā sādhviti praśnārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2530: jīvaddehasya rathādibhyo vailakṣaṇyaṃ prāṇādisatvaṃ liṅgaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā cetanasya siddhirityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2537: anumitasya sadbhāvamātreṇa pravṛttihetutve sarvatrākāśasyāpi hetutvaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2543: pravṛttiṃ pratyāśrayatvamacetanasyaivetyuktamaṅgīkṛtya cetanasya prayojakatvaṃ siddhāntī sādhayati-tadabhidhīyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2544: rathādipravṛttāvaśvādicetanasyānvayavyatireko sphuṭau tābhyāṃ cetanasya pravartakatvaṃ bāhyānāmapi saṃmatamityāha-laukāyatikānāmapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2545: yaḥ pravartakaḥ saḥ svayaṃ pravṛttimānaśvādivaditi vyāpterātmani vyāpakābhāvānna pravartakatvamiti kaścicchaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2549_0: avidyakalpite nāmarūpaprapañce tayaivāvidyārūpayā māyayā ya āveśaścidātmanaḥ kalpitaḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:2549_1: saṃbandhastasya vaśaḥ sāmarthyaṃ tenāntaryāmitvādikamīśvasyetyuktatvānna codyāvasara ityarthaḥ //2 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2556: yathāca jalamacetanaṃ svabhāvenaiva lokopakārāya syandata evaṃ pradhānamacetanaṃ svabhāvenaiva puruṣārthasiddhaye pravartiṣyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2561: , 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi prācyonyā nadyaḥ syandante' (bṛ. 3.8.9)
GSP33brssgo2u:2570: ityatra tu bāhyanimittanirapekṣamapi svāśrayaṃ kāryaṃ bhavatītyetallokadṛṣṭyā nidarśitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2571: śāstradṛṣṭyā tu punaḥ sarvatraiveśvarāpekṣatvamāpadyamānaṃ na parāṇudyate // 3 // @#----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:2578: tatra kṣīrādau vyabhicāramāśaṅkya tasyāpi pakṣasamatvenoktānumānādāgamena ca sādhyasiddhirna vyabhicāra iti sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-syādetadityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2583: kṣīre pravartakatvena dhenvādeḥ sattvācca na vyabhicāra ityāha-cetanāyāśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2586: sūtrakārasya 'kṣīravaddhi' 'tatrāpi'iti ca vaktuḥ pūrvāparavirodhamāśaṅkya lokadṛṣṭyā śāstradṛṣṭyā ca sūtradvayamityavirodhamāha-upasaṃhāreti //3//
GSP33brssgo2u:2592: natu tadvyatirekeṇa pradhānasya pravartakaṃ nivartakaṃ vā kiñcidbāhyamapekṣyamavastitamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2593: puruṣastūdāsīno na pravartako na nivartaka ityato 'napekṣaṃ pradhānaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2594: anapekṣatvācca kadācitpradhānaṃ mahadādyākāreṇa pariṇamate kadācinna pariṇamata ityetadayuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2595: īśvarasya tu sarvajñatvātsarvaśaktitvānmahāmāyatvācca pravṛttyapravṛttī na virudhyete // 4 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2596: astu pradhānasyāpi dharmādi karma puruṣo vā pravartaka ityāśaṅkya sūtraṃ pravṛttaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2598: pradhānavyatirekeṇa karmaṇo 'navasthiteḥ puruṣasyodāsīnatvāt kadācitsṛṣṭipravṛttiḥ kadācitpralaya ityayuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2599: karmaṇo 'pi pradhānātmakasyācetanatvāt sadāsatvācca na kādācitkapravṛttiniyāmakatvamiti bhāvaḥ //4//
GSP33brssgo2u:2605: yathā tṛṇapallavodādi nimittāntaranirapekṣaṃ svabhāvādeva kṣīrādyākāreṇa pariṇamata evaṃ pradhānamapi mahadādyākāreṇa pariṇaṃsyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2608: yadi hi kiñcinnimittamupalabhemahi tato yathākāmaṃ tena tṛṇādyupādāya kṣīraṃ saṃpādayemahi,
GSP33brssgo2u:2611: atrocyate- bhavettṛṇādivatsvābhāvikaḥ pradhānasyāpi paraṇāmo yadi tṛṇāderapi svābhāvikaḥ pariṇāmo 'bhyupagamyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2616: dhenvaiva hyupayuktaṃ tṛṇādi kṣīro bhavati na prahīṇamanaḍudādyupayuktaṃ vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2618: naca yathākāmaṃ mānuṣairna śakyaṃ saṃpādayitumityetāvatā nirnimittaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2620: manuṣyā api śaknuvatyevocitenopāyena tṛṇādyupādāya kṣīraṃ saṃpādayitum /
GSP33brssgo2u:2621: prabhūtaṃ hi kṣīraṃ kāmayamānāḥ prabhūtaṃ ghāsaṃ dhenuṃ cārayanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2626: punarapi dṛṣṭāntabalāt pradhānasya svata eva kādācitkapravṛttirityāśaṅkya niṣedhati sūtrakāraḥ-anyatretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2638: athāpi nāma bhavataḥ śraddhāmanurudhyamānāḥ svābhāvikīmeva pradhānasya pravṛttimabhyupagacchema tathāpi doṣo 'nuṣajyetaiva /
GSP33brssgo2u:2641_0: yadi tāvatsvābhāvikī pradhānasya pravṛttirna kiñcidanyadihāpekṣata ityucyeta tato
GSP33brssgo2u:2641_1: yathaiva sahakāri kiñcinnāpekṣata evaṃ prayojanamapi kiñcinnāpekṣiṣyate ityataḥ pradhānaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:2641_2: puruṣasyārthaṃ sādhayituṃ pravartata itīyaṃ pratijñā hīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2642: sa yadi brūyātsahakāryeva kevalaṃ nāpekṣate na prayojanamapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2643: tathāpi pradhānapravṛtteḥ prayojanaṃ vivektavyaṃ bhogo vā syādapavargo vobhayaṃ veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2669: autsukyanivṛttyarthaṃ yathā kriyāsu pravartate lokaḥ puruṣasya vimokṣārthaṃ pravartate tadvadavyaktamiti kārikoktaṃ dūṣayati-naceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2670: autsukyamicchāviśeṣaḥ kevalajaḍasyātmano vā na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2673: tayoḥ śaktyordṛśyasṛṣṭī vinā sārthakyāyogāt pradhānasya sṛṣṭau pravṛttiriti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:2681: yathā kaścitpuruṣo dṛkśaktisaṃpannaḥ pravṛttiśaktihīnaḥ paṅguraparaṃ puruṣaṃ pravṛttiśaktisaṃpannaṃ dṛkśaktihīnamandhamadhiṣṭhāya pravartayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2683: evaṃ puruṣaḥ pradhānaṃ pravartayiṣyatīti dṛṣṭāntapratyayena punaḥ pratyavasthānam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2696: tathā pradhānasyācaitanyātpuruṣasya caudāsīnyāttṛtīyasya ca tayoḥ saṃbandhayiturabhāvātsaṃbandhānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2700: puruṣasya pravartakatvaṃ nirastamapi dṛṣṭāntena punarāśaṅkya niṣedhati-puruṣāśmavaditi cettathāpi /
GSP33brssgo2u:2701: pradhānasya svātantryaṃ puruṣasyaudāsīnyaṃ cābhyupetaṃ tyajyata iti vadantaṃ sāṃkhyaṃpratyāha-kathaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2702: puruṣasya parispandaḥ prayatnaguṇo vā nāstīti vaktuṃ hetudvayam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2709: yathā svatantrapradhānapravṛttipakṣo bhogo 'pavarga ubhayaṃ vā phalamiti vikalpya dūṣitaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2728: cirakālasthitasya sāmyasya cyutau nimittaṃ vācyaṃ tannāstītyarthaḥ //8//
GSP33brssgo2u:2733: athāpi syādanyathā vayamanumimīmahe yathā nāyamanantaro doṣaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2736: yathā yathā kāryotpāda upapadyate tathā tathaiṣāṃ svabhāvo 'bhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2738: tasmātsāmyāvasthāyāmapi vaiṣamyopagamayogyā eva guṇā avatiṣṭhanta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2739: evamapi pradhānasya jñaśaktiviyogādracanānupapattyādayaḥ pūrvoktā doṣāstadavasthā eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:2742: vaiṣamyopagamayogyā api guṇāḥ sāmyāvasthāyāṃ nimittābhāvānnaiva vaiṣamyaṃ bhajeran /
GSP33brssgo2u:2743: bhajamānā vā nimittābhāvāviśeṣātsarvadaiva vaiṣamyaṃ bhajeranniti prasajyata evāyamanantaro 'pi doṣaḥ // 9 //
GSP33brssgo2u:2746: anapekṣasvabhāvādanyathā sāpekṣatvena guṇānāmanumānātpūrvasūtrokto doṣo na prasajyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2762: prasiddha eva tu śrutyeśvarakāraṇavādinyā virodhastadanuvartinyā ca smṛtyā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2765: ekaṃ hi brahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvasya prapañcasya kāraṇamabhyupagacchatāmekasyaivātmano viśeṣau tapyatāpakau na jātyantarabhūtāvityabhyupagantavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2766: yadi cetau tapyatāpakāvekasyātmano viśeṣau syātāṃ sa tābhyāṃ tapyatāpakābhyāṃ na nirmucyata iti tāpopaśāntaye samyagdarśanamupadiśacchāstramanarthakaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2767: nahyauṣṇyaprakāśadharmakasya pradīpasya tadavasthasyaiva tābhyāṃ nirmokṣa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2769: tatrāpi jalātmana ekasya vīcyādanyo viśeṣā āvirbhāvatirobhāvarūpeṇa nityā eveti samāno jalātmano vīcyādibhiranirmokṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2773: yasyārthino yadviṣayamarthitvaṃ sa tasyārtho nityasiddha eveti na tasya tadviṣayamarthitvaṃ syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:2774: yathā prakāśātmanaḥ pradīpasya prakāśākhyortho nityasiddha eveti na tasya tadviṣayamarthitvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2785: tapyastu puruṣo ya ekaḥ paryāyeṇobhābhyāṃ saṃbadhyata iti tayostapyatāpakayorekātmatāyāṃ mokṣānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2789: bhavedeṣa doṣo yadyekātmatāyāṃ tapyatāpakāvānyonyasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātām /
GSP33brssgo2u:2791: nahyagnirekaḥ sansvamātmānaṃ dahati prakāśayati vā satyapyauṣṇyaprakāśādidharmabhede pariṇāmitve ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:2794: ucyate- kiṃ na paśyasi karmabhūto jīvaddehastapyastāpakaḥ saviteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2795: nanu taptirnāma duḥkhaṃ sā cetayiturnācetanasya dehasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:2796: yadi hi dehasyaiva taptiḥ syātsā dehanāśe svayameva naśyatīti tannāśāya sādhanaṃ naiṣitavyaṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:2797: ucyate- dehābhāve 'pi kevalasya cetanasya taptirna dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2798: naca tvayāpi taptirnāma vikriyā cetayituḥ kevalasyeṣyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2801: kathaṃ tavāpi tapyatāpakabhāvaḥ sattvaṃ tapyaṃ tāpakaṃ raja iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:2807: nahi ḍuṇḍubhaḥ sarpaṃ ivetyetāvatā saviṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2808: sarpo vā ḍuṇḍubha ivetyetāvatā nirviṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:2811: atha pāramārthikameva cetanasya tapyatvamabhyupagacchasi tavaiva sutarāmanirmokṣaḥ prasajyeta ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2814: tataścātyantiko mokṣa upapanna iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:2818: aupaniṣadasya tvātmaikatvābhyupagamādekasya ca viṣayaviṣayibhāvānupapattervikārabhedasya ca vācārambhaṇamātratvaśravaṇādanirmokṣaśaṅkā svapne 'pi nopajāyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2819: vyavahāre tu yatra yathā dṛṣṭastapyatāpakabhāvastatra tathaiva sa iti na codayitavyaḥ parihartavyo vā bhavati // 10 // @#----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:2834: tasmādbhrāntimūlatvātsāṃkhyaśāstrasya tena nirdeṣavedāntasamanvayasya na virodha iti siddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:2840: ato na vyavahāralopa ityāśaṅkya vahneriva tābhyāmātmanomokṣo na syādityāha-yadi cetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2841: nanu satyapi dharmiṇi svabhāvanāśo mokṣa upapadyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:2851: na hi svasya svārthatvamasti kāmyasyaiva kāmayitṛtvāyogāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2857: tayā tapyayā buddhyā puruṣasya saṃyogaḥ svasvāmibhāvastasya heturanādiravivekastasya parihāro vivekastasmānnityamuktasyāpi puruṣasya kathañcidupacārānmokṣopapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2858: yathā yoddhṛgatau jayaparājayau rājanyupacaryete tathā puruṣādatyantabhinnabuddhigatau bandhamokṣau puruṣe upacaryete /
GSP33brssgo2u:2868: yatra tapyatāpakabhāvo dṛṣṭastatraiveti vyavahārapakṣamādāya siddhāntī brūte-kiṃna paśyasīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2870: acetanasyaiva dehasya taptirneti vadatā sāṃkhyena vaktavyaṃ kiṃ cetanasya kevalasya taptiḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2880: tarhi jalacandrasya calanavanmithyaiva taptirityasmatpakṣa āgata ityāha-paramārthata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2881: ivaśabdamātreṇa kathaṃ mithyā taptyavagama iti cettaducyate-ivaśabdastapyabuddhisattvasādṛśyaṃ brūte,
GSP33brssgo2u:2882: tacca sādṛśyaṃ puruṣasya tapyatvarūpaṃ cet kalpitameva vastutastaptyabhāvādityupapādayati-na cediti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2886: saviṣayatvaṃ nirviṣayatvaṃ cevaśabdārthaḥ kalpita eva draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2887: sāṃkhyasyāvidyake tapyatāpakatve sati mamāpi kiñcinna duṣyati kintu dṛṣṭameva saṃpannamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2888: yadi mithyātapyatvāṅgīkāre 'pasiddhāntaḥ syāditi bhītyā satyaṃ tapyatvaṃ puruṣasyocyate tathāpyapasiddhāntaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:2896: nimittamavivekātmakadarśanaṃ tamastena sahitaḥ sanimittaḥ saṃyegaḥ puruṣasya guṇasvāmitvarūpastadapekṣatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2898: nimittasya nivṛttyabhāvānna mokṣa iti siddhāntī pariharati-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2903: vyavahārastu bhedāṅgīkārāttapyatāpakabhāvo bandhaḥ tattvajñānāttannivṛttiścopapadyata iti na codyāvasara ityarthaḥ //10//
GSP33brssgo2u:2910: tatrādau tāvadyo 'ṇuvādinā brahmavādini doṣa utprekṣyate sa pratisamādhīyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:2911: tatrāyaṃ vaiśeṣikāṇāmabhyupagamaḥ - kāraṇadravyasamavāyino guṇāḥ kāryadravye samānajātīyaṃ guṇāntaramārabhante,
GSP33brssgo2u:2913: tasmāccetanasya brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatve 'bhyupagamyamāne kārye 'pi jagati cetanyaṃ samaveyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2914: tadadarśanāttu na cetanaṃ brahma jagatkāraṇaṃ bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2917: eṣā teṣāṃ prakriyā- paramāṇavaḥ kila kañcitkālamanārabdhakāryā yathāyogaṃ rūpādimantaḥ pārimaṇḍalyaparimāṇaśca tiṣṭhanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2918: te ca paścādadṛṣṭādipuraḥsarāḥ saṃyogasacivāśca santo dvyaṇukādikrameṇa kṛtsnaṃ kāryajātamārabhante /
GSP33brssgo2u:2920: yadā dvau paramāṇū dvyaṇukamārabhete tadā paramāṇugatā rūpādiguṇaviśeṣāḥ śuklādayo dvyaṇuke śaklādīnaparānārabhante /
GSP33brssgo2u:2924: yadāpi dve dvyaṇuke caturaṇukamārabhete tadāpi samānaṃ dvyaṇukasamavāyināṃ śuklādīnāmārambhakatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2927: yadāpi bahavaḥ paramāṇavo bahūni vā dvyaṇukāni dvyaṇukasahito vā paramāṇuḥ kāryamārabhate tadāpi samānaiṣā yojanā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2928: tadevaṃ yathā paramāṇoḥ parimaṇḍalātsato 'ṇu hrasvaṃ ca dvyaṇukaṃ jāyate mahaddīrghaṃ ca tryaṇukādi na parimaṇḍalam,
GSP33brssgo2u:2929: yathā vā dvyaṇukādaṇorhrasvācca sato mahaddīrghaṃ ca tryaṇukaṃ jāyate nāṇu no hrasvam,
GSP33brssgo2u:2930: evaṃ cetanādbrahmaṇo 'cetanaṃ jagajjaniṣyata ityabyupagame kiṃ tava cchinnam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2931: atha manyase virodhinā parimāṇāntareṇākrāntaṃ kāryadravyaṃ dvyaṇukādītyato nārambhakāṇi kāraṇagatāni pārimaṇḍalyādīnītyabhyupagacchāmi,
GSP33brssgo2u:2933: yena kāraṇagatā cetanā kārye cetanāntaraṃ nārabheta /
GSP33brssgo2u:2938: yathā kāraṇe vidyamānānāmapi pārimāṇḍalyādināmanārambhakatvamevaṃ caitanyasyāpītyasyāṃśasya samānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2941: naca parimāṇāntarārambhe vyagrāṇi pārimāṇḍalyādīnītyataḥ svasamānajātīyaṃ parimāṇāntaraṃ nārabhante parimāṇāntarasyānyahetutvābhyupagamāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2947: dravyāntare guṇāntare vārabhyamāṇe sarveṣāmeva kāraṇaguṇānāṃ svāśrayasamavāyaviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2954: naca dravyasya dravyamevodāhartavyaṃ guṇasya vā guṇa eveti kaścinniyame heturasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2955: sūtrakāro 'pi bhavatāṃ dravyasya guṇamudājahāra- 'pratyakṣāpratyakṣāṇāmapratyakṣatvātsaṃyogasya pañcātmakaṃ na vidyate' (vai. sū. 4.2.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2956: yathā pratyakṣāpratyakṣayorbhūmyākāśayoḥ samavayansaṃyogo 'pratyakṣa evaṃ pratyakṣāpratyakṣeṣu pañcasu bhūteṣu samavayaccharīramapratyakṣaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:2959: etaduktaṃ bhavati- guṇaśca saṃyogo dravyaṃ śarīram /
GSP33brssgo2u:2966: nanvatideśo 'pi samānanyāyatayā kṛtaḥ 'etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ' (bra.sū. 2.1.12) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2968: tasyaiva tvayaṃ vaiśeṣikaprakriyārambhe tatprakriyānugatena nidarśanena prapañcaḥ kṛtaḥ // 11 // @#----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:2970: FN: paramāṇuḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ tadgataṃ parimāṇaṃ pārimāṇḍalyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2973_0: yadyapi sāṃkhyamatanirāsānantaraṃ paramāṇuvādo nirākartavyaḥ svamatasthāpanasya smṛtipāde
GSP33brssgo2u:2974: tathā brahmaguṇacaitanyānanvayādbrahmaṇo 'pi nopādānatvamiti doṣo dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatilābhādatra samādhīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2976_0: sa kiṃ yaḥ samavāyikāraṇaguṇaḥ sa kāryadravye svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhakastantuśauklyavaditi
GSP33brssgo2u:2976_1: nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe nyāyasyāvyabhicārādvirudhyata iti prāpte vyabhicārānna
GSP33brssgo2u:2977: yadyapi 'na vilakṣaṇatvāt'ityatra cetanādacetanasargaḥ sādhitastathāpi vaiśeṣikanyāyasya tadīyaprakriyayā vyabhicāroktyarthatvādasya sūtrasya na gatārthatā /
GSP33brssgo2u:2978: pralayakāle paramāṇavo niścalā asaṃyuktāstiṣṭhanti sargakāle cādṛṣṭavadātmasaṃyogātteṣu karma bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:2980: kāraṇaguṇāḥ kārye guṇāntaramānabhanta iti sāmānyena prakriyāmuktvā viśeṣatastāmāha-yadā dvāviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2983: tacca svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhakaṃ na bhavatītyuktanyāyasya vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2987: yathāśrute tu dvābhyāṃ dvyaṇukābhyāṃ mahataścaturaṇukasyārambho na yujyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:2988: kāraṇagataṃ mahatvaṃ bahutvaṃ vā vinā kārye mahatvāyogāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:2989_0: prakaṭārthakārāstu yaddvābhyāṃ dvyaṇukābhyāmārabdhaṃ kārye mahatvaṃ dṛśyate tasya
GSP33brssgo2u:2989_1: hetuḥ pracayo nāma praśithilāvayavasaṃyoga iti rāvaṇapraṇīte bhāṣye dṛśyata iti cirantanavaiśeṣikadṛṣṭyedaṃ bhāṣyamityāhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2991: yadyapi tārkikā dvābhyāmeva paramāṇubhyāṃ dvyaṇukaṃ tribhirdvyaṇukaistryaṇukamiti kalpayanti tathāpi tarkasyāpratiṣṭhānānna niyama iti matvā brūte-yadāpi bahava iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2993: kāryadravyaparimāṇaṃ tu na kāraṇaparimāṇārabhyaṃ kintu kāraṇagatasaṃkhyārabhyamiti prakriyā tulyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2994: evaṃ prakriyāṃ darśayayitvā sūtraṃ yojayan vyabhicāramāha-tadevamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:2997: aṇuhrasvebhyo dvyaṇukebhyo 'ṇudravyaṃ na jāyate hrasvamapi na jāyata iti vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:2999: tathā ca hrasvaparimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvyaṇukaparamāṇubhyāṃ mahaddīrghāṇuvaccetanādacetanaṃ jāyata iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3000: tatra hrasvānmahaddīrghaṃ tryaṇukaṃ parimaṇḍalādaṇu dvyaṇukamiti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3006: tadutpatteḥ prāgvirodhyabhāvāt dvyaṇuke pārimāṇḍalyārambhaḥ kiṃ na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3007: nanu virodhiparimāṇena sahaiva dravyaṃ jāyata ityata āha-ārabdhamapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3014: kāraṇānāṃ dvyaṇukānāṃ bahutvāt tryaṇuke mahatvaṃ mṛdo mahatvāt ghaṭe mahatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3022: teṣāmanārambhakatve kāryadravyasya virodhiguṇākrāntatvaṃ vyagratvamasaṃnidhirvā na heturityuktiphalamāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:3023_0: yattu kāraṇaguṇaḥ svasamānaguṇārambhaka iti vyāpteḥ sāmānyaguṇeṣu pārimāṇḍalyādiṣu
GSP33brssgo2u:3023_1: vyabhicāre 'pi yo dravyasamavāyikāraṇagato viśeṣaguṇaḥ sa svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhaka
GSP33brssgo2u:3031: guṇāt dravyavaccetanādacetanārambha iti vilakṣaṇārambhakatvāṃśe 'yaṃ dṛṣṭānta iti pariharati-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3044: sa ca vāda itthaṃ samuttiṣṭhata- paṭādīni hi loke sāvayavāni dravyāṇi svānugateraiva saṃyogasacivaistantvādibhirdravyairārabhyamāṇāni dṛṣṭāni /
GSP33brssgo2u:3045: tatsāmānyena yāvatkiñcitsāvayavaṃ tatsarvaṃ svānugateraiva saṃyogasacivaistairdravyairārabdhamiti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3046: sa cāyamavayavāvayavivibhāgo yato nivartate so 'pakarṣaparyantagataḥ paramāṇuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3049: nacākāraṇena kāryeṇa bhavitavyamityataḥ paramāṇavo jagataḥ kāraṇamiti kaṇabhugabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3050_0: tānīmāni catvāri bhūtāni bhūmyudakatejaḥpavanākhyāni sāvayavānyupalabhya caturvidhāḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:3050_1: paramāṇavaḥ parikalpyante teṣāṃ cāpakarṣaparyantagatatvena parato vibhāgāsaṃbhavādvanaśyatāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:3050_2: pṛthivyādīnāṃ paramāṇuparyanto vibhāgo bhavati sa pralayakālaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3051: tataḥ sargakāle ca vāyavīyeṣvaṇuṣvadṛṣṭāpekṣaṃ karmotpadyate tatkarma svāśrayamaṇumaṇvantareṇa saṃniyukti tato dvyaṇukādikrameṇa vāyurutpadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3055: aṇugatebhyaśca rūpādibhyo dvyaṇukādigatāni rūpādīni saṃbhavanti tantupaṭanyāyeneti kāṇādā manyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:3061: yathādṛṣṭaṃ kimapi karmaṇo nimittamabhyupagamyeta tasyāsaṃbhavānnaivāṇuṣvādyaṃ karma syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3063: śarīrapratiṣṭhe hi manasyātmanaḥ saṃyoge satyātmaguṇaḥ prayatno jāyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3065: sargottarakālaṃ hi tatsarvaṃ nādyasya karmaṇo nimittaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3066: athādṛṣṭamādyasya karmaṇo nimittamityucyeta tatpunarātmasamavāyi vā syādaṇusamavāyi vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3068: nahyacetanaṃ cetanenānadhiṣṭhitaṃ svatantraṃ pravartate pravartayati veti sāṃkhyaprakriyāyāmabhihitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3075: saṃyogābhāvācca tannibandhanaṃ dvyaṇukādi kāryajātaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3078: pradeśavato dravyasya pradeśavatā dravyāntareṇa saṃyogasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3081: kalpitānāmavastutvādavastveva saṃyoga iti vastunaḥ kāryasyāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3083: yathācādisarge nimittābhāvātsaṃyogotpattyarthaṃ karma nāṇūnāṃ saṃbhavatyevaṃ mahāpralaye 'pi vibhāgotpattyarthaṃ karma naivāṇūnāṃ saṃbhavet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3085: adṛṣṭamapi bhogaprasiddhyarthaṃ na pralayaprasiddhyarthamityato nimittābhāvānna syādaṇūnāṃ saṃyogotpattyarthaṃ vibhāgotpattyarthaṃ vā karma /
GSP33brssgo2u:3092_0: nāsya prāsaṅgikena pūrvādhikaraṇena saṃgatirapekṣiteti manvānaḥ pradhānasyeśvarānadhiṣṭhitasyākāraṇatve
GSP33brssgo2u:3094: sa kiṃ mānamūlo bhrāntimūlo veti saṃdehe pūrvapakṣayati-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3095: taiḥ paṭādibhiḥ sāmānyaṃ kṣityādeḥ kāryardravyatvaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3102: vimataṃ sāvayavatvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ yato nivartate sa nyūnaparimāṇasyāpakarṣasya paryantatvenāvasānabhūmitvenāvagataḥ paramāṇurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3114: evaṃ kāṇādamatasya mānamūlatvāttena vedāntasamanvayasya virodhādasiddhiriti pūrvapakṣe phalam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3116: pralaye vibhaktānāṃ paramāṇūnāmanyatarakarmaṇo 'bhayakarmaṇā vā saṃyogo vācyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3125: sthirasya vegavaddravyasaṃyogāviśeṣo 'bhighātaḥ sa eva calasya nodanamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3128: jaḍātmavadaṇorāśrayatvaṃ ki na syāditi matvā vikalpaḥ kṛta iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3136: vibhusaṃyogasyāṇuṣu sadā sattvāt kriyāsātatye pralayābhāvaḥ syāditi dūṣayati-saṃbandheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3138: yajjñānaṃ taccharīrajanyamiti vyāptivirodhena nityajñānāsiddhestadguṇa īśvaro nāsti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3142: saṃyogasya vyāpyavṛttitve ekasminnitarasyāntarbhāvātkāryasya pṛthutvāyogāt sarvaṃ kāryaṃ paramāṇumātraṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3143: kiñca sāṃśadravye saṃyogasyaikāṃśavṛttitvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadvirodhādvyāpyavṛttitvaṃ na kalpyamityāha-dṛṣṭeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3147: kāṇādānāṃ sargapratyuktau sūtraṃ yojayitvā pralayanirāse 'pi sūtraṃ yojayati-thā ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3151: tathā ca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭanimittayorasattvādubhayathāpi saṃyogārthatvena vibhāgārthatvena ca karma nāsti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3152: ataḥ karmābhāvāttayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgapūrvakayoḥ sargapralayayorabhāva iti sūtrayojanā //12//
GSP33brssgo2u:3162_0: yathaiva hyaṇubhyāmatyantabhinnaṃ sadvyaṇukaṃ samavāyalakṣaṇena saṃbandhena tābhyāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:3163: tataśca tasya tasyānyonyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavya ityanavasthaiva prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3164: nanviha pratyayagrāhyaḥ samavāyo nityasaṃbaddha eva samavāyibhirgṛhyate nāsaṃbaddhaḥ saṃbandhāntarāpekṣo vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3165: tataśca na tasyānyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavyo yenānavasthā prasajyeteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3167: saṃyogo 'pyevaṃ sati saṃyogibhirnityasaṃbaddha eveti samavāyavannānyaṃ saṃbandhamapekṣeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3170: naca guṇatvātsaṃyogaḥ saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate na samavāyo 'guṇatvāditi yujyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo2u:3177: aṇuvādāsaṃbhava iti yogyatayā saṃbadhyate dvyaṇukasamavāyayoḥ paramāṇubhinnatvasāmyāt dvyaṇukavatsamavāyasyāpi samavāyāntaramityanavasthitirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3178: nanviha tantuṣu paṭa ityādiviśiṣṭadhīniyāmakaḥ samavāyo na saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate,
GSP33brssgo2u:3180: saṃyogasyāpi svarūpasaṃbandhopapatteḥ samavāyo na syāditi dūṣayati-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3183: guṇatvābhāve 'pi karmasāmānyādīnāṃ samavāyāṅgīkārādguṇatvaṃ samavāyitve na vyāpakam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3194: apicāṇavaḥ pravṛttisvabhāvā vā nivṛttisvabhāvā vobhayasvabhāvā vānubhayasvabhāvā vābhyupagamyante gatyantarābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3204: nimittaṃ ca kālādṛṣṭādikaṃ nityasaṃnihitamiti nityameva pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3210_0: sāvayavānāṃ dravyāṇāmavayavavaśo vibhajyamānānāṃ yataḥ paro vibhāgo na saṃbhavati
GSP33brssgo2u:3210_1: te caturvidhā rūpādimantaḥ paramāṇavaścaturvidhasya rūpādimato bhūtabhautikasyārambhakā
GSP33brssgo2u:3210_2: nityāśceti yadvaiśeṣikā abhyupagacchanti sa teṣāmabhyupagamo nirālambana eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:3215: yadi loke rūpādimadvastu tatsvakāraṇāpekṣayā sthūlamanityaṃ ca dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3216: tadyathā paṭastantūnapekṣya sthūle 'nityaśca bhavati tantavaścaṃśūnapekṣya sthūlā anityāśca bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3219: yacca nityatve kāraṇaṃ tairuktam- 'sadakāraṇavannityam' (vai. sū. 4.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3222: yadapi nityatve dvitīyaṃ kāraṇamuktam- 'anityamiti ca viśeṣataḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ' (vai. sū. 4.1.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3224: asati hi yasminkasmiṃścinnitye vastuni nityaśabdena nañaḥ samāso nopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3229: yadapi nityatve tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇamuktam- 'avidyā ca' (vai. sū. 4.1.5)
GSP33brssgo2u:3230: iti, tadyadyevaṃ vivrīyate satāṃ paridṛśyamānakāryāṇāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pratyakṣeṇāgrahaṇamavidyeti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3233: tasya ca prāgevoktatvāt 'avidyā ca' iti punaruktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3234: athāpi kāraṇavibhāgātkāraṇavināśāccanyasya tṛtīyasya vināśahetorasaṃbhavo 'vidyā sā paramāṇūnāṃ nityatvaṃ khyapayatīti vyākhyāyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3235: nāvaśyaṃ vinaśyadvastu dvābhyāmeva hetubhyāṃ vinaṣṭumarhatiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3236: saṃyogasacive hyanekasmiṃśca dravye dravyāntarasyārambhake 'bhyupagamyamāna etadevaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3237: yadā tvapāstaviśeṣaṃ sāmānyātmakaṃ kāraṇaṃ viśeṣavadavasthāntaramāpadyamānamārambhakamabhyupagamyate tadā ghṛtakāṭhinyavilayanavanmūrtyavasthāvilayanenāpi vināśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3240: kiṃ ca paramāṇavaḥ samavāyikāraṇavantaḥ kāraṇāpekṣayā sthūlā anityāśca,
GSP33brssgo2u:3241: rūpavattvāt rasavattvādgandhavattvāt sparśavattvāt ghaṭavaditi sūtraṃ yojayituṃ paraprakriyāmāha-sāvayavānāmityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3242: nanvatra paramāṇutvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ tadviruddhaṃ sthūlatvaṃ kathaṃ sādhyata iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:3247: naca tarhi vāyuḥ kāraṇavāniti pṛthaksādhane rūpādihetūnāṃ bhāgāsiddhyabhāve 'pi siddhasādhanatā syāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3249: yatra rūpaṃ tatsakāraṇamiti vyāptigrahakāle vāyutvādyavacchedena sādhyasiddhyabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3252: ātmavaditi satpratipakṣamutthāpya viśeṣyāsiddhyā dūṣayati-yacca nityatva iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3256: ghaṭābhāvāvaditi nityasya kvacitsiddhau kāryamanityamiti viśeṣataḥ kārye nityatvapratiṣedhāt kāraṇabhūtaparamāṇuṣu nityatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3260: kāraṇanityatvasya pramāṇāntareṇa jñānaṃ vinā kāryamanityamiti vyavahārayogādityāha-naca śabdeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3261: yadi pramāṇāntaraṃ kāraṇanityatve syāttadāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ samūlo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3263: vaṭe yakṣavyavahārādapi tatsiddhiprasaṅgāt mūlajñāne tu tenaiva aśeṣasiddhervyavahāropanyāsavaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3264: evaṃ paramāṇunityatve kāṇādasūtradvayaṃ nirasya tṛtīyaṃ nirasyati-yadapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3265: satāmaṇūnāṃ dṛśyamānasathūlakāryāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa kāraṇajñānamavidyeti yadi sūtrārthaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3276: avayavānāṃ saṃyogena dravyāntarotpattirāraṃbha iti yadi mataṃ syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:3279: ataḥ kāraṇameva svato nirviśeṣaṃ viśeṣavadavasthātmanā kāryamityanubhavabalādāstheyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3280: tathā cāṇūnāmapyavidyāpariṇāmarūpāṇāṃ pralayanimittena kālādinā piṇḍātmakasvarūpatirobhāvena kāraṇabhāvāpattirvināśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3285: vastutastu ghṛtaṃ kaṭhinaṃ dravamityanusyūtaghṛtapariṇāmaviśeṣo dravyameva kāṭhinyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3286: naca dravyatve 'pyavayavavibhāgādeva tasya nāśa iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3289: kiñca pralaye nāsīdrajo nānyat kiñcanetyaṇūnāṃ nāśasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3298: sparśaguṇaḥ sūkṣmatamo vāyurityevametāni catvāri bhūtānyupacitāpacitaguṇāni sthūlasūkṣmatarasūkṣmatamatāratamyopetāni ca loke lakṣyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:3304: akalpyamāne tūpacitāpacitaguṇatve paramāṇutvasāmyaprasiddhaye yadi tāvatsarvaṃ ekaikaguṇā eva kalpyeraṃstatastejasi sparśasyopalabdhirna syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:3317: pārthivaḥ paramāṇūradhikaguṇastata ekaikanyūnaguṇā jalādiparamāṇava iti kalpyate, na vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3325: neti pakṣe sarveṣāmāṇūnāṃ sāmyārthamekaikaguṇavattvaṃ vā syāccaturguṇavatvaṃ vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3332: ayaṃ tu paramāṇukāraṇavādo na kaiścidapi śiṣṭaiḥ kenacidapyaṃśena parigṛhīta ityatyantamevānādaraṇīyo vedavādibhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3338: yathā hi loke śaśakuśapalāśaprabhṛtīnāmatyantabhinnānāṃ satāṃ netaretarādhīnatvaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3340: atha bhavati dravyādhīnatvaṃ guṇādīnāṃ tato dravyabhāve bhāvāddravyābhāve 'bhāvāddravyameva saṃsthānādibhedādanekaśabdapratyayabhāgbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3346: iha tu śuklaḥ kambalo rohiṇī dhenurnīlamutpalamiti dravyasyaiva tasya tasya tena tena viśeṣeṇa pratīyamānatvānnaiva dravyaguṇayoragnidhūmayoriva bhedapratītirasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3355: paṭasya tu guṇāḥ śuklatvādayaḥ paṭadeśā abhyupagamyante na tantudeśāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3356: tathācāhuḥ - 'dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabhante guṇāśca guṇāntaram' (vai. sū. 1.1.10) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3358: tantugatāśca guṇāḥ śuklādayaḥ kāryadravye paṭe śuklādiguṇāntaramārabhanta iti hi te 'bhyupagacchanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3364: yutasiddhayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃyogo 'pyutasiddhayostu samavāya ityayamabhyupagamo mṛṣaiva teṣāṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3366: athānyatarāpekṣa evāyamabhyupagamaḥ syādayutasiddhasya kāryasya kāraṇena saṃbandhaḥ samavāya iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3367: evamapi prāgsiddhasyālabdhātmakasya kāryasya kāraṇena saṃbandho nopapadyate dvayāyattatvātsaṃbandhasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:3369: prākkāraṇasaṃbandhātkāryasya siddhāvabhyupagamyamānāyāmayutasiddhyabhāvātkāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyete itīdaṃ duruktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3370_1: saṃyoga evābhyupagamyate na samavāya evaṃ kāraṇadravyeṇāpi saṃbandhaḥ saṃyoga eva syānna samavāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3371: nāpi saṃyogasya samavāyasya vā saṃbandhavyatirekeṇāstitve kiñcitpramāṇamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3375: yathaiko 'pi san devadatto loke svarūpaṃ saṃbandhirūpaṃ cāpekṣyānekaśabdapratyayabhāgbhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3376: manuṣyo brāhmaṇaḥ śrotriyo vadānyo bālo yuvā sthaviraḥ pitā putraḥ pautro bhrātā jāmāteti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3384: kalpitāḥ pradeśā aṇvātmamanasāṃ bhaviṣyantīti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:3387: iyānevāvidyamāno viruddho 'viruddho vārthaḥ kalpanīyo nāto 'dhika iti niyamahetvabhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3389: naca vaiśeṣikaiḥ kalpitebhyaḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ padārthebhyo 'nye 'dhikāḥ śataṃ sahasraṃ vārthā na kalpayitavyā iti nivārako heturasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3391: kaścitkṛpāluḥ prāṇināṃ duḥkhabahulaṃ saṃsāra eva mābhūditi kalpayet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3392: anyo vā vyasanī muktānāmapi punarutpattiṃ kalpayet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3395: dvābhyāṃ paramāṇubhyāṃ niravayavābhyāṃ sāvayavasya dvyaṇukasyākāśeneva saṃśleṣānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3397: kāryakāraṇadravyayorāśritāśrayabhāvo 'nyathā nopapadyata ityavaśyaṃ kalpyaḥ samavāya iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:3404: paramāṇūnāṃ paricchinnatvādyāvatyo diśaḥ ṣaḍaṣṭau daśa vā tāvadbhiravayavaiḥ sāvayavāste syuḥ sāvayavatvādanityāśceti nityatvaniravayavatvābhyupagamo bādhyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3405: yāṃstvaṃ digbhedabhedino 'vayavānkalpayasi ta eva paramāṇava iti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:3408: yathā pṛthivī dvyaṇukādyapekṣayā sthūlatamā vastubhūtāpi vinaśyati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3409: tataḥ sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ ca pṛthivyekajātīyakaṃ vinaśyati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3435: nityaḥ saṃbandhaḥ samavāya iti bhinnāni lakṣaṇāni /
GSP33brssgo2u:3448: abhede dravyaṃ guṇa iti śabdapratyayabhedaḥ kathaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3452: astu guṇādīnāṃ dravyatādātmyamiti vadantaṃ tārkikamanyaṃ pratyāha-tathā satīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3458: tathāpi tatkāryatvaṃ tadadhīnatvaṃ matvā vyabhicāraṃ śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3460: tathāpi tādātmyena pratīyamānatvasya hetorvivakṣitatvānna vyabhicāra ityāśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3464: śauklyasya paṭaniṣṭhatvāt paṭasya tantudeśatvāt paṭaśauklyayorapṛthagdeśatvābhāvācchuklaḥ paṭa iti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītirna syādityādyaṃ dūṣayati-apṛthagdeśatva iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3468: evaṃ ṣaṭpadārthā atyantabhinnā iti siddhānto 'nubhavavirodhena dūṣitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3473: kāraṇasya pṛthaksiddhatve 'kāryamapṛthaksiddhamityuktamupetya saṃbandho 'siddhasya siddhasya veti vikalpyādyaṃ dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate-siddhaṃ bhūtveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3474: satoraprāptayoḥ prāptiḥ saṃyoga ityabhyupagamāttantupaṭayorapi saṃyogāpattirityapasiddhāntaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3477: kiñca saṃbandhasyāpi saṃbandhe 'navasthānādasaṃbaddhasyāniyāmakatvāt saṃbandho 'pi durnirūpa ityāha-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3487: vilakṣaṇaśabdadhīgamyatvādityupalabdhighaṭitena-lakṣaṇena siṅgena prāptasya vastvantarasya saṃyogādeḥ saṃbandhivyatirekeṇānupalabdherabhāvo niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3490: saṃbandhasya saṃbandhyabhede saṃbandhinaḥ sadā sattvātsarvadā saṃbandhabuddhiprasaṅga iti śaṅkāṃ niṣedhati-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3491: parāpekṣayā nairantaryāvasthāyāmaṅgulyoḥ rūparūpiṇośca saṃbandhidhīḥ na svata ityuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3493: saṃpratyadṛṣṭavadātmanāṇūnāṃ saṃyogo 'ṇuṣu kriyāhetuḥ ātmamanoḥ saṃyogo buddhyādyasamavāyikāraṇaṃ nirasyate-tathāṇvātmeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3519_1: 'vayavāstvayocyante ta eva mama paramāṇavaste 'pi sāvayavāścet tadavayavā eveti evaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:3519_2: yataḥ paraṃ na vibhāgaḥ sa eva niravayavaḥ paramāṇuriti śaṅkati-yāṃstvamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3522: ayamarthaḥ-yatsavātmanāvibhāgāyogyaṃ vastu sa paramāṇuriti yadyucyeta tarhi brahmaṇa eva paramāṇusaṃjñā kṛtā syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:3524: yadi pṛthivyādijātīyo 'lpaparimāṇaviśrāntibhūmiryaḥ sa paramāṇurityucyeta tarhi tasya na mūlakāraṇatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3530: saṃprati niravayavadravyasya nāśahetvabhāvādātmavadavināśa ityāśaṅkya pūrvoktaṃ parihāraṃ smārayati-vinaśyanta ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3549: naca ta eva truṭināmāno jagaddhateva iti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo2u:3568: tatra te sarvāstitvavādino bāhyamāntaraṃ ca vastvabhyupagacchanti bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ ca cittaṃ caittaṃ ca,
GSP33brssgo2u:3572: catuṣṭaye ca pṛthivyādiparamāṇavaḥ svarasnehoṣṇasvabhāvāste pṛthivyādibhāvena saṃhanyanta iti manyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:3580: anyasya ca kasyaciccetanasya bhoktuḥ praśāsiturvā sthirasya saṃhanturanabhyupagamāt nirapekṣapravṛttyabhyupagame ca pravṛttyanuparamaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3600: parimāṇabhedena dehāderāśutaravināśāṅgīkārādardhavaināśiko vaiśeṣikastasya nirāsānantaraṃ sarvakṣaṇikavādī buddhistho nirasyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatimāha-vaiśeṣiketi /
GSP33brssgo2u:3601: 'nābhāva upalabdheḥ'iti nirasanīyasiddhāntādatra nirasyasiddhāntasya bhedaṃ vaktuṃ tatsiddhāntaṃ vibhajate-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3607: sautrāntiko vaibhāṣiko yogācārī mādhyamikaśceti catvāraḥ śiṣyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3608: teṣvādyayorbāhyārthānāṃ parokṣatvāparokṣatvavivāde 'pyastitvasaṃpratipattestayoḥ siddhāntamekīkṛtya nirasyata ityāha-tatra ye sarvāstitveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3611: tatra saṃdihyate kiṃ mānamūlo bhrāntimūlo vāyaṃ siddhānta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3612: tatra pramāṇamūla iti pūrvapakṣayan siddhāntaṃ tadīyaṃ darśayati-tatra bhūtamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3613: sthiraḥ prapañco brahmahetuka iti vedāntasiddhāntasya mānamūlakṣaṇikasiddhāntavirodhādasiddhiḥ pūrvapakṣe phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3615: pṛthivyādibhūtacatuṣṭayaṃ viṣayendriyātmakaṃ bhautikaṃ ca paramāṇusamudāya eva nāvayavyantaramiti matvā paramāṇūn vibhajate-catuṣṭaye ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3632: yathā vidyuditi teṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvamiti mānamūlo 'yaṃ siddhānta iti prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ yojayati-yo 'yamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3633: sargādau paramāṇūnāṃ ca skandhānāṃ ca svataḥsaṃghātastāvanna saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3636: saṃghāte dehākāre jāte vijñānaṃ vijñāne jāte saṃghāta ityanyonyāśrayāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3637: naca kṣaṇikavijñānādanyaḥ kaścijjīva īśvaro vā tvayābhyupagamyate yaḥ saṃghātakartā bhavet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3638: naca kartāramanapekṣyāṇavaḥ skandhāśca svayameva saṃghātārthaṃ pravartanta iti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo2u:3656: yadyapi bhoktā praśāsitā vā kaściccetanaḥ saṃhantā sthiro nābhyupagamyate tathāpyavidyādīnāmitaretarakāraṇatvādupapadyate lokayātrā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3658_0: te cāvidyādayo 'vidyā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ nāma rūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśā vedanā tṛṣṇā
GSP33brssgo2u:3658_1: upādānaṃ bhavo jātirjarā maraṇaṃ śokaḥ paridevanā duḥkhaṃ durmanastetyevañjātīyakā
GSP33brssgo2u:3658_2: itaretarahetukāḥ saugate samaye kvacitsaṃkṣiptā nirdiṣṭāḥ kvacitprapañcitāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3660: tadevamavidyādikalāpe parasparanimittanaimittikabhāvena ghaṭīyantravadaniśamāvartamāner'thākṣipta upapannaḥ saṃghāta iti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3666: yata itaretarapratyayatve 'pyavidyādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvamuttarottarasyotpattimātranimittaṃ bhavedbhavenna tu saṃghātotpatteḥ kiñcinnimittaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3668: atrocyate- yadi tāvadayamabhiprāyo 'vidyādayaḥ saṃghātamantareṇātmānamalabhamānā apekṣante saṃghātamiti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3670: tacca nityeṣvapyaṇuṣvabhyupagamyamāneṣvāśrayāśrayibhūteṣu ca bhokteṣu satsu na saṃbhavatītyuktaṃ vaiśeṣikaparīkṣāyām /
GSP33brssgo2u:3671: kimaṅga punaḥ kṣaṇikeṣvapyaṇuṣu bhoktṛrahiteṣvāśrayiśūnyeṣu vābhyupagamyamāneṣu saṃbhavet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3674: atha manyase saṃghātā evānādau saṃsāre saṃtatyānuvartante tadāśrayāścāvidyādaya iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3679: aniyamābhyupagame 'pi manuṣyapudgalaḥ kadācitkṣaṇena hastī bhūtvā devo vā punarmanuṣyo vā bhavediti prāpnuyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3681: apica yadbhogārthaḥ saṃghātaḥ syātsa nāsti sthiro bhokteti tavābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3682: tataśca bhogo bhogārtha eva sa nānyena prārthanīyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3683: tathā mokṣo mokṣārthaṃ eveti mumukṣuṇā nānyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3686: tasmāditaretarotpattimātranimittatvamavidyādīnāṃ yadi bhavedbhavatu nāma natu saṃghātaḥ siddhyet /
GSP33brssgo2u:3689: FN: kāryaṃ prati ayate gacchatīti pratyayaḥ kāraṇam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3690: vijñānaṃ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ rūpaṃ ceti ṣaḍāyatanāni yasyendriyajātasya tatṣaḍāyatanam /
GSP33brssgo2u:3704: vijñānaṃ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ rūpaṃ ceti ṣaḍāyatanāni yasyendriyajātasya tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3720: avidyādihetukā janmādayo janmādihetukāścāvidyādaya iti mitho hetuhetumadbhāvādarthātsaṃghātasiddhiriti śaṅkāmupasaṃharati-tadevamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3722: avidyādīnāmuttarottarahetutvamaṅgīkṛtya saṃghātahetvabhāvāt saṃghāto na syādityukte pūrvoktaṃ smārayati-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3723: kimavidyādayaḥ saṃghātasya gamakā utotpādakā iti vikalpyādye saṃghātasyotpādakaṃ kiñcidvācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:3727_0: yadā sthireṣvaṇuṣu saṃghātayogyeṣu kartṛṣu cādṛṣṭasahāyeṣu satsu jñānābhāvamātreṇa
GSP33brssgo2u:3732: svābhāvikaḥ khalvayaṃ saṃghātānāṃ hetuhetumadbhāvena pravāho na saṃhantāramapekṣate,
GSP33brssgo2u:3733: pūrvasaṃghātāśrayā avidyādaya uttarasaṃghātapravartakā iti nānyonyāśrayadoṣo 'pītyāśaṅkate-atha manyasa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3736: kiñca bhoktuḥ kṣaṇikatvapakṣe bhogāpavargavyavahāro 'pi durghaṭa ityāha-api ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3737: yo yadicchati sa tatkāle nāsti cedicchāvyarthā,
GSP33brssgo2u:3746: kṣaṇabhaṅgavādino 'yamabhyupagama uttarasminkṣaṇa utpadyamāne pūrvaḥ kṣaṇo nirudhyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3749: atha bhāvabhūtaḥ pariniṣpannāvasthaḥ pūrvakṣaṇa uttarakṣaṇasya heturityabhiprāyastathāpi nopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3751: atha bhāva evāsya vyāpāra ityabhiprāyastathāpi naivopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:3753: svabhāvoparāgābhyupagame ca hetusvabhāvasya phalakālāvasthāyitve sati kṣaṇabhaṅgābhyupagamatyāgaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3754: vinaiva vā svabhāvoparāgeṇa hetu phalabhāvamabhyupagacchataḥ sarvatra tatprāpteratiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3755: apicotpādanirodhau nāma vastunaḥ svarūpameva vā syātāmavasthāntaraṃ vā vastvantarameva vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3757: yadi tāvadvastunaḥ svarūpamevotpādanirodhau syātāṃ tato vastuśabda utpādanirodhaśabdau ca paryāyāḥ prāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3758: asthāsti kaścidviśeṣa iti manyetotpādanirodhaśabdābhyāṃ madhyavartino vastuna ādyantākhye avasthe abhilapyete iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:3762: yadi ca darśanādarśane vastuna utpādanirodhau syātām,
GSP33brssgo2u:3763: evamapi draṣṭṛdharmau tau na vastudharmāviti vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅga eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:3768: dvividho hi kāryasamutpādaḥ sugatasaṃmato hetvadhīnaḥ kāraṇasamudāyādhīnaśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3776: nanu kāryakāle vināśavyāptatve 'pi pūrvakṣaṇe sattvāt kṣaṇikārthasya hetutvamakṣatamiti śaṅkate-ayaṃ bhāveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3782: uktaṃ hi 'bhūtiryeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyata'iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3783: yeṣāṃ kṣaṇikābhāvānāṃ yā bhūtiḥ saiva kriyā kārakaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3802: caturvidhānhetūnpratītya cittacaittā utpadyanta itīyaṃ pratijñā hīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3804: athottarakṣaṇotpattiryāvattāvadavatiṣṭhate pūrvakṣaṇa iti brūyāttato yaugapadyaṃ hetuphalayoḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3810: viṣayakaraṇasahakārisaṃskārāścaturvidhā hetavastān pratītya prāpya cittaṃ rūpādivijñānaṃ caittāścittātmakāḥ sukhādayaśca jāyanta iti pratijñārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3816: sahetukatvapakṣe 'nvayikāraṇasya mṛdādeḥ kāryasahabhāvāpattyā kṣaṇikatvapratijñāhāniriti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe-athottarakṣaṇetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3823: apica vaināśikāḥ kalpayanti buddhibodhyaṃ trayādanyatsaṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3826: buddhipūrvakaḥ kila vināśo bhāvānāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodho nāma bhāṣyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:3834: etau hi pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhau saṃtānagocarau vā syātāṃ bhāvagocarau vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3838: nahi bhāvānāṃ niranvayo nirupākhyo vināśaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3844: pratīpā pratukūlaḥ saṃkhyā santaṃ bhāvamasantaṃ karomītyevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā tayā nirodhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3853: pratīpā pratikūlā saṃkhyā santaṃ bhāvamasantaṃ karomītyevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā,
GSP33brssgo2u:3859: tasmin saṃtāne caramakṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇāntaraṃ karoti vā na vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3904: yenāvaraṇabhāvo viśeṣyate tattarhi vastubhūtamevākāśaṃ manyamānasya saugatasya svābhyupagamavirodhaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:3905_0: saugate hi samaye 'pṛthivī bhagavaḥ kiṃsaṃniścayā' ityasminprativacanapravāhe pṛthivyādīnāmante
GSP33brssgo2u:3905_1: vāyuḥ 'kiṃsaṃniścayaḥ' ityasya praśnasya prativacanaṃ bhavati 'vāyurākāśasaṃniścayaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3908: apica nirodhadvayamākāśaṃ ca trayamapyetannirūpākhyamavastu nityaṃ ceti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:3914: kiṃ samyak niścaya āśrayo 'syā iti kiṃ saṃniścayā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3917: nanvāgamaprāmāṇye vipratipannānsugatānpratyākāśasya vastutvaṃ kathaṃ sidhyatītyata āha-vipratipannāniti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3922: yathaikaghaṭasattve 'pi ghaṭasāmānyābhāvo nāsti tathaikapakṣisattve 'pi mūrtadravyasāmānyābhāvātmakākāśo nāstyeveti pakṣyantarasaṃcāro na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3927: kiṃ samyak niśraya āśrayo 'syā iti kiṃsaṃniśrayā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3936: apica vaināśikaḥ sarvasya vastunaḥ kṣaṇikatāmabhyupayannupalabdhurapi kṣaṇikatāmabhyupeyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3941: kathaṃ hyahamado 'drākṣamidaṃ paśyāmīti ca pūrvottaradarśinyekasminnasati pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3942: apica darśanasmaraṇayoḥ kartaryekasminpratyakṣaḥ pratyabhijñāpratyayaḥ sarvasya lokasya prasiddho 'hamado 'drākṣamidaṃ paśyāmīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3943: yadi hi tayorbhinnaḥ kartā syāttato 'haṃ smārāmyadrākṣīdanya iti pratīyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3948: na nāhamityātmano darśanaṃ nirvṛttaṃ nihnute yathāgniranuṣṇo 'prakāśa iti vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:3949: tatraivaṃ satyekasya darśanasmaraṇalakṣaṇadvayasaṃbandhe kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamahāniraparihāryā vaināśikasya syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3950_1: pratipattīrā janmana ātmaikakartṛkāḥ pratisaṃdadhānaḥ kathaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgavādī vaināśiko
GSP33brssgo2u:3957: tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti pratyayāntaramevedaṃ na pūrvottarakṣaṇadvayagrahaṇanimittamiticet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:3961: pratyayāntarameva cetsādṛśyaviṣayaṃ syāttenedaṃ sadṛśamiti vākyaprayogo 'narthakaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3963: yadā hi lokaprasiddhaḥ padārthaḥ parīkṣakairna parigṛhyate tadā svapakṣasiddhiḥ parapakṣadoṣo vobhayamapyucyamānaṃ parīkṣakāṇāmātmanaśca yathārthatvena na buddhisaṃtānamārohati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3968: bhavedapi kadācidbāhyavastuni vipralambhasaṃbhavāttadevedaṃ syāttatsadṛśaṃ veti saṃdehaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3969: upalabdhari tu saṃdeho 'pi na kadācidbhavati sa evāhaṃ syāṃ tatsadṛśo veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3970: ya evāhaṃpūrvedyuradrākṣaṃ sa evāhamadya smarāmīti niścitatadbhāvopalambhāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:3974: kṣaṇikatve jñānadvayānusaṃdhānaṃ ca na syādityāha-kathaṃ hyahamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3976: yo 'hamadaḥ pūrvamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhamadya tatsmarāmīti pratyabhijñānākāro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3980: draṣṭṛsmartrorbhede 'haṃ smarāmi anyo 'drākṣīditi pratītiḥ syādityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-yatraivamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3982: smarāmyahamanyo 'drākṣīditi pratyayo yatra tatra bhinnameva kartāraṃ loko 'vagacchatītyavivādamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:3983: prakṛtapratyabhijñāyāṃ tādṛśabhedapratyayasya bādhakasyādarśanādātmasthāyitvaṃ durvāramityāha-iha tvahamada iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3984: yathāgnerauṣṇyādikaṃ na bādhate kaścittathā nāhamadrākṣamiti pūrvadarśanaṃ na nihnuta ityanena bādhābhāvāt pratyabhijñā prametyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:3985: tathā draṣṭṛsmartroraikye sati sthāyitvaṃ phalitamityāha-tatraivaṃ satīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3989: sādṛśyajñānasya dharmipratiyogijñānādhīnatvāt sthirasya jñāturasattvānna sādṛśyajñānaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:3993: kiṃ tarhi kaścideṣa vikalpaḥ svākārameva bāhyatvena viṣayīkurvāṇaḥ kṣaṇāntarāsparśī,
GSP33brssgo2u:3995: atra vaktavyaṃ sādṛśyapratyaye tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti vastutrayaṃ bhāsate na veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:3999: atha bhāsate vastutrayaṃ tacca pratyayābhinnameva na bāhyamiti cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:4003: vastutrayaṃ jñeyaṃ sādṛśyapratyayādbhinnaṃ sarvalokaprasiddhaṃ taccennāṅgīkriyate sthāyidraṣṭṛprasaṅgabhayena,
GSP33brssgo2u:4004: tarhi tattadākārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikavijñānānāṃ mitho vārtānabhijñatvādekasmin dharmiṇi viruddhānekapakṣasphuraṇātmakavipratipattyasaṃbhavāt svapakṣasādhanādivyavahāro lupyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:4006: tathā ca tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti bāhyārthayorjñānapūrvakaṃ sādṛśyaṃ jānata ātmanaḥ sthāyitvaṃ durvāramityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4012: na cedānīṃ ghaṭa iti pratyakṣamavartamānakālāsattvaṃ ghaṭasya gocarayadvartamānakṣaṇamātrasatvarūpe kṣaṇikatve mānamiti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo2u:4018: kiñca sādṛśyaṃ pratyabhijñāyāṃ doṣayatā nimittaṃ viṣayatayā vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4025: so 'hamiti pratyabhijñāyā bhramatvaṃ nirasya saṃśayatvaṃ nirasyati-bhavediti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4026: jaḍārthe pratyabhijñāte 'pi bādhasaṃbhāvanayā saṃśayaḥ kadācit syānnātmanītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4043: nahi bījādīnāmupamṛditānāṃ yo 'bhāvastasyābhāvasya śaśaviṣāṇādīnāṃ ca niḥsvabhāvatvāviśeṣādabhāvatve kaścidviśeṣo 'sti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4044: yena bījādevāṅ kuro jāyate kṣīrādeva dadhītyevañjātīyakaḥ kāraṇiśeṣaṇādibhyupagamor'thavānsyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4045: nirviśeṣasya tvabhāvasya kāraṇatvābhyupagame śaśaviṣāṇādibhyo 'pyaṅ kurādayo jāyeran /
GSP33brssgo2u:4047: yadi punarabhāvasyāpi viśeṣo 'bhyupagamyetotpalādīnāmiva nīlatvādistato viśeṣavattvādevābhāvasya bhāvatvamutpalādivatprasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4053: sarvasya ca vastunaḥ svena svena rūpeṇa bhāvātmanaivopalabhyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4059: yeṣvapi bījādiṣu svarūpopamarde lakṣyate teṣvarapi nāsāvupamṛdyamānā pūrvāvasthottarāvasthāyāḥ kāraṇamabhyupagamyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:4063: paramāṇubhyaśca bhūtabhautikalakṣaṇaḥ samudāya utpadyata ityabhyupagamya punarabhāvādbhāvotpattiṃ kalpayadbhirabhyupagatamapahnuvānairvaināśikaiḥ sarvo loka ākulīkriyate // 26 //
GSP33brssgo2u:4064: abhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇavadatyantāsannityaṅgīkṛtya mṛdādināśādasato ghaṭādikaṃ jāyate iti sugatā vadanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4066: na kevalaṃ balādāpadyate kintu svayaṃ darśayanti ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:4072: nityasya niratiśayasya kāryaśaktatve tatkāryāṇi sarvāṇyekasminneva kṣaṇe syuḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4095: naca śaktasya sahakāryapekṣā na yukteti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4130: tasmādbhrāntimūlena kṣaṇikabāhyārthavādena kūṭasthanityabrahmasamanvayasya na virodha iti siddham //27//
GSP33brssgo2u:4136: evaṃ bāhyārtavādamāśritya samudāyāprāptyādiṣu dūṣaṇeṣūdbhāviteṣu vijñānavādī bauddha idānīṃ pratyavatiṣṭhite /
GSP33brssgo2u:4137: keṣāñcitkila bāhye vastunyabhiniveśamālakṣya tadanurodhena bāhyārthavādaprakriyeyaṃ virocitā /
GSP33brssgo2u:4140: tasmiṃśca vijñānavāde buddhyārūḍhena rūpeṇāntastha eva pramāṇaprameyavyavahāraḥ sarva upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4142: kathaṃ punaravagamyate 'ntastha evāyaṃ sarvavyavahāro na vijñānavyatirikto bāhyor'tho 'stīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4144: sa hi bāhyortho 'bhyupagamyamānaḥ paramāṇavo vā syustatsamūhā vā stambhādayaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4149: apicānubhāvamātreṇa sādhāraṇātmano jñānasya jāyamānasya yo 'yaṃ prativiṣayaṃ pakṣapātaḥ stambhajñānaṃ kuḍyajñānaṃ ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamiti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4163: anādau hi saṃsāre bījāṅ kuravadvijñānānāṃ vāsanānāṃ cānyonyanimittanaimittikabhāvena vaicitryaṃ na vipratiṣidhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4172: upalabhyate hi pratipratyayaṃ bāhyor'thaḥ stambhaḥ kuḍyaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4174: yathā hi kaścidbhuñjāno bhujitasādhyāyāṃ tṛptau svayamanubhūyamānāyāmevaṃ brūyānnāhaṃ bhuñje na vā tṛpyāmīti,
GSP33brssgo2u:4175: tadvadindriyasaṃnikarṣeṇa svayamupalabhamāna eva bāhyamarthaṃ nāhamupalabhe naca so 'stīti bruvankathamupādeyavacanaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4176: nanu nāhamahaṃ bravīmi na kañcidarthamupalabha iti kiṃ tūpalabdhivyatiriktaṃ nopalabha iti bravīmi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4181: upalabdhiviṣayatvenaiva tu stambhakuḍyādīnsarve laukikā upalabhante yatpratyācakṣāṇā api bāhyārthameva vyācakṣate yadantarjñeyarūpaṃ tadbahirvadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4182: te 'pi sarvalokaprasiddhāṃ bahiravabhāsamānāṃ saṃvidaṃ pratilabhamānāḥ pratyākhyātukāmāśca bāhyamarthaṃ bahirvadati vatkāraṃ kurvanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4185: tasmādyathānubhavaṃ tattvamabhyupagacchadbhirbahirevāvabhāsata iti yuktamabhyupagantuṃ natu bahirvadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4187: nāyaṃ sādhuradhyavasāyo yataḥ pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttipūrvakau saṃbavāsaṃbhavāvavadhāryete na punaḥ saṃbhavāsaṃbhavapūrvike pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttī /
GSP33brssgo2u:4189: yattu na kenacidapi pramāṇenopalabhyate tanna saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:4190: iha tu yathāsvaṃ sarvaireva pramāṇairbāhyor'tha upalabhyamānaḥ kathaṃ vyatirekāvyatirekādivikalpairna saṃbhavatītyucyetopalabdhereva /
GSP33brssgo2u:4194: ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi pratyayaviṣayayorupāyopeyabhāvahetuko nābhedahetuka ityabyupagantavyam /
