GSP33brssgo2u:4761: āgacchantaścaite jīvāvayavāḥ kutaḥ prādurbhavantyapagacchantaśca kva vā līyanta iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4764: nāpi kaścidanyaḥ sādhāraṇo 'sādhāraṇo vā jīvānāmavayavādhāro nirūpyate pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4769_1: coditāyāṃ punaḥ paryāyeṇa parimāṇānavasthāne 'pi srotaḥsaṃtānanityatānyāyenātmano nityatā syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4770: yathā raktapaṭānāṃ vijñānānavasthāne 'pi tatsaṃtānanityatā tadvaddhisicāmapītyāśaṅkyānena sūtreṇottaramucyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4776: evaṃ jīvāvayavā nityā itimate dehamānatvaṃ nirastam /
GSP33brssgo2u:4777: saṃprati jīvasya kecideva kūṭasthā avayavā anye tvāgamāpāyina iti śaṅkate-atheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4785: ādye kalpe doṣāntaraṃ vadan kalpāntaramādāya dūṣayati-kiñceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4789: kiñcātmana āgamāpāyiśīlāvayavatve sati kiyanta āyāntyavayavāḥ kiyanto 'payantītyajñānādātmaniścayābhāvādanirmokṣaḥ syādityāha-kiñceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4793: gotvavatpratyekaṃ samāptāvekasmiñcharīra ātmanānātvaṃ syādato na dehaparimāṇatvasāvayavatve ātmana ityupasaṃharati-ata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4800: sig vastraṃ vigataṃ yebhyaste visico digambarāsteṣāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4806: anatireke janmādivikāro vināśo muktyabhāva ityuktadoṣaprasaṅgāt saṃtānātmapakṣo 'nupapanna iti sūtrārthaḥ //35//
GSP33brssgo2u:4818: yaṃ sthūlaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā dehaṃ gṛhṇāti taddehaparimāṇa eva jīva iti niyamaṃ dūṣayati-antyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4840: yadi punaraviśeṣeṇeśvarakāraṇavādamātramiha pratiṣidhyeta pūrvottaravirodhādvyāhatābhivyāhāraḥ sūtrakāra ityetadāpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:4841: tasmādaprakṛtiradhiṣṭhātā kevalaṃ nimittakāraṇamīśvara ityeṣa pakṣo vedāntavihitabrahmaikatvapratipakṣatvādyatnenātra pratiṣidhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4843: kecittāvatsāṃkhyayogavyapāśrayāḥ kalpayanti pradhānapuruṣayoradhiṣṭhātā kevalaṃ nimittakāraṇamīśvara itaretaravilakṣaṇāḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvarā iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4844: māheśvarāstu manyante kāryakāraṇayogavidhiduḥkhāntāḥ pañca padārthāḥ paśupatineśvareṇa paśupāśavimokṣaṇāyopadiṣṭāḥ paśupatirīśvaro nimittakāraṇamiti varṇayanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4845: tathā vaiśeṣikādayo 'pi kecitkathañcitsvaprakriyānusāreṇa nimittakāraṇamīśvara iti varṇayanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4860: nahi kaścidadoṣaprayuktaḥ svārthe parārthe vā pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:4861: svārthaprayukta eva ca sarvo janaḥ parārthe 'pi pravartata ityevamapyasāmañjasyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4872: luñcitakeśamatanirasanānantaraṃ jaṭādhāriśaivamataṃ buddhisthaṃ nirākriyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatimāha-idānīmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4873: sāmānyata īśvaranirāsa evātra kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkate-taditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4877_0: advitīyabrahmaprakṛtikaṃ jagaditi vadato vedāntasamanvayasya kartaiveśvaro naprakṛtiriti
GSP33brssgo2u:4877_1: śaivādimatena virodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe tanmatasya mānamūlatvādvirodhe sati vedāntoktadvayabrahmāsiddhiriti
GSP33brssgo2u:4909: tathāca loke yādṛśāḥ kartāro dṛṣṭāntādṛśā eva jagatkartāro rāgadveṣādimantaḥ sidhyeyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4910: yadi loke vicitraprāsādādikarturekatvādyadarśane 'pi jagatkartari lāghavādekatvaṃ nityajñānaṃ nirdeṣatvaṃ ca kalpyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:4915: asmākaṃ tvapauruṣeyatayā svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvayā śrutyā svaprameyabodhane dṛṣṭāntānapekṣayā bhavatyeva laukikakartṛviparītādvitīyakartrupādānātmakasarvajñanirdeṣeśvaranirṇayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4916: nirṇīte ca tasmin dharmigrāhakamānabādhānna rāgādidoṣāpādānasyāvakāśa ityānumānikeśvaravādibhyo vaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:4918: yadi karturupādānatvamadṛṣṭatvānna kalpyate tarhi nirdeṣatvasyāpyadṛṣṭatvādyo viṣamakārī sa doṣavāniti vyāptidṛṣṭeśca jagatkartā doṣavān syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4925: yathā śabdo yadi kṛtakatvena hetunā ghaṭavadanityaḥ syāttarhi tenaiva hetunā sāvayavo 'pi syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4926: na hyanityatvasya vyāpakaṃ sāvayavatvaṃ gandhādau vyabhicārāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4927: nanu prāṇikarmaprerita īśvaro viṣamaphalān prāṇinaḥ karoti na svecchayeti śaṅkate-prāṇīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4930: atītakarmaṇā prerita īśvaro vartamānaṃ karma tatphalāya prerayatītyanāditvātpreryaprerakabhāvasya nānupapattiriti śaṅkate-nānāditvāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:4934: tato 'pyatītakarmapreriteśvarapreritaṃ tadeveśvaraṃ vartamāne karmaṇi phaladānāya prerayati cet / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:4938: yattu phaladāne īśvarasya karma nimittamātraṃ na prerakamiti noktadoṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4951: udāsīnaḥ pravartaka iti ca vyāhṛtamiti yogānpratyāha-puruṣeti //37//
GSP33brssgo2u:4967: apicāgamabalena brahmavādī kāraṇādisvarūpaṃ nirūpayatīti nāvaśyaṃ tasya yathādṛṣṭameva sarvamabhyupagantavyamiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4968: parasya tu dṛṣṭāntabalena kāraṇādisvarūpaṃ nirūpayato yathādṛṣṭameva sarvamabhyupagantavyamityayamastyatiśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4976: sa ca saṃyegaḥ samavāyo vā nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:4977: kāryabalāt preraṇayogyātvākhyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpyatāmityata āha-nāpyanya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:4978: īśvarapreritapradhānakāryaṃ jagaditi siddhaṃ cet saṃbandhakalpanā syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:4995: sa hi parikalpyamānaḥ kumabhakāra iva mṛdādīni pradhānādīnyadhiṣṭhāya pravartayet /
GSP33brssgo2u:4997: nahyapratyakṣaṃ rūpādihīnaṃ ca pradhānamīśvarasyādhiṣṭheyaṃ saṃbhavati mṛdādivailakṣaṇyāt // 39 //
GSP33brssgo2u:5008: yathā karaṇagrāmaṃ cakṣurādikamapratyakṣaṃ rūpādihīnaṃ ca puruṣo 'dhitiṣṭhatyevaṃ pradhānamapīśvaro 'dhiṣṭhāsyatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5014: sādhiṣṭhāno hi loke saśarīro rājā rāṣṭrasyeśvaro dṛśyate na niradhiṣṭhānaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5015: ataśca taddṛṣṭāntavaśenādṛṣṭamīśvaraṃ kalpayitumicchata īśvarasyapi kiñciccharīraṃ karaṇāyatanaṃ varṇayitavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5021: atha lokadarśanānusāreṇeśvarasyāpi kiñcitkāraṇānāmāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ kāmena kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5033: naca yadyenādhiṣṭheyaṃ tattadīyabhogahetutve sati pratyakṣamiti vyatirekavyāptau karaṇeṣu vyabhicāratādavasthyamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5041: īśvare tu pradhānakṛtāste na dṛśyanta ityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5046: yaḥ pravartakaścetanaḥ sa śarīrīti loke vyāptidṛṣṭerīśvarasya ca śarīrānupapatterna pravartakatvamiti sūtrārthamāha-itaśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5051: naca nityaṃ śarīraṃ sargātprāgapi saṃbhavatīti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5054: jīvasyaiva śarīraṃ bhautikamīśvarasya tu svecchānirmitaṃ prāgapi syādityāśaṅkāṃ nirasyati-karaṇavaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:5064: anantaṃ ca pradhānamanantāśca puruṣā mitho bhinnā abhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5065: tatra sarvajñeśvareṇa pradhānasya puruṣāṇāmātmanaśceyattā paricchidyeta vā na vā paricchidyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5069: yaddhi loka iyattāparicchinnaṃ vastu paṭādi tadantavaddṛṣṭaṃ tathā pradhānapuruṣeśvaratrayamapīyattāparicchinnatvādantavatsyāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5073: tataśceyattāparicchinnānāṃ madhye ye saṃsāriṇaḥ saṃsārānmucyante teṣāṃ saṃsāro 'ntavānsaṃsāritvaṃ ca teṣāmantavat /
GSP33brssgo2u:5074: evamitareṣvapi krameṇa mucyamāneṣu saṃsārasya saṃsāriṇāṃ cāntavattvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5075: pradhānaṃ ca savikāraṃ puruṣārthamīśvarasyādhiṣṭheyaṃ saṃsāritvenābhimataṃ tacchūnyatāyāmīśvaraḥ kimadhitiṣṭhet /
GSP33brssgo2u:5079: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpo 'bhyupagamyeta na pradhānasya puruṣāṇāmātmanaśceyatteśvareṇa paricchidyata iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:5084: evamīśvarasya śuṣkatarkeṇa kartṛtvanirṇayo netyupapādya nityatvasarvajñatvanirṇayo 'pi na saṃbhavatītyāha sūtrakāraḥ-antavatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5089: yadyapi saṃkhyāvatvamātraṃ hetuḥ saṃbhavati tathāpi sarvajñaniścayena hetvasiddhinirāsaṃ dyotayituṃ niścitapadam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5096: nanu pradhānapuruṣeśvarāstraya iti jñāte 'pi jīvānāmānantyātkathaṃ saṃkhyāniścayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5101: māṣarāśivatkeṣāñcijjīvānāṃ saṃghastadbandhaśca naśyedityevaṃ sarvamukteridānīṃ śūnyaṃ jagatsyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5115: tasmāt kevalakartrīśvaravādasya nirmūlatvānna tartrupādānādvayeśvarasamanvayavirodha iti siddham //41//
GSP33brssgo2u:5122: yeṣāṃ punaḥ prakṛtiścādhiṣṭhātā cobhayātmakaṃ kāraṇamīśvaro 'bhimatasteṣāṃ pakṣaḥ pratyākhyāyayate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5123: nanu śrutisamāśrayaṇenāpyevaṃrūpa eveśvaraḥ prāṅnirdhāritaḥ prakṛtiścādhiṣṭhātā ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5129: sa caturdhātmānaṃ pravibhajya pratiṣṭhito vāsudevavyūharūpeṇa saṃkarṣaṇavyūharūpeṇa pradyumnavyūharūpeṇāniruddhavyūharūpeṇa ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:5134: teṣāṃ vāsudevaḥ parā parakṛtiritare saṃkarṣaṇādayaḥ kāryam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5135: tamitthaṃbhūtaṃ parameśvaraṃ bhagavantamabhigamanopādānejyāsvādhyāyayogairvarṣaśatamiṣṭvā kṣīṇakleśo bhagavantameva pratipadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5136: tatra yattāvaducyeta yo 'sau nārāyaṇaḥ paro 'vyaktātprasiddhaḥ paramātmā sarvātmā sa ātmānātmānamanekadhā vyūhyāvasthita iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:5143: yatpunaridamucyate vāsudevātsaṃkarṣaṇa utpadyate saṃkarṣaṇācca pradyumnaḥ pradyumnāccāniruddha iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5144: atra brūmaḥ - na vāsudevasaṃjñakātparamātmanaḥ saṃkarṣaṇasaṃjñakasya jīvasyotpattiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5161: vedāviruddhāṃśamaṅgīkṛtya vedaviruddhaṃ jīvotpattyaṃśaṃ nirākartumadhikaraṇārambha ityāha-ucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5163: sa kiṃ jīvotpattyādyaṃśe mānaṃ naveti saṃdehe bādhānupalambhānmānamiti pūrvapakṣayati-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5171: yathoktavyūhavantaṃ sarvaprakṛtiṃ nirañjanaṃ vijñānarūpaṃ paramātmānamiti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:5189: yasmānna hi loke karturdevadattādeḥ karaṇaṃ paraśvādyutpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5190: varṇayanti ca bhāgavatāḥ karturjīvātsaṃkarṣaṇasaṃjñakātkaraṇaṃ manaḥ pradyumnasaṃjñakamutpadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5194: jīvasyotpattiṃ nirasya jīvānmanasa utpattiṃ nirasyati-naca karturiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5195: yasmāt kartuḥ karaṇotpattirna dṛśyate tasmādasaṃgatā kalpanetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5196: siddhānāṃ karaṇānāṃ prayoktā karteti prasiddhyartho hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5198: nanu loke kaścicchilpivaraḥ kuṭhāraṃ nirmāya tena vṛkṣaṃ chinattīti dṛṣṭamiti cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:5202: vinaiva karaṇaṃ kartṛtve vā manovaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ //43//
GSP33brssgo2u:5207_0: athāpi syānna caite saṃkarṣaṇādayo jīvādibhāvenābhipreyante kiṃ tarhīśvarā evaite
GSP33brssgo2u:5207_2: vāsudevā evaite sarve nirdeṣā niradhiṣṭhāna niravadyāśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5209: atrocyate- evamapi tadapratiṣedha utpattyasaṃbhavasyāpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnotyevāmutpattyasaṃbhavo doṣaḥ prakārāntareṇetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5211: yadi tāvadayamabhiprāyaḥ parasparabhinnā evaite vāsudevādayaścatvāra īśvarāstulyadharmāṇo naiṣāmekātmakatvamastīti,
GSP33brssgo2u:5216: athāyamabhiprāya ekasyaiva bhagavata ete catvāro vyūhāstulyadharmāṇa iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:5218: nahi vāsudevātsaṃkarṣaṇasyotpattiḥ saṃbhavati saṃkarṣaṇācca pradyumnasya pradyumnāccāniruddhasya,
GSP33brssgo2u:5223: vāsudevā eva hi sarve vyūhā nirviśeṣā iṣyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:5244: kiṃ catvāraḥ svatantrā bhinnā eva utaikasya vikāratvenābhinnāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5246: dvitīye vikārāḥ prakṛtitulyā vā nyūnā vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:5249: yadi nyūnā api bhagavato vyūhāstadā catuṣṭvavyāghāta ityāha-nacaita iti //44//
GSP33brssgo2u:5258: caturṣu vedeṣu paraṃ śreyo 'labdhvā śāṇḍilya idaṃ śāstramadhigatavānityādivedanindādarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5262: ādipadāt pradyumnāniruddhau bhinnāvātmana ityuktvātmana evaite iti viruddhoktigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5267: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 2 //
GSP33brssgo2u:5268: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brssgo2u:5269: iti śrīparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brssgo2u:5270: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brssgo2u:5282: vedānteṣu tatra tatra bhinnaprasthānā utpattiśrutaya upalabhyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:5289: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadākāśamāśritya cintyate kimasyākāśasyotpattirastyuta nāstīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5298: iti ca pañcānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ madhyamaṃ teja ādiṅkṛtvā trayāṇāṃ tejobannānāmutpattiḥ śrāvyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5307: yathā mithovirodhāt pūrvāparavirodhācca parapakṣā upekṣyāstathā śrutipakṣo 'pi upekṣya iti śaṅkotthāne pādadvayasyārambhāt pūrvapādena dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatiriti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5310: jīvasya prāṇānāṃ cotpattiṃ 'sarva eta ātmano vyuccaranti'iti vājinaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5319_1: saṃdehe yadyutpattistadā vākyabhedena virodhādaprāmāṇyamanayoḥ śrutyoriti pūrvapakṣayiṣyannādāvanutpattikṣamekadeśi
GSP33brssgo2u:5328: taittirīyakā hi samāmananti- 'satyaṃ jñānamantaṃ brahma' iti prakṛtya 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5338: nanu sakṛcchrutasyāpi kartuḥ kartavyadvayena saṃbandho dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:5342: prathamajatvaṃ hi chāndogye tejaso 'vagamyate taittirīyake cākāśasya /
GSP33brssgo2u:5346: ityatrāpi tasmādākāśaḥ saṃbhūtastasmāttejaḥ saṃbhūtamiti sakṛcchrutasyāpādānasya saṃbhavanasya ca viyattejobhyāṃ yugapatsaṃbandhānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5352: ekasya yugapatkāryadvayāsaṃbandhe 'pi krameṇa saṃbandhasaṃbhavādekavākyateti mukhyasiddhāntī śaṅkate-nanu sakṛditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:5360: kiñca satpadārtha ātmā chāndogye tejasa upādānaṃ śrūyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:5368: yā tvitarā viyadutpattivādinī śrutirudāhṛtā sā gauṇī bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5374: dravyasya caikajātīyakamanekaṃ ca dravyaṃ samavāyikāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5376: yasminsamavāyikāraṇe satyasamavāyikāraṇe ca tatsaṃyoga ākāśa utpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5378: utpattimatāṃ ca tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ pūrvottarakāyorviśeṣaḥ saṃbhāvyate prāgutpatteḥ prakāśādikāryaṃ na babhūva paścācca bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5382: tasmādyathā loka ākāśaṃ kurvākāśo jāta ityevañjātīyako gauṇaḥ prayogo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:5383: yathāca ghaṭākāśaḥ karakākāśo gṛhākāśa ityekasyāpyākāśasyaivañjātīyako bhedavyapadeśo gauṇo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:5386: evaṃ śrutyorvirodhādaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣe prāpte sa eva viyadanutpattivādi svamatena prāmāṇyaṃ brūta ityāha-asminniti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5387: evamādhyāyasamāpteradhikaraṇeṣu prathamaṃ virodhācchrutyaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ tata ekadeśisiddhāntaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5388: paścānmukhyasiddhānte śrutīnāmavirodhenaika vākyatayā brahmaṇi samanvayasiddhiriti phalaṃ kramaścetyavagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5393: saṃyoga eva hi dravyasyāsamavāyikāraṇamataḥ samavāyyasamavāyinorabhāvānna hetvasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5415: ākāśavatsarvagataśca nityaḥ iti cākāśena brahma sarvagatatvanityatvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāmupamimāna ākāśasyāpi tau dharmau sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5417: 'sa yathānanto 'yamākāśa evamananta ātmā veditavyaḥ' iti codāharaṇam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5434: kathaṃ punarekasya saṃbhūtaśabdasya 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:5435: ityasminnadhikāre pareṣu tejaḥprabhṛtiṣvanuvartamānasya mukhyatvaṃ saṃbhavatyākāśe ca gauṇatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5436: ata uttaramucyate- syāccaikasyāpi saṃbhūtaśabdasya viṣayaviśeṣavaśādgauṇo mukhyasya prayogo brahmaśabdavat /
GSP33brssgo2u:5439: ityasminnadhikāre 'nnādiṣu gauṇaḥ prayoga ānande ca mukhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5440: yathā ca tapasi brahmavijñānasādhane brahmaśabdo bhaktyā prayujyate 'ñjasā tu vijñeye brahmaṇi tadvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:5443: nanu nabhasā dvitīyena sadvitīyaṃ brahma prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5444: kathaṃ ca brahmaṇi vidite sarvaṃ viditaṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:5446_0: yathā loke kaścitkumbhakārakule pūrvedyurmṛddaṇḍacakrādīni copalabhyāparedyuśca nānāvidhānyamatrāṇi
GSP33brssgo2u:5446_1: prasāritānyupalabhya brūyānmṛdevaikākinī pūrvedyurāsīditi sa ca tayāvadhāraṇayā mṛtkāryajātameva
GSP33brssgo2u:5448: yathā mṛdo 'matraprakṛteḥ kumbhakāro 'dhiṣṭhātā dṛśyate naivaṃ brahmaṇo jagatprakṛteranyo 'dhikṛtāstīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5449: naca nabhasāpi dvitīyena sadvitīyaṃ brahma prasajyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5452: sargakāle tu brahma jagadutpādayituṃ yatate stimitamitaravattiṣṭati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5459: ato brahmaṇā tatkāryeṇa ca vijñātena sahavijñātamevākāśaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5460: yathā kṣīrapūrṇe ghaṭe katicidabbindavaḥ prakṣiptāḥ santaḥ kṣīragrahaṇenaiva gṛhītā bhavanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:5497: iti, 'ātmani khalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāta idaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' (bṛ. 4.5.6)
GSP33brssgo2u:5498: iti, 'kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati' (muṇḍa. 1.1.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:5499: iti, 'na kācana maddhahirdhā vidyāsti' iti caivaṃrūpā prativedāntaṃ pratijñā vijñāyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5502: vyatireke hi satyekavijñānena sarvaṃ vijñāyata itīyaṃ pratijñā hrīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5503: sa cāvyatireka evamupapadyate yadi kṛtsnaṃ vastujātamekasmādbrahmaṇa utpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5505: tathāhi- 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' iti pratijñāya mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaiḥ kāryakāraṇābhedapratipādanaparaiḥ pratijñaiṣā samarthyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5509: ityevaṃ kāryajātaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pradarśyāvyatirekaṃ pradarśayanti- 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvam' (chā. 6.8.7)
GSP33brssgo2u:5511: tadyadyākāśaṃ na brahmakāryaṃ syānna brahmaṇi vijñāta ākāśaṃ vijñāyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:5514: tathāhi- prativedāntaṃ te te śabdāstena tena dṛṣṭāntena tāmeva pratijñāṃ khyapayanti 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā' (bṛ. 2.4.6)
GSP33brssgo2u:5520: viyadutpattiviṣayaśrutyantarasya darśitatvāt 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5529: tejaḥsargasya taittirīyake tṛtīyatvaśravaṇāt 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5533: śakyā tu pariṇetuṃ chāndogyaśrutistadākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā 'tattejo 'sṛjata' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5534: nahīyaṃ śrutistejojanipradhānā satī śrutyantaraprasiddhāmākāśasyotpattiṃ vārayituṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5538: nacāsmābhiḥ sakṛcchrutasya sraṣṭuḥ sraṣṭavyadvayasaṃbandho 'bhipreyate śrutyantaravaśena sraṣṭavyāntaropasaṃgrahāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5540: ityatra sākṣādeva sarvasya vastujātasya brahmajatvaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na pradeśāntaravihitaṃ tejaḥpramukhamutpattikramaṃ vārayati,
GSP33brssgo2u:5541: evaṃ tejaso 'pi brahmajatvaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na śrutyantaravihitaṃ nabhaḥpramukhamutpattikramaṃ vārayitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:5549: nahi tejaḥprāthamyānurodhena śrutyantaraprasiddho viyatpadārthaḥ parityaktavyo bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:5551: apica 'tattejo 'sṛjata' iti nātra kramasya vācakaḥ kaścicchabdo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5553: sa ca 'vāyoragniḥ' ityanena śrutyantaraprasiddhena krameṇa nivāryate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5556: apica chāndogye 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' ityetāṃ pratijñāṃ vākyopakrame śrutāṃ samarthayitumasamāmnātamapi viyadutpattāvupasaṃkhyātavyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5557: kimaṅga punastaittirīyake samāmnātaṃ nabho na saṃgṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5558: yaccoktamākāśasya sarveṇānanyadeśakālatvādbrahmaṇā tatkāryaiśca saha viditameva tadbhavatyato na pratijñā hīyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:5564: kṣīrodakanyāyena ca sarvavijñānaṃ kalpyamānaṃ na samyagvijñānaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5569: naca svakāryāpekṣayedaṃ vastvekadeśaviṣayaṃ sarvavijñānamekamevādvitīyatāvadhāraṇaṃ ceti nyāyyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5570_0: mṛdādiṣvapi hi tatsaṃbhavānna tadapūrvavadupanyasitavyaṃ bhavati 'śvetaketo yannu
GSP33brssgo2u:5570_1: somyedaṃ mahāmanā anūcānamānī stabdho 'syuta tamādeśamaprākṣyo 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:5571: tasmādaśeṣavastuviṣayamevedaṃ sarvavijñānaṃ sarvasya brahmakāryatāpekṣayopanyasyata iti draṣṭavyam // 6 //
GSP33brssgo2u:5572: evamākāśasyānutpattau sarvaśrutīnāmavirodha ityekadeśisiddhāntaḥ prāptastaṃ mukhyasiddhāntī dūṣayati-pratijñeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5578: tathāpi jīvādivadanutpannasyāpi nabhaso brahmaṇi kalpitatvenāvyatirekātpratijñāsiddhiḥ kiṃ na syāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:5586: tasmātpratijñāsiddhaye ākāśasya kāryatvenaivāvyatireko vācya iti dṛṣṭāntasṛṣṭisārvātmyaśabdānāha-tathā hīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5591: evamākāśotpattikathanādekadeśimate dūṣite śrutyaprāmāṇyavādī svoktaṃ smārayati-satyaṃ darśitamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5596: vastuni vikalpāsaṃbhavena tayoḥ śākhābhedena prāthamyavyavasthāyā ayogāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:5597: naikavākyateti prāpte mukhya eva dūṣayati-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5612: nanvekasya sraṣṭuranekārthasaṃbandhavadvākyasyāpyanekārthatā kiṃ na syādityata ā-sraṣṭā tviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5615: nānārthakaprayoge tu paya ānayetyādāvāvṛttyā vākyabheda eva /
GSP33brssgo2u:5618: ekasya śabdasyāvṛttiṃ vinānekārthatvaṃ nāsti cedasṛjateti śabdasya chāndogya upasaṃhṛtākāśādisaṃbandhārthamāvṛttidoṣaḥ syādityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5622: śrutyantarasthaḥ kramaḥ śrutyantare grāhya ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-yathāceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5624: tejaḥprāthamyasvīkāre ākāśasargo dharmi taddharmaḥ prāthamyaṃ ceti dvayaṃ śrutaṃ bādhanīyamiti gauravam,
GSP33brssgo2u:5625: ākāśaprāthamye tvārthikatejaḥ sargaprāthamyamātrabādha iti lāghavamiti matvāha-netyucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5626: kiñca pradhānadharmityāgādvaraṃ guṇabhūtasya tejaḥprāthamyasya dharmasya tyāga ityāha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5627: kiñca kiṃ sṛṣṭiparaśrutisiddhatvāttejaḥprāthamyaṃ gṛhyata uta prathamasthāne tejasaḥ sargaśrutyārthātprāthamyabhānāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5630: yaduktaṃ vastuni vikalpāsaṃbhavādubhayoḥ prāthamyaṃ śākhābhedena vyavasthitaṃ na bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:5635: viyadanutpattivādinoktamanūdya pratijñāyā advitīyaśruteśca mukhyārthatātparyāvagamānna gauṇārthateti dūṣayati-yaccoktamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:5637: udakaṃ kṣīrasthamapi kṣīrajñānānna gṛhyate bhedāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5643: ubhayagauṇatve 'dbhutavadupanyāso mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaistatsādhanaṃ ca na syāditi doṣāntaramāha-nacetyādinā //6//
GSP33brssgo2u:5652: yato yāvatkiñcidvikārajātaṃ dṛśyate ghaṭaghaṭikodañcanādi vā kaṭakakeyūrakuṇḍalādi vā sūcīnārācanistriṃśādi vā tāvāneva vibhāgo loke lakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5657: nanvātmāpyākāśādibhyo vibhakta iti tasyāpi kāryatvaṃ ghaṭādivatprāpnoti / na /
GSP33brssgo2u:5660: yadi hyātmāpi vikāraḥ syāttasmātparamanyanna śrutamityākāśādi sarvaṃ kāryaṃ nirātmakamātmanaḥ kāryatve syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5670: āgantukaṃ hi vastu nirākriyate na svarūpam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5671: ya eva hi nirākartā tadeva tasya svarūpam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5675: tathā bhasmībhavatyapi dehe cātmana ucchedo vartamānasvabhāvādanyathāsvabhāvatvaṃ vā na saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5678: tatpratyucyate- na tāvatsamānajātīyamevārabhate na bhinnajātīyamiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5683: samavāyikāraṇaviṣaya eva samānajātīyatvābhyupagamo na kāraṇāntaraviṣaya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5691: ekaiko hi paramāṇirmanaścāyaṃ karmārabhate na dravyāntaraiḥ saṃhatyetyabhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5695: bhavedeṣa niyamo yadi saṃyogasacivaṃ dravyaṃ dravyāntarasyārambhakamabhyupagamyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5696: tadeva tu dravyaṃ viśeṣavadavasthāntaramāpadyamānaṃ kāryaṃ nāmābhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5702: yaccoktamākāśasyotpattau na pūrvottarakālayorviśeṣaḥ saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5704: yenaiva hi viśeṣeṇa pṛthivyādibhyo vyatiricyamānaṃ nabhaḥ svarūpavadidānīmadhyavasīyate sa eva viśeṣaḥ prāgutpatternāsīditi gamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:5705: yathā ca brahma na sthūlādibhiḥ pṛthivyādisvabhāvaiḥ svabhāvavat,
GSP33brssgo2u:5722: 'ākāśavatsarvagataśca nityaḥ' ityapi prasiddhamahattvenākāśenopamānaṃ kriyate niratiśayamahattvāya nākāśasamatvāya /
GSP33brssgo2u:5723: yatheṣuriva savitā dhāvatīti kṣipragatitvāyocyate neṣutulyagatitvāya tadvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:5735: kāryameva vastvekadeśa ākāśo notpadyate sāmagrīśūnyatvādityatra ākāśo vikāraḥ vibhaktatvāt ghaṭādivaditi satpratipakṣamāha-yatpunarityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:5736: yo vibhaktaḥ sa vikāra ityanvayamuktvā yastvavikāraḥ sa na vibhakto yathātmeti vyatirikavyāptimāha-na tvavikṛtamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5740: dharmisamānasattākavibhāgasya hetutvātparamārthātmani vibhāgasya kalpitatvena bhinnasattākatvānna vyabhicāra ityāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5746: ghaṭavadityābhāsatulyamidamanumānamityāśaṅkyātmanaḥ paramakāraṇatvena śrutasya kāryatve śūnyatāprasaṅga iti bādhakasattvāttasyābhāvatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5747: nātra kiñcidbādhakamasti pratyuta ākāśasyākāryatve nityānekadravyakalpanā śrautapratijñāhānyādayo bādhakāḥ santīti nābhāsatulyatetyāha-ātmana iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5750: ādye yo jñātā sa pariśiṣyata iti na śūnyatā /
GSP33brssgo2u:5757: yaduktaṃ sureśvarācāryaiḥ-'pramātā ca pramāṇaṃ ca prameyaṃ pramitistathā /
GSP33brssgo2u:5764: nanu prameyasyāpi svaprakāśatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5766: ātmāpi mānādhīnasiddhikaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-ātmā tviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5768: gehe ghaṭo dṛṣṭo na veti jñānasaṃśaye na dṛṣṭa iti vyatirekaniścaye cārthasvarūpaniścayāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5776: svaprakāśasyāpi bādhaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5777: jaḍaṃ hi parāyattaprakāśatvādāgantukaṃ bādhayogyaṃ na prakāśātmasvarūpaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5780: nahi sunipuṇenāpi svābhāvo draṣṭuṃ śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5781: evaṃ svataḥ sphūrtitvādātmā na bādhya ityuktvā svataḥ sattākatvācca na bādhya ityāha-tathāhameveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5782: jñānajñeyayoḥ sattāvyabhicāre 'pi jñātuḥ sadaikarūpatvānna sattāvyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5786: anyathāsvabhāvatvaṃ mithyātvaṃ vā saṃbhāvayitumapi na śakyam,
GSP33brssgo2u:5804: yadyapyadṛṣṭavadātmasaṃyukte aṇumanasī ādyakarmārambhake tathāpi karmasamavāyina ekatvādanekatvaniyamabhaṅga ityāha-ekaiko hīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5808: na tvabhyupagamyate tasmānnaiṣa niyama iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5809: yattu kṣīraparamāṇuṣu rasāntarotpattau taireva dadhyārambha iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5814: loke kartu- sahāyadarśanādasahāyādbrahmaṇaḥ kathaṃ sarga iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:5822: na hyākāśābhāvastaddharmo vā kāṭhinyaṃ kintu mūrtadravyaviśeṣastasaṃyogaviśeṣo vā kāṭhinyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:5834: sarvamūrtadravyasaṃyogaḥ parimāṇaviśeṣo vā vibhutvaṃ nirguṇātmani dṛṣṭānte nāsti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5844: nanu 'sa yathānanto 'yamākāśa evamananta ātmā'iti śrutirnityatvenaiva sāmyaṃ brūte,
GSP33brssgo2u:5855: balavattittiriśrutyā chāndogyaśruternayanādekavākyatayā sraṣṭari brahmātmani samanvaya ityupasaṃharati-tasmāditi //7//
GSP33brssgo2u:5875: nanu vāyorākāśasya ca tulyayorutpattiprakaraṇe śravaṇāśravaṇayorekamevādhikaraṇamubhayaviṣayamastu kimatideśenāsati viśeṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5883: 'ākāśādvāyuḥ'iti śrutyā virodho 'sti na veti ekavākyatvabhāvābhāvabhyāṃ saṃśaye gauṇapakṣapūrvapakṣasiddhāntapakṣānatidiśati-tatrāpītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:5885: tatra vāyutejasostulyavadānantarye vāyoragniriti kramaśrutibādhātpaurvāparye tejaḥprāthamyabhaṅgānnaikavākyateti pūrvapakṣe gauṇavādyabhiprāyamāha-tataśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5891: tathācākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā tejo 'sṛjateti śrutyorekavākyatayā brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:5904: tathā vikārebhya evākāśādibhya uttareṣāṃ vikārāṇāmutpattimupaśrutyākāśasyāpi vikārādeva brahmaṇa utpattiriti kaścinmanyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:5906: na khalu brahmaṇaḥ sadātmakasya kutaścidanyataḥ saṃbhava utpattirāśaṅkitavyā /
GSP33brssgo2u:5913: sāmānyāddhi viśeṣā utpadyamānā dṛśyante mṛdāderghaṭādayo natu viśeṣebhyaḥ sāmānyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5917: 'sa kāraṇaṃ karaṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaścijjanitā na cādhipaḥ' (śve. 6.9)
GSP33brssgo2u:5919: vivatvapavanayoḥ punarutpattiḥ pradarśitā natu brahmaṇaḥ sāstīti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:5920: naca vikārebhyo vikārāntarotpattidarśanādbrahmaṇo 'pi vikāratvaṃ bhavitumarhatīti mūlaprakṛtyanabhyupagame 'navastāprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5921: yā mūlaprakṛtirabhyupagamyate tadeva ca no brahmetyavirodhaḥ // 9 //
GSP33brssgo2u:5924_0: 'na cāsya kaścijjanitā'ityādi brahmānāditvaśrutīnāṃ 'tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ'ityutpattiśrutyā
GSP33brssgo2u:5924_1: virodho 'sti na vetyekavākyatvabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ saṃdehe 'sti virodha iti pūrvapakṣe
GSP33brssgo2u:5937: tathāhi-kiṃ sanmātrasya brahmaṇaḥ sanmātrameva sāmānyaṃ kāraṇaṃ sadviśeṣo vā asadvā /
GSP33brssgo2u:5954: tatra tejoyoniṃ prati śrutivipratipattau satyāṃ prāptaṃ tāvadbrahmayonikaṃ teja iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5965: tasmāt 'vāyoragniḥ' iti kramopadeśo draṣṭavyo vāyoranantaramagniḥ saṃbhūta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5966: evaṃ prāpta ucyate- tejo 'to mātariśvano jāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5969: avyavahite hi tejaso brahmajatve satyasati vāyujatve vāyoragniritīyaṃ śrutiḥ kadarthitā syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5976: apica vāyorūrdhvamagniḥ saṃbhūta iti kalpya upapadārthayogaḥ kḷptastu kārakārthayogo vāyoragni saṃbhūta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5981: yadāpi hyākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā vāyubhāvāpannaṃ brahma tejo 'sṛjateti kalpyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:5983: yathā tasyāḥ śrutaṃ tasyā dadhi tasyā āmikṣetyādi /
GSP33brssgo2u:5984: darśayati ca brahmaṇo vikārātmanāvastānaṃ 'tadātmānaṃ svayamakuruta' (tai. 2.7.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5986: ityādyanukramya 'bhavati bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthagvidhāḥ' (bha.gī. 10.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:5987: yadyapi buddhyādayaḥ svakāraṇebhyaḥ pratyakṣaṃ bhavanto dṛśyante tathāpi sarvasya bhāvajātasya sākṣātpraṇāḍyā veśvaravaṃśyatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:5995: tasyā dhenoḥ śrutaṃ taptaṃ kṣīraṃ sākṣātkāryaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6000_0: 'tattejo 'sṛjata'iti 'vāyoragniḥ'iti ca śrutyorvirodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe sāmānyātsāmānyotpattyasaṃbhave
GSP33brssgo2u:6004_1: tejasa upādānaṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ brahmaivopādānamityarthe śrutīnāṃ bhūyastvācca tadanurodhādvāyoriti
GSP33brssgo2u:6004_2: kramārthā pañcamītyavirodha ityekadeśisiddhāntaṃ prāpayati-prāptaṃ tāvadbrahmayonikaṃ teja ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:6015: naca 'bahu syām'iti kāryābhede kṣaṇiliṅgādupādānatvasiddhiḥ liṅgācchruterbalīyastvena śrutyavirodhena liṅgasya neyatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6016: nayanaṃ cetthaṃ vāyorbrahmānanyatvādvāyujasyāpi tejaso brahmaprakṛtikatvamaviruddhamiti siddhāntagranthāśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6021: ūrdhvamanantaramiti vopapadaṃ vinā pañcamīmātrātkramo na bhātīti kalpya upapadārthayogaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6023: viśeṣato 'tra prakaraṇādapādānārthatvaṃ pañcamyāḥ kḷptaṃ kḷptena ca kalpyaṃ sati virodhe bādhyamiti sthitirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6025: tasyā dhenoḥ śṛtaṃ taptaṃ kṣīraṃ sākṣātkāryaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6043: tathāhyāha- 'tadapo 'sṛjata' iti 'agnerāpaḥ' iti ca vacane nāsti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6044: tejasastu sṛṣṭiṃ vyākhyāya pṛthivyā vyākhyāsyannapo 'ntariyāmityāpa iti sūtrayāṃbabhūva // 11 //
GSP33brssgo2u:6047: tathā hyātharvaṇe muṇḍakagranthe 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇica /
GSP33brssgo2u:6048: khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī'iti mantre 'pāṃ brahmajatvaṃ śrutam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6049_0: 'agnerāpaḥ'iti śrutyā tasya virodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe tulyatvādasti virodha iti
GSP33brssgo2u:6052: trivṛtkṛtayoraptejasorvirodhe 'pyagnerāpa iti vacanādatīndriyayostayornāsti virodha iti nirṇīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6053: na kevalaṃ śrutyavirodhajñānāyāyamatideśaḥ kintu pañcabhūcatotpattikramanirṇayārthaṃ cetyāha-tejasastviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6060: 'tā āpa aikṣanta bahvayaḥ syāma prajāyemahīti tā annamasṛjanta' (chā. 6.2.4)
GSP33brssgo2u:6062: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimanenānnaśabdena vrīhiyavādyabhyavahāryai caudanādyucyate kiṃ vā pṛthivīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6066: vrīhiyavādyeva hi sati varṣaṇe bahu bhavati na pṛthivīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6067: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ pṛthivyeveyamannaśabdenādbhyo jāyamānā vivakṣyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6071: tatra kramaprāptāṃ pṛthivīṃ mahābhūtaṃ vilaṅghya nākasmādvrīhyādiparigraho nyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6072: tathā rūpamapi vākyaśeṣe pṛthivyanuguṇaṃ dṛśyate 'yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6075: nanu pṛthivyā api naiva kṛṣṇatvaniyamo 'sti payaḥpāṇḍurasyāṅgārarohitasya ca kṣetrasya darśanāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6078: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ hi pṛthivyāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rūpaṃ na tathā śvetarohite /
GSP33brssgo2u:6080: sā ca kṛṣṇābhāsetyataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rūpaṃ pṛthivyā iti śliṣyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:6082: 'tadyadapāṃ śara āsīttatsamahanyata sā pṛthivyabhavat' (bṛ. 1.2.2) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:6083: pṛthivyāstu vrīhyāderutpattiṃ darśayati- 'pṛthivyā oṣadhaya oṣadhībhyo 'nnam' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:6084: evamadhikārādiṣu pṛthivyāḥ pratipādakeṣu satsu kuto vrīhyādipratipattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6086: vākyaśeṣo 'pi pārthivatvādannādyasya taddvāreṇa pṛthivyā evādbhyaḥ prabhavatvaṃ sūcayatīti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6089: FN: tattatra sṛṣṭikāle yadapāṃ śaraḥmaṇḍavadghanībhāva āsītsa eva samahanyata kaṭhinaḥ saṃghāto 'bhūt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6093: atra śrutau yadyannamodanādikaṃ tadā 'adbhyaḥ pṛthivī'iti śrutyā virodhaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6094: yadi pṛthivī tadā na virodha iti phalaṃ bodhyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6098: tathāca kvacidannaṃ kvacidadbhayaḥ pṛthivī tato 'nnamiti virodhānnaikavākyateti prāpte siddhāntayati-evaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6104: abānantaryaṃ pṛthivyāḥ sthānaṃ śrutyantarasiddhaṃ tenāpyannasya pṛthivītvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6105: tattatra sṛṣṭikāle yadapāṃ śaraḥ yo maṇḍavaddhanībhāva āsītsa eva samahanyata kaṭhinaḥ saṃghāto 'bhūt sāpāṃ kaṭhinā pariṇatiḥ pṛthivyabhavaditi śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6115: evaṃ tittiriśrutyanusāreṇa chandogaśruternayanādaviruddho bhūtasṛṣṭiśrutīnāṃ brahmaṇi samanvaya iti siddham //12//
GSP33brssgo2u:6120: tadabhidhyānād eva tu talliṅgāt saḥ / BBs_2,3.13 /
GSP33brssgo2u:6121_0: kimimāni viyadādīni bhūtāni svayameva svavikārānsṛjantyāhosvatparameśvara eva tena
GSP33brssgo2u:6121_1: tenātmanāvatiṣṭhamāno 'bhidhyāyaṃstaṃ taṃ vikāraṃ sṛjatīti saṃdehe sati prāptaṃ tāvatsvayameva sṛjantīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6128: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate- sa eva parameśvarastena tenātmanāvatiṣṭhamāno 'bhidhyāyaṃstaṃ taṃ vikāraṃ sṛjatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6131: tathāhi śāstram- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayati' (bṛ. 3.7.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:6133: tathā so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya iti prastutya 'sacca tyaccābhavat /

GSP33brssgo2u:6138: prakṛtatvācca sata īkṣituḥ 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya' ityatra // 13 // @#----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:6140: FN: parameśvarasyāntaryāmibhāvenāveśaḥ saṃbandhastadvaśādbhūteṣvīkṣaṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ naitāvatā teṣāṃ cetanatvaṃ svātantryaṃ vetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6141: saṃprati tāni bhūtānyāśrityāśrayāśrayibhāvasaṃgatyā teṣāṃ svātantryamāśaṅkya niṣedhati-tadabhidhyānādeva tu talliṅgātsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6144: nanvatra bhūtānāṃ kiṃ svātantryeṇopādānatvamāśaṅkyate kartṛtvaṃ vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:6148: yathā manuṣyādiśabdaistattaddehābhimānino jīvā ucyante tathā 'ākāśādvāyuḥ'ityādiśrutāvākāśādiśabdaistattadbhūtābhimānidevatā ucyante,
GSP33brssgo2u:6150: evaṃ 'tadātmānaṃ svayamakuruta'iti śrutau svayamiti viśeṣaṇādbrahmaṇo 'nyānapekṣasarvakartṛtvasaṃbhavānnirapekṣanimittatvaṃ śrutam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6151: tathāca mithonirapekṣeśvarabhūtakartṛśrutyorvirodhānna brahmaṇi samanvaya iti saphalaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6153: yathā ākāśādibhāvāpannabrahmaṇaḥ sarvopādānatvaṃ tathā tadabhimānidevatājīvabhāvamāpannabrahmaṇaḥ kartṛtvamiti paramparayā īśvarakartṛtvaśrutyavirodhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6156: ākāśādiśabdairna devatālakṣaṇā mukhyārthe bādhakābhāvāt pañcamyaśca prakṛtitvārthāstatra rūḍhataratvāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:6159: yadyapi devatānāṃ kartṛtvaṃ saṃbhavati tathāpīśvaraniyamyatvaśravaṇāccetanānāmapi na svātantryaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6160: kimu vācyamacetanānāṃ bhūtānāṃ na svātantryamiti matvoktam-talliṅgāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:6161: tattadacetanātmanāvasthitasya brahmaṇa upādānatve 'pi jīvavyāvṛtteśvaratvākāreṇaiva sākṣātsarvakartṛtvaṃ na jīvatvadvārā tasya sarvaniyantṛtvālliṅgādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6164: parameśvarasyāntaryāmibhāvenāveśaḥ saṃbandhastadvaśādbhūteṣvīkṣaṇaśravaṇaṃ naitāvatā teṣāṃ cetanatvaṃ svātantryaṃ vetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6166: itthaṃ sūtrayojanā-sa īśvarastattadātmanā sthito 'pi sākṣādeva sarvakartā tasyāntaryāmitvaliṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6167: jīvatvadvārā kartṛtvaṃ nāma jīvasyaiva kartṛtvamityantaryāmiṇaḥ kartṛtvāsiddherantaryāmitvāyogāttadabhidhyānādīśvarekṣaṇādeva bhūteṣu śrutekṣaṇopapatteśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6168: tatteja aikṣateti śruta īkṣitā paramātmaivetyatra śrutyantaraṃ prakaraṇaṃ cāha-nānya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6174: viparyayeṇa tu kramo 'ta upapadyate ca / BBs_2,3.14 /
GSP33brssgo2u:6178: trayo 'pi cotpattisthitipralayā bhūtānāṃ brahmāyattāḥ śrūyante- 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:6181: athavotpatteḥ kramasya śrutatvāpralayasyāpi kramākāṅkṣiṇaḥ sa eva kramaḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:6182: evaṃ prāptaṃ tato brūmaḥ viparyayeṇa tu pralayakramo 'ta utpattikramādbhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:6183: tathāhi loke dṛśyate yena krameṇa sopānamārūḍhastato viparītena krameṇāvarohatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6184: apica dṛśyate mṛdo jātaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyapyayakāle mṛdbhāvamapyetyadbhyaśca jātaṃ himakarakādyabbhāvamapyetīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6186: yadpṛthivyadbhyo jātā satī sthitikālavyatikrāntāvapo 'pīyādāpaśca tejaso jātāḥ satyastejo 'pīyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6187: evaṃ krameṇa sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ cānantaramanantaraṃ kāraṇamapītya sarvaṃ kāryajātaṃ paramakāraṇaṃ paramasūkṣmaṃ ca brahmāpyetīti veditavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6193: nahi kārye dhriyamāṇe kāraṇasyāpyayo yuktaḥ kāraṇāpyaye kāryasyāvasthānānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6194: kāryāpyaye tu kāraṇasyāvasthānaṃ yuktaṃ mṛdādiṣvevaṃ dṛṣṭatvāt // 14 // @#----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:6198: yadyapyatra śrutivirodho na parihriyata ityasaṃgatistathāpyutpattikrame nirūpite layakramo buddhistho vicāryata iti prāsaṅgikyāveva pādāvāntarasaṃgatī iti matvāha-bhūtānāmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6199: atrotpattikramādviparītakramanirṇayātsiddhānte bhūtānāṃ prātilemyena layadhyānapūrvakaṃ pratyagbrahmaṇi manaḥsamādhānaṃ phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6200: pūrvapakṣe tu kāraṇanāśe sati kāryanāśa iti sarvalayādhārabrahmāsiddheruktasamādhyasiddhiriti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6201: sati mahābhūtānāṃ laye kramacintā sa eva nāstīti kecittānpratyāha-trayo 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6202: aniyama ityanāsthayoktaṃ śrautasya pralayasya kramākāṅkṣāyāṃ śrauta utpattikrama eva grāhyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:6204: sati kāraṇe kāryaṃ naśyatīti loke dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:6205: tathāca śrauto 'pyutpattikramo laye na gṛhyate kintu laukikakrama eva gṛhyate śruterlokadṛṣṭapadārthabodhādhīnatvena śrautādapi laukikasyāntaraṅgatvādyogyatvācca /
GSP33brssgo2u:6206: kāraṇameva hi kāryasya svarūpamiti tadananyatvanyāyena sthāpitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6207: na hi svarūpanāśe kāryasya kṣaṇamapi sthitiryuktā tasmādayogya utpattikramo layasya na grāhyaḥ laukikakramāvarodhena nirākāṅkṣātvāditi siddhāntayati-tato brūma ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:6209: sākṣādeva tatkiṃ na syādityata āha-nahi svakāraṇavyatikrameṇeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6211: 'vāyuśca līyate vyomni taccāvyakte pralīyate'iti smṛtiśeṣa ādipadārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6217: antarā vijñānamanasī krameṇa talliṅgād iti cen nāviśeṣāt / BBs_2,3.15 /
GSP33brssgo2u:6220: sendriyasya tu manaso buddheśca sadbhāvaḥ prasiddhaḥ śrutismṛtyoḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6221: 'buddhiṃ tu sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:6228: khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī' (muṇaḍa. 2.1.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6232: yadi tāvadbhautikāni karaṇāni tato bhūtotpattipralayābhyāmevaiṣāmutpattipralayau bhavata iti naitayoḥ kramāntaraṃ mṛgyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:6234: 'annamayaṃ hi somya mana oṣadhayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāk' (chā. 6.5.4)
GSP33brssgo2u:6236: vyapadeśo 'pi kvacidbhūtānāṃ karaṇānāṃ ca brāhmaṇaparivrājakanyāyena netavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6237: atha tvabhautikāni karaṇāni tathāpi bhūtotpattikramo na karaṇairviśeṣyate prathamaṃ karaṇānyutpadyante caramaṃ bhūtāni prathamaṃ vā bhūtānyutpadyante caramaṃ vā karaṇānīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6238: ātharvaṇe tu samāmnāyakramamātraṃ karaṇānāṃ bhūtānāṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:6240: tathānyatrāpi pṛthageva bhūtakramātkaraṇakrama āmnāyate- 'prajāpatirvā idamagra āsītsa ātmānamaikṣata sa mano 'sṛjata tanmana evāsīttadātmānamaikṣata tadvācamasṛjata' ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:6244: idaṃ sthūlamutpatteḥ prāk prajāpatiḥ sūtrātmā āsīt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6246: uktabhūtotpattilayakramamupajīvya sa kiṃ karaṇotpattikrameṇa virudhyate na veti karaṇānāmabhautikatvabhautikatvābhyāṃ saṃdehe vṛttānuvādapūrvakaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha-bhūtānāmityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:6254: ātmano bhūtānāṃ cāntarā madhye talliṅgātsṛṣṭivākyāt 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ'ityādirūpādvijñānamanasī anukramyete /
GSP33brssgo2u:6258_0: tathā cātmanaḥ prathamamākāśasya janma paścādvāyorityuktakramasyātmanaḥ karaṇāni
GSP33brssgo2u:6258_1: tato bhūtānīti krameṇa virodha iti tittiryatharvaṇaśrutyorvirodhānna brahmaṇi samanvaya
GSP33brssgo2u:6260: 'ātmana ākāśaḥ'ityādi tittiriśrutau pañcamyāḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvenārthataḥ kramo bhāti /
GSP33brssgo2u:6264: karaṇānāṃ vibhaktatvena kāryatayā kāraṇākāṅkṣāyāmannamayamityādiśruterākāṅkṣitoktyarthamasati bādhake mayaṭo vikārārthatāyā yuktatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:6265: prācuryārthatve tvanākāṅkṣitoktiprasaṅgācchrutyaiva tejobannaprāśena vākprāṇamanasāṃ vṛddhistadabhāve tannāśa iti vikāratvasya darśitatvānna vivādāvasaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:6266: yadvā sthūlabhūtādhīnā teṣāṃ vṛddhirvikāro mayaḍarthaḥ śrūyamāṇo bhautikatve liṅgaṃ prāṇendriyamanāṃsi bhautikāni bhūtādhīnavṛddhimattvāddehavaditi bhāvaḥ /
