GSP33brssgo2u:7274: nanu kartṛtvaṃ nāma kriyāśaktirmuktāvapyasti tathāpi śaktikāryasya kriyārūpaśakyasyābhāvānmukteḥ puruṣārthatvasiddhiriti śaṅkate-nanu sthitāyāmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7279: asti hi pralaye 'pi kāryaṃ punarudbhavayogyaṃ sūkṣmaṃ śakyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7280: tathāca śaktyā dharmādinimitteḥ sahitakāryākṣepānmuktilopa iti pariharati-na nimittānāmapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7281: sanimittasya kāryasya śakyatvena śaktyā saṃbandhānnamittānāmapi paramparayā śaktisaṃbandhitvamuktaṃ mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7283: yadvā śaktirlakṣaṇamākṣepakaṃ yasya kāryasya tena kāryeṇa yaḥ saṃbandhasteneti vyadhikaraṇe tṛtīye /
GSP33brssgo2u:7294: buddhyādisaṃghātādvyatirikto yadi parasmādanyaścetano na syāttadā para eva saṃsārī prasajyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:7297: na vayaṃ śuddhasya ciddhātoḥ parasya bandhaṃ vadāmaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7298: kintu tasyaivāvidyābuddhyādiprativimbitasyāvidyayā bhinnasya jīvatvaṃ prāptasya bandhamokṣāviti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7299: kalpitabhedo 'pi loke bimbapratibimbayordharmavyavasthāpako dṛṣṭa iti pariharati-nāvidyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7309: ātmā svato 'kartā buddhyādyupādhinā tu kartetyubhayathābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7312: yathā sphaṭikasya lauhityaṃ kusumādyupādhikaṃ tathātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ buddhyādyupādhikamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ siddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:7313: naca tau buddherātmakartṛtve karaṇatvaviṣayau nopādānatvaviṣayāviti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7316_0: nanu takṣā svahastādinā vāsyādipreraṇaśaktatvātsvataḥ kartā ātmā tu niravayavatvādaśakta
GSP33brssgo2u:7317: śāstreṇānūdyamānaṃ kartṛtvaṃ svābhāvikameva kiṃ na syādityata āha-naca svābhāvikamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7318: upādhyabhāvakāle śrutaṃ kartṛtvaṃ svābhāvikameveti śaṅkate-nanu saṃdhya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7319: kiñca karaṇairviśiṣṭasya kartṛtve teṣāṃ kartrantarbhāvātteṣvapi kartṛvibhaktiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7325: na karaṇavibhaktirityuktaṃ pratyāha-bhavati ca loka iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7331: pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ jīva ityaṅgīkṛtya jīvasya kartṛtve tanuta iti śrutiruktā,
GSP33brssgo2u:7332: saṃprati tayā śrutyānupahitātmanaḥ kartṛtvamiti prāptau vijñānaṃ buddhireva tasyā evātra kartṛtvamucyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7334: 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ'ityādiśrutiṣu vijñānabdasya buddhau prasiddhatvādatra ca manomayakośānantaraṃ paṭhitatvācchraddhādiliṅgācca buddhireva vijñānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7336: 'mahadyakṣaṃ prathamajam'ityādiśrutau hiraṇyagarbhabrahmātmakabuddherjyeṣṭhatvokteratra devairindriyairūpāsyamānaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ brahma vijñānaṃ buddhirevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7338: kiñca śrutyantare yajñasya buddhikāryatvokteratrāpi yajñakartṛvijñānaṃ buddhirityāha-sa eṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7339: cittena dhyātvā vācā mantroktyā yajño jāyate tataścittasya vācaḥ pūrvottarabhāvo yajña ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7344: tarhi buddhyādīnāṃ kartṛtve karaṇatvavārtā teṣu na syādityata āha-upalabdhīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7345: yathā kāṣṭhānāṃ svavyāpāre kartṛtve 'pi pākāpekṣayā karaṇatvaṃ tathā buddhyādīnāmadhyavasāyasaṃkalpādikriyākartṛtve 'pyupalabdhyapekṣayā karaṇatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7346: nanu tarhyupalabdhiḥ kasya vyāpāra ityāha-sā ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7348: yasya yo vyāpāraḥ sa tasya karteti sthiterityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7349: upalabdhernityatve buddhyādīnāṃ kathaṃ karaṇatvamuktamiti ceducyate-akhaṇḍasākṣicaitanyaṃ buddhivṛttibhirbhinnaṃ sadviṣayāvācchinnatvena jāyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:7350: tathāca viṣayāvacchinnacaitanyākhyopalabdhau buddhyādīnāṃ karaṇatvaṃ buddhyādyupahitātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ na kevalasya,
GSP33brssgo2u:7351: naca buddhereva tatkartṛtvaṃ caitanyasya jaḍavyāpāratvāyogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7352: yaccoktaṃ buddheḥ kartṛtve sa evāhandhīgamyo jīva iti tasya karaṇāntaraṃ kalpanīyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7353: tathāca nāmamātre vivāda iti tatra kevalātmanaḥ kartṛtvamuktamiti bhrāntiṃ nirasyati-ahaṅkāreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7354: sāṃkhyanirāsārthaṃ buddhyabhedenādhyastacidātmakāhaṅkāragataṃ kartṛtvaṃ yaduktaṃ tadahandhīgamyasya buddhiviśiṣṭātmana eva na kevalasya sākṣiṇo bhavitumarhati,
GSP33brssgo2u:7356: evaṃ viśiṣṭātmanaḥ kartṛtve viśeṣaṇībhūtāyā jaḍabuddhereva karaṇatvopapatterna karaṇāntarakalpanāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7357: adhyāsaṃ vinā kevalabuddhikartṛtvavādinastu karaṇāntaraprasaṅgo durvāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7367: tatra prāptaṃ tāvanneśvaramapekṣate jīvaḥ kartṛtva iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7370: ayaṃ hi jīvaḥ svayameva rāgadveṣādidoṣaprayuktaḥ kārakāntarasāmagrīsamapannaḥ kartṛtvamanubhavituṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7372: naca loke prasiddhirasti kṛṣyādikāsu kriyāsvanaḍudādivadīśvaro 'paro 'pekṣitavya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7373: kleṣātmakena ca kartṛtvena jantūnsaṃsṛjata īśvarasya nairghṛṇyaṃ prasajyeta,
GSP33brssgo2u:7377: sāpekṣatvaṃ ceśvarasya saṃbhavati satorjantūnāṃ dharmādharmayostayośca sadbhāvaḥ sati jīvasya kartṛtve /
GSP33brssgo2u:7381: etāṃ prāptiṃ tuśabdena vyāvartya pratijānīte- 'parāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7387: yadyapi ca loke kṛṣyādiṣu karmasu neśvarakāraṇatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7389: tathāhi śrutirbhavati- 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unninīyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7390: eṣa hyevāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣate' (kauṣī. 3.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7393: yathā sphaṭike lauhityādhyāse lohitadravyaṃ karaṇaṃ tenāyaṃ sphaṭiko lohita ityanubhavāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:7395: tadadhyastaṃ kartṛtvamupajīvya jīvasya kārakasaṃpannatvādīśvarasya kārayitṛtvaśruteśca saṃśayamāha-yadidamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7401: pūrvaṃ jīvasya dharmādharmavattvaṃ siddhavatkṛtya tatsāpekṣatvādviṣamajagatkartṛtvamaviruddhamityuktaṃ saṃprati īśvarādhīnatve jīvasya kartṛtve siddhe dharmādharmavattvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7403: īśvarasya kārayitṛtve siddhe jīvasya kartṛtvasiddhiriti cakrakāpatteḥ karmasāpekṣatvaṃ na saṃbhavatītyucyata ityāha-satyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7406: anapekṣasya pravartakatve dharmavato narān duḥkhenādharmavataḥ sukhena yojayet,
GSP33brssgo2u:7407: kāruṇikatve vā sarve sukhena ekarūpāḥ syuruti jagadvaicitryaṃ vidhyādiśāstraṃ ca na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7408: tasmādvidhyādiśāstrārthavattvāya rāgadveṣāyattaṃ svata eva jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7410: īśvarastāvikā vā sā śrutiriti prāpte siddhāntayati-etāmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7411: yathā candanādisāmagryāṃ satyāṃ dharmavyatirike sukhavyatirekagrahābhāve 'pi 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati'ityādiśāstraprāmāṇyādeva dharmasya hetutvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7416: nanvevamīśvarasya kārayitṛtve sati vaiṣamyanairghaṇye syātāmakṛtābhyāgamaśca jīvasyeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7420: kṛto yaḥ prayatno jīvasya dharmādharmalakṣaṇastadapekṣa evainamīśvaraḥ kārayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7422: jīvakṛtadharmādharmavaiṣamyāpekṣa eva tattatphalāni viṣamaṃ vibhajetparjanyavadīśvaro nimittatvamātreṇa /
GSP33brssgo2u:7423: yathā loke nānāvidhānāṃ gucchagulmādīnāṃ vrīhiyavādīnāṃ cāsādhāraṇebhyaḥ svasvabījebhyo jāyamānānāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati parjanyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7426: evaṃ jīvakṛtaprayatnāpekṣa īśvarasteṣāṃ śubhāśubhaṃ vidadhyāditi śliṣyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7427: nanu kṛtaprayatnāpekṣatvameva jīvasya parāyatte kartṛtve nopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7431: apica pūrvaprayatnamapekṣyedānīṃ kārayati pūrvataraṃ ca prayatnamapekṣya pūrvamakārayadityanāditvātsaṃsārasyetyanavadyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7441: īśvarasya cātyantānapekṣatve laukikasyāpi puruṣakārasya vaiyarthyaṃ tathā deśakālanimittānāṃ pūrvoktadoṣaprasaṅgaścetyevañjātīyakaṃ doṣajātamādigrahaṇena darśayati // 42 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7443: yadi viśeṣahetūnāṃ sādhāraṇahetvapekṣatvānna vaiyarthyaṃ tarhi īśvarasyāpi sādhāraṇahetutvānna vaiyarthyamityāha-parjanyavaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7447: kimīśvarasya kārayitṛtve jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ na syādityāpādyate uta cakrakāpattirvā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7451: anavadyaṃ jīvasya kartṛtvamīśvarasya kārayitṛtvaṃ ceti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7455: tayoḥ sthāne sa eva niyujyeta abhiṣicyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:7456: tayoḥ kāryaṃ sa eva kuryāditi yāvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:7461: tasmāt karmasāpekṣeśvarasya kārayitṛtvāt 'eṣa hyeva'ityādiśrutervidhyādiśrutyavirodha iti siddham //42//
GSP33brssgo2u:7466: aṃśo nānāvyapadeśād anyathā cāpi dāśakitavāditvam adhīyata eke / BBs_2,3.43 /
GSP33brssgo2u:7468: sa ca saṃbaddhayoreva loke dṛṣṭo yathā svāmibhṛtyayoryathā vāgnivisphuliṅgayoḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7469: tataśca jīveśvarayorapyupakāryopakārakabhāvābhyupagamātkiṃ svāmibhṛtyavatsaṃbandha āhosvidagnivisphuliṅgavadityasyāṃ vicikitsāyāmaniyamo vā prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7470: athavā svāmibhṛtyaprakāreṣveveśitrīśitavyabhāvasya prasiddhatvāttadvidha eva saṃbandha iti prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7474: aṃśa ivāṃśo nahi niravayavasya mukhyoṃ'śaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:7478: 'etameva viditvā munirbhavati' ' ya ātmani tiṣṭhannātmānamantaro yamayati' iti caivañjātīyako bhedanirdeśo nāsati bhede yujyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7479: nanu cāyaṃ nānāvyapadeśaḥ sutarāṃ svāmibhṛtyasārūpye yujyata ityata āha- anyathā cāpīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7481: kiṃ tarhyanyathā cāpi vyapadeśo bhavatyanānātvasya pratipādakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7482: tathāhi- eke śākhino dāśakitavādibhāvaṃ brahmaṇa āmanantyātharvaṇikā brahmasūkte- 'brahma dāśā brahma dāsā brahmaiveme kitavāḥ' ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7485: ye cānye kitavā dyūtakṛtaste sarve brahmaiveti hīnajantūdāharaṇena sarveṣāmeva nāmarūpakṛtakāryakaraṇasaṃghātapraviṣṭānāṃ jīvānāṃ brahmatvamāha /
GSP33brssgo2u:7486: tathānyatrāpi brahmaprakriyāyāmevāyamarthaḥ prapañcyate- 'tvaṃ strī tvaṃ pumānasi tvaṃ kumāra uta vā kumārī /
GSP33brssgo2u:7487: tvaṃ jīrṇo daṇḍena vañcasi tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ' (śve. 4.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7488: 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:7494: nityaḥ svaprakāśo 'naṇurakartā jīva'iti śodhitatvaṃpadārthasyātra brahmaikyasādhanena bhedābhedaśrutīnāṃ virodhasamādhānātpādasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7498: prasiddhasvasvāmitvasaṃbandhasaṃbhavādyaḥ kaścit saṃbandha ityaniyamo na yukta ityarucerāha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7502: lokasiddhānarthātmakabhedānuvāditvena bhedaśrutīnāṃ durbalatvādajñātaphalavadabhedaśrutyanusāreṇa prakalpitabhedanibandhanoṃ'śāṃśibhāvaḥ saṃbandha iti siddhāntayati-ata ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7503: agneḥ sāṃśatve 'pi niṣkaleśvarasya kathaṃ sāṃśatvamata āha-aṃśa iveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7505: bheda eva cetsvasvāmibhāvo yukto nāṃśāṃśibhāva iti śaṅkate-nanu ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7507: vañcasi gacchasi yadāste yo nāmarūpe nirmāya praviśya vyavaharanvartate taṃ vidvānamṛto bhavatīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7521: asya sahasraśīrṣapuruṣasya tāvānprapañco mahimā vibhūtiḥ puruṣastasmātprapañcāt jyāyānmahattaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7525: atra bhūtaśabdasya prāṇiṣu prayogātsūtroktamantre 'pi tatheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7533: īśvaragītāsvapi ceśvaraṃśatvaṃ jīvasya smaryate- 'mamaivāṃśo jīvaloke jīvabhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ' (15.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7538: atrāha- nanu jīvasyeśvarāṃśatvābhyupagame tadīyena saṃsāraduḥkhopabhogenāṃśina īśvarasyāpi duḥkhitvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7539: yathā loke hastapādādyanyatamāṅgagatena duḥkhenāṅgino devadattasya duḥkhitvaṃ tadvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:7541: ato varaṃ pūrvāvasthaḥ saṃsāra evāstviti samyagdarśanānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7545: aupādhike īśvarasya niyantṛtve jīva eva tanniyantā kiṃ na syādityata āha-niratiśayeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7557: yathā jīvaḥ saṃsāraduḥkhamanubhavati naivaṃ para īśvaro 'nubhavatīti pratijānīmahe /
GSP33brssgo2u:7558: jīvo hyavidyāveśavaśāddehādyātmabhāvamiva gatvā tatkṛtena duḥkhena duḥkhyahamityavidyayā kṛtaṃ duḥkhopabhogamabhimanyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7562: tataśca niścitametadavagamyate- mithyābhimānabhramanimitta eva duḥkhānubhava iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7564_0: tathāhi- putramitrādimatsu bahuṣūpaviṣṭeṣu tatsaṃbandhābhimāniṣvitareṣu ca putro
GSP33brssgo2u:7569_1: pratipadyamāneṣu tattadbhāvamiva pratipadyamāno 'pi na paramārthatastadbhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7570: yathā cākāśo ghaṭādiṣu gacchatsu gacchanniva vibhāvyamāno 'pi na paramārthato gacchati,
GSP33brssgo2u:7571: yathā codaśarāvādikampanāttadgate sūryapratibimbe kampamāne 'pi na tadvānsūryaḥ kampate,
GSP33brssgo2u:7572: evamavidyāpratyupasthāpite buddhyādyupahite jīvākhyeṃ'śe duḥkhāyamāne 'pi na tadvānīśvaro duḥkhāyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7574: tathācāvidyānimittajīvabhāvavyudāsena brahmabhāvameva jīvasya pratipādayanti vedāntāḥ 'tattvamasi' ityevamādayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7584: naivaṃpara iti pratijñānaṃ vibhajate-yathā jīva iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7589: bhrāntau satyāṃ duḥkhamityanvayamuktvā bhrāntyabhāve duḥkhābhāvadarśanācca bhrāntikṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti niścīyata ityāha-vyatireketi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7591: jīvasyāpi samyagjñāne duḥkhābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ kimu vācyaṃ nityasarvajñeśvarasyetyāha-ataśceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7592: evamaṃśitve hetoḥ sopādhikatvamuktvā yoṃ'śī sa vastutaḥ svāṃśadharmavānitī vyāptiṃ sthalatraye vyabhicārayati-prakāśādivaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7595: kiñca jīvasyeśvarasya vā vastuto duḥkhitvānumānaṃ na yuktamāgamabādhādityāha-tathāceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7601: smaranti ca vyāsādayo yathā jaivena duḥkhena na paramātmā duḥkhāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7602: 'tatra yaḥ paramātmā hi sa nityo nirguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7604: karmātmā tvaparo yo 'sau mokṣabandhanaiḥ sa yujyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7605: sa saptadaśakenāpi rāśinā yujyate punaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7608: 'ekastathā sarvabhūtāntarātmā na lipyate lokaduḥkhena bāhyaḥ' (kaṭha. 5.11) iti ca // 47 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7609: atrāha- yadi tarhyeka eva sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmantarātmā syātkathamanujñāparihārau syātāṃ lokikau vaidikau ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7613: anaṃśitvamapi hi jīvasyābhedavādinyaḥ śrutayaḥ pratipādayanti- 'tatsṛṣṭvā tadevānuprāviśat' (te. 2.6.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:7615: , 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.19)
GSP33brssgo2u:7621: abheda eva tvatra pratipipādayiṣito brahmātmatvapratipattau puruṣārthasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7623: naca niravayavasya brahmaṇo mukhyoṃ'śo jīvaḥ saṃbhavatītyuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7624: tasmātparaḥ evaikaḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmantarātmā jīvabhāvenāvasthita ityato vaktavyānujñāparihāropapattiḥ // 47 // @#----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:7628: saptadaśakena daśendrayāṇi pañca prāṇaḥ mano buddiśceti saptadaśasaṃkhyāko rāśirliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7629: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyu - iha brahmaṇi yo nāneva kalpitabhedaśāli cetanācetanātmakaṃ viśvaṃ paśyati sa mṛtyoranantaraṃ mṛtyuṃ janmamaraṇādiparamparārūpaṃ saṃsāraṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7633: daśendriyāṇi pañca prāṇāḥ mano buddhiśceti saptadaśasaṃkhyāko rāśirliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7637: yato bāhyo 'saṅgastasmānna lipyate evamaṃśitvakṛtamīśvare doṣaṃ nirasyāṃśa ityuktaṃ jīvasyāṃśatvaṃ dehādyupādhikamiti sphuṭayitumatyantasvarūpaikyamādāyākṣipati-atrāhetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7640: niravayavabrahmaṇo mukhyāṃśo na saṃbhavatīti vadatā siddhāntinā bhedo nāstītyuktaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssgo2u:7660: dṛṣṭā ca sā sarvaprāṇināmahaṃ gacchāmyahamāgacchāmyahamandho 'hamanandho 'haṃ mūḍho 'hamamūḍha ityevamātmikā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7673: satyaṃ vyatirekadarśino niyojyatvaṃ tathāpi vyomādivaddehādyasaṃhatatvamapaśyata evātmano niyojyatvābhimānaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7681: yathāca prakāśa ekasyāpi savituramedhyadeśasaṃbaddhaḥ parihriyate netaraḥ śucibhūmiṣṭhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7684: yathā mūtraparīṣaṃ gavāṃ pavitratayā parigṛhyate tadeva jātyantare parivarjyate tadvat // 48 // @#----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:7689: nanu bhrānteḥ kutaścinnivṛttau vyavahāravicchedaḥ syādityata āha-na hyasyā ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7705: ajñasyāpi bhrāntyabhāvakāle niyojyatvaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ kimu vācyamātmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7707: viṣayavairāgyasya jñānārthamabhyastasya jñānānantaramanuvṛttyā viṣayeṣu pravartakarāganivṛtternātiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7718: yatsvayaṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhaḥ sa caikātmyābhyupagame vyatikīryeta svāmyekatvāditi cet /
GSP33brssgo2u:7721: nahi kartṛbhoktṛścātmanaḥ saṃtataḥ sarvaiḥ śarīraiḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7724: tataśca karmavyatikaraḥ phalavyatikaro vā na bhaviṣyati // 49 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7727: tasmātsvargī narakī ceti vyavasthāsiddhaye ātmasvarūpabhedo vācya iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7728: bhavettadā sāṃkaryaṃ yadyanupahitātmana eva bhoktṛtvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7732: tathāca buddheḥ paradehāsaṃbandhāttadupahitajīvasya nāsti paradehasaṃbandha iti buddhibhedena bhoktṛbhedānna karmādisāṃkaryamiti samādhānārthaḥ //49//
GSP33brssgo2u:7737: ābhāsa eva caiṣa jīvaḥ parasyātmano jalasūryakādivatpratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7740: ataśca yathā naikasmiñjalasūryake kampamāne jalasūryakāntaraṃ kampate,
GSP33brssgo2u:7745: yeṣāṃ tu bahava ātmānaste ca sarve sarvagatāsteṣāmevaiṣa vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7747: bahavo vibhavaścātmānaścaitanyamātrasvarūpā nirguṇā niratiśayāśca tadarthaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ pradhānaṃ tannimittaiṣāṃ bhogāpavargasiddhiriti sāṃkhyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7748: sati bahutve vibhutve ca ghaṭakuḍyādisamānā dravyamātrasvarūpāḥ svato 'cetanā ātmanastadupakaraṇāni cāṇūni manāṃsyacetanāni /
GSP33brssgo2u:7749: tatrātmadravyāṇāṃ manodravyāṇāṃ ca saṃyogānnavecchādayo vaiśeṣikā ātmaguṇā utpadyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:7750: te cāvyatirekeṇa pratyekamātmasu samavayanti sa saṃsāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7752: tatra sāṃkhyānāṃ tāvaccaitanyasvarūpatvātsarvātmanāṃ saṃnidhānādyaviśeṣāccaikasya sukhaduḥkhasaṃbandhe sarveṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhasaṃbandhaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7760: asatyāṃ punarupapattau kāmaṃ mā bhūdabhilaṣitaṃ puruṣakaivalyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7762: kāṇādānāmapi yadaikenātmanā manaḥ saṃyujyate tadātmāntarairapi nāntarīyakaḥ saṃyogaḥ syātsaṃnidhānādyaviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7763: tataśca hetvaviśeṣātphalāviśeṣa ityekasyātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoge sarvātmanāmapi samānaṃ sukhaduḥkhitvaṃ prasajyeta // 50 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7765: saṃprati evakāreṇāvacchedapakṣāruciṃ sūcayan 'rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūva'ityādiśrutisiddhaṃpratibimbapakṣamupanyasyati bhagavān sūtrakāraḥ-ābhāsa eva ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7771: asmin pakṣe buddhipratibimbabhedātsvargī nārakītyādivyavasthā jīvatvasyāvidyakatvādvidyayā mokṣaścetyupapadyata ityāha-ataścetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7772: yastvayaṃ bhāskarasya pralāpaḥ pratibimbasya nopādhisaṃsṛṣṭatayā kalpitatvaṃ kintu svarūpeṇaiva,
GSP33brssgo2u:7773: ataḥ kalpitapratibimbasya muktau sthityayogānna jīvatvamiti sa siddhāntarahasyājñānakṛta ityupekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7774: yadi darpaṇe mukhaṃ śuktau rajatavatkalpitaṃ syāttadā nedaṃ rajatamiti svarūpabādhavannedaṃ mukhamiti bādhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7783: sarveṣāṃ puṃsāṃ prakṛtisāṃnidhyādyaviśeṣe 'pi prakṛtireva pratipuruṣaṃ niyamena bhogāpavargārthaṃ pravartate,
GSP33brssgo2u:7785: anyathā niyatapravṛttyanaṅgīkāre svamāhātmyakhyāpanārthā pradhānasya pravṛttirityuddeśyavighātaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7788: yo hi niyāmakabhāvenoddeśyavighātamāpādayati taṃ prati tasyaivāpādanamiṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7792: yadātmādṛṣṭakṛto yo manaḥsaṃyogaḥ sa tadātmana eva sukhādiheturiti vyavasthāṃ śaṅkate-syādetaditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:7802: sāṃkhyānāṃ tāvattadanātmasamavāyi pradhānavarti pradhānasādhāraṇyānna pratyātmaṃ sukhaduḥkhopabhogasya niyāmakamupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7803: kāṇādānāmapi pūrvavatsādhāraṇenātmamanaḥsaṃyogena nirvartitasyādṛṣṭasyāpyasyaivātmana idamadṛṣṭamiti niyame hetvabhāvādeṣa eva doṣaḥ // 51 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7805: ahamidaṃ phalaṃ prāpnavānīdaṃ pariharāṇītthaṃ prayatā itthaṃ karavāṇītyevaṃvidhā abhisaṃdhyādayaḥ pratyātmaṃ pravartamānā adṛṣṭasyātmanāṃ ca svasvāmibhāvaṃ niyaṃsyantīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7813: abhisaṃdhyādīnāmapi sādhāraṇenaivātmamanaḥsaṃyogena sarvātmasaṃnidhau kriyamāṇānāṃ niyamahetutvānupapatteruktadoṣānuṣaṅga eva // 52 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7820_0: athocyeta vibhutve 'pyatmanaḥ śarīrapratiṣṭhena manasā saṃyogaḥ śarīrāvacchinna evātmapradeśe
GSP33brssgo2u:7820_1: bhaviṣyatīti ataḥ pradeśakṛtā vyavasthābhisaṃdhyādīnāmadṛṣṭasya sukhaduḥkhayośca bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7825: tatra na vaiśeṣikaiḥ śarīrāvacchinno 'pyātmānaḥ pradeśaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7826: kalpyamāno 'pyayaṃ niṣpradeśasyātmanaḥ pradeśaḥ kālpanikatvādeva na pāramārthikaṃ kāryaṃ niyantuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7827: śarīramapi sarvātmasaṃnidhāvutpadyamānamasyaivātmano netareṣāmiti na niyantuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7828: pradeśaviśeṣābhyupagame 'pi ca dvayorātmanoḥ samānasukhaduḥkhabhājoḥ kadācidekenaiva tāvaccharīreṇopabhogasiddhiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7830_1: yajñadattaśarīre ca taṃ pradeśamanuprāpte tasyāpītareṇa samānaḥ sukhaduḥkhānubhavo
GSP33brssgo2u:7830_2: dṛśyate sa na syādyadi devadattayajñadattayoḥ samānapradeśamaniṣṭaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7852: kāryamabhisaṃdhyādikaṃ yasyātmano yaccharīraṃ tatra tasyaiva bhoga iti vyavasthāmāśaṅkyāha-śarīramapīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7854: yasminnātmapradeśe 'dṛṣṭotpattiḥ sa kiṃ calaḥ sthito vā /
GSP33brssgo2u:7856: dvitīye tasminneva pradeśe parasyāpi bhogadarśanādadṛṣṭamastītyekenāpi śarīreṇa dvayorātmanorbhogaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7858_0: kiñca yattu yatrātmanaḥ pradeśe śarīrādisaṃyogādadṛṣṭamutpannaṃ tattatraivācalapradeśe
GSP33brssgo2u:7858_1: sthitamiti svargādiśarīrāvacchinnātmanyadṛṣṭābhāvādbhogo na syādataḥ pradeśabhedo na vyavasthāpakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7862: yadapi kecidāhuḥ-manasa ekatve 'pyātmanāṃ bhedena saṃyogavyaktīnāṃ bhedātkayācitsaṃyogavyaktyā kasmiṃścedevātmanyadṛṣṭādikamityasāṃkaryamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7875: tathāca devadattātmā yajñadattātmano na bhinnaḥ ātmatvāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:7878: nityadravyamātravṛttayo viśeṣāste ca svayaṃ svāśrayavyāvartakā eva na sveṣāṃ vyāvartakamapekṣanta ityantyā ucyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:7886: yattu bahūnāṃ vibhutve ākāśadikkālā dṛṣṭānta iti so 'pyasaṃmata ityāha-ākāśādīnāmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7889: evaṃ bhūtabhoktṛśrutīnāṃ virodhābhāvādbrahmaṇyadvaye samanvaya iti siddham //53//
GSP33brssgo2u:7891: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śrīśārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 3 //
GSP33brssgo2u:7892: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3//
GSP33brssgo2u:7907: iti caivamādiṣūtpattiprakaraṇeṣu prāṇānāmutpajirnāmnāyate kvaciccānutpattirevaiṣāmāmnāyate 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' (tai. 2.7)
GSP33brssgo2u:7910: prāṇā vāva ṛṣayaḥ' ityatra prāgutpatteḥ prāṇānāṃ sadbhāvaśravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:7911: anyatra tu prāṇānāmapyutpattiḥ paṭhyate- 'yathāgnerjvalataḥ kṣudrā visphuliṅgā vyuccarantyevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ' iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:7914: iti, 'sa prāṇamasṛjata prāṇācchraddhāṃ khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivīndriyaṃ mano 'nnam' (pra. 6.4)
GSP33brssgo2u:7932: atra prāṇotpattivādivākyajātamujadāharaṇam- 'etasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti' (bṛ. 2.1.20)
GSP33brssgo2u:7934: tatra yathā lokādayaḥ parasmādbrahmaṇa utpadyante tathā prāṇā apītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7935: tathā- 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī' (muṇḍa. 2.1.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:7939: yathātītānantarapādādyuktā viyadādayaḥ parasya brahmaṇo vikārāḥ samadhigatāstathā prāṇā api parasya brahmaṇo vikārā iti yojayitavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7942: nanu keṣucitpradeśeṣu na prāṇānāmutpattiḥ śrūyata ityuktaṃ tadayuktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7949: yathā tṛtīyādhyaye caturthapādeṣvapratigraheṣvadhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyo bahusūtravyavahito 'pi somavamane parāmṛśyate tadvadatrāpi jñeyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7950: pūrvādhikaraṇe kartuḥ svarūpaṃ vicārya tadupakaraṇānāmindriyāṇāmutpatti sādhayati-tathā prāṇāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7951: bhūtabhoktṛvicārānantaraṃ bhautikaprāṇavicāra iti hetuhetumadbhāvaṃ pādayoḥ saṃgatimāha-viyadādīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7955: te kimutpadyante na veti śrutīnāṃ vipratipattyā saṃśaye tāsāṃ samabalatvādanirṇaya ityaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7964: yadyapyadṛṣṭavatprāṇā apyaniyatā iti sūtramanveti tathāpi punaruktam /
GSP33brssgo2u:7973_1: kimiyaṃ vāruṇīṣṭirdāturuta pratigrahīturiti viśaye 'pratigṛhṇīyāt'iti śruteḥ pratigrahīturityāśaṅkya
GSP33brssgo2u:7974: ataḥ pratigṛhṇīyādityasya padasyāśvān yaḥ pratigrāhayedityarthaḥ dadyāditi yāvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:7975: 'yo 'śvadātā sa vāruṇīmiṣṭiṃ kuryāt'iti vākyārthe sthite cintā-aśvadānanimitteyamiṣṭiḥ kiṃ laukike 'śvadāne vaidike veti /
GSP33brssgo2u:7977_1: syāditi sūtreṇa prāpte siddhāntaḥ-'atra hi varuṇo vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti yo 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇāti'iti
GSP33brssgo2u:7979: naca laukike 'śvadāne 'yaṃ rogo bhavati iti prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:7982: naca vṛṇotīti vyutpattyā varuṇaśabdo niṣedhātikramakṛtadoṣānuvādaka iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7984: tattyāge ca vaidike 'pi dāne 'śvatyāgajanyaduḥkhaṃ prāptamuktavyutpattyā śaknotyanuvadituṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:7986: somapāne kriyamāṇe vyāpadvamanaṃ yadi syāttadā 'etaṃ saumendraṃ śyāmākaṃ caruṃ nirvapet'iti śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:7988_0: tadvallaukike dhātusāmyārthaṃ pītasomasya vamane 'yaṃ caruḥ syādvamananimittendriyaśoṣākhyadoṣasya
GSP33brssgo2u:7988_1: dṛṣṭasya 'indriyeṇa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yaḥ somaṃ vamati'ityanuvādāditi pūrvapakṣasūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7989: vaidike tu somapāne śeṣapratipatterjātatvādvamane 'pina doṣa iti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:7991: vede tu 'mā me vāṅnābhimatigāḥ'iti sāmyagjaraṇārthamantraliṅgādvamane karmavaiguṇyāttasya doṣatā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8003: iti hyekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya tatsādhanāyedamāmnāyate- 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ' (muṇḍa. 2.1.3) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo2u:8004: sā ca pratijñā prāṇādeḥ samastasya jāgato brahmavikāratve sati prakṛtivyatirekeṇa vikārābhāvātsiddhyati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8006: tathāca pratijñātārthamupasaṃharati- 'puruṣa evedaṃ viśvaṃ karma tapo brahma parāmṛtam' (muṇḍa. 2.2.11)
GSP33brssgo2u:8008: tathā 'ātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇena matyā vijñānenedaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' ityevañjātīyakāsu śrutiṣveṣaiva pratijñā yojayitavyā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8013: avāntaraprakṛtiviṣayaṃ tvetatsvavavikārāpekṣaṃ pragutpatteḥ prāṇānāṃ sadbhāvāvadhāraṇamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8015: viyadadhikaraṇe hi 'gauṇyasaṃbhavāt' iti pūrvapakṣasūtratvādgauṇī janmaśrutirasaṃbhavāditi vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8018: tadanurodena tvihāpi gauṇī janmaśrutisaṃbhavāditi vyācakṣāṇaiḥ pratijñāhānirupekṣitā syāt // 2 //
GSP33brssgo2u:8019: nanu pratijñāpi gauṇī kaṃ na syādityata āha-tathāca pratijñātārthamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8024: nedaṃ vākyaṃ mahāpralaye paramakāraṇasya brahmaṇaḥ prāṇavattvaparaṃ kintvavāntarapralaye hiraṇyagarbhākhyāvāntaraprakṛtirūpaprāṇasadbhāvaparamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8025: nanu hiraṇyagarbharūpavikārasya sattve kathaṃ tadā vikārāsattvakathanaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8028_0: nanu yathāśruti mahāpralaye prāṇasadbhāvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ prāṇānutpattisādhakaṃ kimityavāntarapralayaparatayā
GSP33brssgo2u:8028_1: nīyata iti cet 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ'ityādi prabalajanmaśrutibalāditi vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8029: nanu vikārasya brahmaṇaḥ kathaṃ prakṛtitvamityata āha-vyākṛteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8030: 'hiraṇyagarbheḥ samavartatāgre'ityādiśrutau 'ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ'ityādi smṛtau ca vikārātmanāmapi mūlakāraṇāvasthārūpāṇāṃ brahmavirāḍādīnāṃ prakṛtivikārabhāvena prasiddhirasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8039: yajjāyata ityekaṃ janmavācipadaṃ prāṇeṣu prākśrutaṃ saduttareṣvapyākāśādiṣvanuvartate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8041: ityatrākāśādiṣu mukhyaṃ janmeti pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ tatsāmānyātprāṇeṣvapi mukhyameva janma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8042: nahyekasminprakaraṇa ekasmiṃśca vākya ekaḥ śabdaḥ sakṛduccarito bahubhiḥ saṃbadhyamānaḥ kvacinmukhyaḥ kvacidgauṇa ityadhyavasātuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8045: ityatrāpi prāṇeṣu śrutaḥ sṛjatiḥ pareṣvapyutpattimatsu śraddhādiṣvanuṣajyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8046: yatrāpi paścacchruta utpattivacanaḥ śabdaḥ pūrvaiḥ saṃbadhyate tatrāpyeṣa eva nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8047: yathā 'sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti' ityayamante paṭhito vyuccarantiśabdaḥ pūrvairapi prāṇādibhiḥ saṃbadhyate // 3 //
GSP33brssgo2u:8048: tasya jāyata iti padasyākāśādiṣu mukhyasya pāṭhāpekṣayā prācīneṣu prāṇeṣu śrutermukhyaṃ janmeti sūtrayojanā-tatsāmānyāditi /
GSP33brssgo2u:8050: ekasminvākye ekasya śabdasya kvacinmukhyatvaṃ kvacidgauṇatvamiti vairūpyaṃ na yuktamiti nyāyamanyatrāpyatidiśati-yatrāpi paścācchruta iti //3//
GSP33brssgo2u:8058: tathāpi brahmaprakṛtikatejobannapīrvakatvābhidhānādvākprāṇamanasāṃ tatsāmānyācca sarveṣāmeva prāṇānāṃ brahmaprabhavatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8059: tathāhi- asminneva prakaraṇe tejobannapūrvakatvaṃ vākprāṇamanasāmāmnāyate- 'annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāk' (chā. 6.5.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8060: tatra yadi tāvanmukhyamevaiṣāmannādimayatvaṃ tato vartata eva brahmaprabhavatvam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8061: atha bhāktaṃ tatāpi brahmakartṛkāyāṃ nāmarūpavyākriyāyāṃ śravaṇāt 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' (chā. 6.1.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:8070: atra mayaḍvikāre mukhya iti pakṣe vartata eva prāṇānāṃ brahmakāryatvaṃ tejobannānāṃ brahmavikāratvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8071_1: vikāratve bhūtādhīnasthitikatvaṃ liṅgaṃ mayaṭoktamiti siddhaṃ brahmakāryatvaṃ 'sa
GSP33brssgo2u:8072: tasmātprāṇānāmutpattiśrutīnāṃ sadbhāvaśrutyavirodhātkāraṇe brahmaṇi samanvaya iti siddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:8082: saṃprati tu katītare prāṇā iti saṃpradhārayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8084: kvacitsapta prāṇāḥ saṃkīrtyante- 'sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmāt' (muṇḍa. 2.1.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8085: kvaciccāṣṭau prāṇā grahatvena guṇena saṃkīrtyante- ' aṣṭau grahā aṣṭāvatigrahāḥ'' (bṛ. 3.2.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8086: kvacinnava- 'sapta vai śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇā dvāvavāñcau' (tai. saṃ. 5.1.7.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8087: kvaciddaśa- 'nava vai puruṣe prāṇā nābhirdaśamī' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8091: evaṃ hi vipratipannāḥ prāṇeyattāṃ prati śrutayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8102: puruṣabhedābhiprāyeyaṃ vīpsā pratipuruṣaṃ sapta sapta prāṇā iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:8103: na tattvabhedābhiprāyā sapta saptānye 'nye prāṇā iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8104: nanvaṣṭatvādikāpi saṃkhāyā prāṇeṣūdāhṛtā kathaṃ saptaiva syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8116: evaṃ janmalabdhasattākānāṃ prāṇānāmupajīvyopajīvakatvasaṃgatyā sāṃkhyāṃ nirṇetuṃ śrutīnāṃ virodhātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣayati-saptagaterviśeṣitatvācca /
GSP33brssgo2u:8119: pañca dhīndriyāṇi vāṅmanaśceti sapta prāṇā eta eva hastena sahāṣṭau /
GSP33brssgo2u:8121: gṛhṇanti badhnantīti grahā indriyāṇi teṣāṃ bandhakatvaṃ viṣayādhīnamityatigrahāḥ grahānatikrāntā viṣayā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8122: dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣi dve ghrāṇe vākceti sapta śīrṣṇi bhavāḥ prāṇā dvāvavāñcau pāyūpasthau ceti nava,
GSP33brssgo2u:8123: jñānakarmendriyāṇi daśeme puruṣe dehe prāṇāḥ ātmā mana ekādaśa prāṇā iti siddhāntakoṭiruktā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8126: śrutitaḥ saptatvāvagaterye śīrṣaṇyāḥ sapta te prāṇā iti śīrṣaṇyoddeśena prāṇatvaviśeṣaṇādvā śīrṣaṇyānāṃ prāṇatvaśabditā,
GSP33brssgo2u:8138: hastādayastvapare saptabhyo 'tiriktāḥ prāṇāḥ śrūyante- 'hastau vai grahaḥ sa karmaṇātigraheṇa gṛhīto hastābhyāṃ hi karma karoti' (bṛ. 3.2.8)
GSP33brssgo2u:8141: hīnādhikasaṃkhyāvipratipattau hyadhikā saṃkhyā saṃgrāhyā bhavati tasyāṃ hīnāntarbhavati natu hīnāyāmadhikā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8142: ataśca naivaṃ mantavyaṃ stokakalpanānurodhātsaptaiva prāṇāḥ syuriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8144: tathā codāhṛtā śrutiḥ - 'daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśaḥ' (bṛ. 3.9.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8149: nanvekādaśābhyaḥ kāryajātebhyo 'dhikaṃ kāryajātamasti yadarthamadhikaṃ karaṇaṃ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:8151: vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandāḥ pañca karmabhedāstadarthāni ca pañca karmendriyāṇi /
GSP33brssgo2u:8153: tadeva vṛttibhedāt kvacidbhinnavadvyapadiśyate- 'mano buddhiraṅaṃkāraścittaṃ ca' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8154: tathāca śrutiḥ kāmādyā nānāvidhā vṛttiranukramyāha- 'etatsarvaṃ mana eva' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8155: apica saptaiva śīrṣaṇyānprāṇānabhimanyamānasya catvāra eva prāṇā abhimatāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8156: sthānabhedāddhyete catvāraḥ santaḥ sapta gaṇyante 'dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī dve nāsike ekā vāk' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8157: naca tāvatāmeva vṛttibhedā itare prāṇā iti śakyate vaktuṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8160: ityatrāpi dehacchidrabhedābhiprāyeṇaiva daśa prāṇā ucyante na prāṇatattvabhedābhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33brssgo2u:8163: mukhyasya tu prāṇasya bhavati nābhirapyekaṃ viśeṣāyatanamityato nābhirdaśamītyucyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8165: tadevaṃ vicitre prāṇeyattāmnāne sati kva kiṃparamāmnānamiti vivektavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8168: saptaiva prāṇāḥ syuryataḥ saptānāmeva gatiḥ śrūyate- 'tamutkrāmantaṃ prāṇo 'nūtkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇā anūtkrāmanti' (bṛ. 4.4.2) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo2u:8172: saptaiva hi prāṇāścakṣurādayastvakparyantā viśeṣitā iha prakṛtāḥ 'sa yatraiva cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣaḥ parāṅparyāvartate 'thārūpajño bhavati' (bṛ. 4.4.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:8175: prakṛtagāmī ca sarvaśabdo bhavati yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā iti ye nimantritāḥ prakṛtā brāhmaṇāsta eva sarvaśabdenocyante nānye /
GSP33brssgo2u:8176: evamihāpi ye prakṛtāḥ sapta prāṇāsta eva sarvaśabdenocyante nānya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8182: evaṃprāpte brūmaḥ - hastādayastvapare saptabhyo 'tiriktāḥ prāṇāḥ pratīyante-' hastau vai grahaḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.8)
GSP33brssgo2u:8186: sa ca kṣetrajño naikasminneva śarīre badhyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:8189: tathāca smṛtiḥ - puryaṣṭakena liṅgena prāṇādyena sa yujyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8190: tena baddhasya vai bandho mokṣo muktasya tena ca /
GSP33brssgo2u:8192_0: ātharvaṇe ca viṣayendriyānukramaṇe cakṣuṣa draṣṭavyaṃ ca ityatra tulyavaddhastādīnīndriyāṇi
GSP33brssgo2u:8192_1: saviṣayāṇyanukrāmati-' hastau cādātavyaṃ copasthaścānandayitavyaṃ ca pāyuśca visarjayitavyaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:8192_2: ca pādau ca gantavyaṃ ca' ( pra. 4.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8193: tathā 'daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśaste yadāsmāccharīrānmartyādutkrāmantyatha rodayanti' (bṛ. 3.9.4)
GSP33brssgo2u:8196: sarvaśabdo 'pi ca prāṇaśabdena saṃbadhyamāno 'śeṣānprāṇānabhidadhāno na prakaraṇavaśena saptasvevāvasthāpayituṃ śakyate,
GSP33brssgo2u:8198: sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatrāpi sarveṣāmevāvanivartināṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8206: FN: guhāyāṃ hṛdaye śerata iti guhāśayāḥ svastāneṣu nihitāḥ nikṣiptāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8211: prāṇādipañcakaṃ bhūtasūkṣmapañcakaṃ jñānendriyapañcakaṃ karmendriyapañcakaṃ antaḥkaraṇacatuṣṭayaṃ avidyā kāmaḥ karma ceti paryuṣṭakam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8215: tato varaṃ prāthamikasaptatve 'ntarbhāvaḥ lāghavāditi prāpte siddhāntayati-atreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8218: ato 'dhikasaṃkhyāyā nyūnāyāmantarbhāvāyogātsaptaiva prāṇāḥ syurlāghavānurodhādityevaṃ na mantavyamityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8220: 'śrutīnāṃ mitho virodhe sati mānāntarānugṛhītā śrutirbalīyasī'iti nyāyena kāryaliṅgānumānānugṛhītaikādaśaprāṇaśrutyanusāreṇānyāḥ śrutayo neyā ityabhisaṃdhāyāha-satyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8227: teṣāṃ tadvṛttitve badhirādīnāmādānādi na syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8228: kathaṃ tarhi chidre prāṇaśabda ityāśaṅkya lakṣaṇayetyāha-mukhyasya tviti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8232: nanvidaṃ sūtravyākhyānamasaṃgataṃ pañcadhīndriyāvāṅmanasāṃ saptatvāvagatiḥ śīrṣaṇyānāṃ caturṇāṃ viśeṣitatvamiti hetorvaiyadhikaraṇyāduktaparisaṃkhyādoṣāccetyarucerāha-iyamapareti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8234: taṃ jīvātmānaṃ ye prāṇāḥ saha gacchanti teṣāmeva bhogahetutvādindriyatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8235: vipannāvasthāyāmeva cākṣupaścakṣuṣi sthito 'nugrāhakasūryāṃśarūpaḥ puruṣaḥ parāṅ paryāvartate bahirdeśātsvāṃśinaṃ surye pratigacchati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8237: devāṃśe devaṃ praviṣṭe liṅgāṃśaścakṣurhṛdaye manasaikībhavati tadāyaṃ na paśyatīti pārśvasthā āhurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8238: ādipadāt 'na jighrati na vadati na ramayate na śṛṇoti na manute na spṛśati na vijānāti'iti gṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8242_1: kāmaḥ karma ceti puryaṣṭakamātmano jñāpakatvālliṅgaṃ sati saṃbhave sarvaśrutisaṃkoco
GSP33brssgo2u:8253: sūkṣmā ete prāṇāḥ sthūlāścetsyurmaraṇakāle śarīrānnirgacchanto bilādahirivopalabhyeranmriyamāṇasya pārśvasthaiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8258: yadeva hyupalabdhisādhanaṃ vṛttiranyadvā tasyaiva naḥ karaṇatvaṃ saṃjñāmātre vivāda iti karaṇānāṃ vyāpitvakalpanā nirarthikā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8264: 'prāṇāḥ sarve 'nantāḥ'iti śruterindriyāṇāṃ vibhutvātteṣāmutkrāntirasiddhā kintu tattaddehe teṣāmabhivyaktirūpāḥ prādeśikyo vṛttayaḥ santi na tāsāmutkrāntyādiriti sāṃkhyānāmākṣepaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8265: tatsaṃgatyā prāṇāḥ kiṃparimāṇā iti saṃdehe siddhāntayati-adhunetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8285: nāsadāsīye hi brahmapradhāne sūkte mantravarṇo bhavati 'na mṛtyurāsīdamṛtaṃ na tarhi na rātryā ahnu āsītpraketaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8286: ānīdavātaṃ svadhayā tadekaṃ tasmāddhānyanna paraḥ kiñcanāsa' (ṛ.saṃ. 8.7.17) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8292: 'aprāṇo hyamanāḥ śubhraḥ' iti ca mulaprakṛteḥ prāṇādisamastaviśeṣarahitatvasya darśitatvāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8294: śreṣṭha iti ca mukhyaṃ prāṇamabhidadhāti- 'prāṇo vāva jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca' (chā. 5.1.1)
GSP33brssgo2u:8297: na cetasya tadānīṃ vṛttilābhaḥ syādyonau niṣiktaṃ śukraṃ pūyeta na saṃbhavedvā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8302: FN: tarhi tadā pralayakāle mṛtyurmārako mṛtyumatkāryaṃ vā nāsīt,
GSP33brssgo2u:8304: rātryāḥ praketaścihnarūpaścandraḥ ahaḥ praketaḥ sūryaśca nāstāṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8310: nanu prāṇo jāyate na veti saṃśayābhāvādatideśo na yukta ityākṣipati-kimartha iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8313: tarhi tadā pralayakāle mṛtyurmārako mṛtyumatkāryaṃ vā nāsīt,
GSP33brssgo2u:8315: rātryāḥ praketaścihnarūpaścandraḥ ahnaḥ praketaḥ sūryaśca nāstāṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8318: yadvā svena dhṛtā māyā svadhā tayā saha tadekaṃ brahmānīdāsīditi paramārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8320: tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ paraḥ paramutkṛṣṭamanyacca kimapi na babhūvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8321: parihāraḥ subodhaḥ nanu śreṣṭhaśabdasya prāṇe prasiddhyabhāvātkathaṃ sūtramiti,
GSP33brssgo2u:8333: sa punarmukhyaḥ prāṇaḥ kiṃsvarūpa itīdānīṃ jijñāsyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8335: evaṃ hi śrūyate- 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ sa eṣa vāyuḥ pañcavidhaḥ prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samānaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8337: evaṃ hi tantrāntarīyā ācakṣate- 'sāmānyā karaṇavṛttiḥ prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañce' ti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8338: atrocyate- na vāyuḥ prāṇo nāpi karaṇavyāpāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8340: vāyostāvatprāṇasya pṛthagupadeśo bhavati- 'prāṇa eva brahmaṇaścaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ sa vāyunā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca' (chāndo. 3.18.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8345: nahi karaṇavyāpāra eva san karaṇebhyaḥ pṛthagupadiśyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:8348: ityevamādayo 'pi vāyoḥ karaṇebhyaśca prāṇasya pṛthagupadeśā anusartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8352: yathaitapañjaravartina ekādaśapakṣiṇaḥ pratyekaṃ pratiniyatavyāpārāḥ santaḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ pañjaraṃ cālayanti,
GSP33brssgo2u:8353: evamekaśarīravartina ekādaśa prāṇāḥ pratyekaṃ pratiniyatavṛttayaḥ santaḥ saṃbhūyaikāṃ prāṇākhyāṃ vṛttiṃ pratilapsyanta iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8355: yuktaṃ tatra pratyekavṛttibhiravāntaravyāpāraiḥ pañjaracālanānurūpairevopetāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ pañjaraṃ cālayeyuriti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8357: iha tu śravaṇādyavāntaravyāpāropetāḥ prāṇa na saṃbhūya prāṇyuriti yuktam,
GSP33brssgo2u:8360: tathā prāṇasya śreṣṭhatvādyudghoṣaṇaṃ guṇabhāvopagamaśca taṃ prati vāgādīnāṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8363: kathaṃ tarhīyaṃ śrutiḥ 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8364: ucyate- vāyurevāyamadhyātmamāpannaḥ pañcavyūho viśeṣātmanāvatiṣṭhamānaḥ prāṇo nāma bhaṇyate na tattvāntaraṃ nāpi vāyumātram /
GSP33brssgo2u:8369_0: tathāhyanekavidhā vibhūtiḥ prāṇasya śrāvyate- 'supteṣu vāgādiṣu prāṇa eko hi jāgarti
GSP33brssgo2u:8369_1: prāṇa eko mṛtyunānāptaḥ prāṇaḥ saṃvargo vāgādīnsaṃvṛṅ kte prāṇa itarānprāṇānrakṣati
GSP33brssgo2u:8373: mukhyaḥ prāṇaḥ kiṃ vāyumātramuta karaṇānāṃ sādhāraṇavyāpāra āhosvittattvāntaramiti vāyuprāṇayorbhedābhedaśrutīnāṃ mithovirodhātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8377: tatra prāṇo vāyunādhidaivikena bhātyabhivyañjyate abhivyaktaḥ saṃstapati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8379: śrutiṣu tatra tatra prāṇasya vāgādīnāṃ ca mithaḥ saṃvādaliṅgena pṛthagutpattiliṅgena cendriyatadabhinnavyāpārebhyo 'pi bhinnatvamityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8380: prāṇasyendriyavṛttitvaṃ śrutyā nirasya yuktyāpi nirasyati-naca samastānāmiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8381: yā cakṣuḥ-sādhyā vṛttiḥ saiva na śrotrādisādhyā,
GSP33brssgo2u:8388: kiñca prāṇasya vṛttitve vāgādīnāmeva prādhānyaṃ vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8390: yathā mṛdo ghaṭo na vastvantaraṃ nāpi mṛṇmātraṃ tadvikāratvāt,
GSP33brssgo2u:8392: dehaṃ prāptaḥ pañcāvastho vikārātmanā sthito vāyureva prāṇa ityarthaḥ //9//
GSP33brssgo2u:8399: yathā cakṣurādīni rājaprakṛtivajjīvasya kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca pratyupakaraṇāni na svatantrāṇi /
GSP33brssgo2u:8400: tathā mukhyo 'pi prāṇo rājamantrivajjīvasya sarvārthakaratvenopakaraṇabhūto na svatantraḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8404: samānadharmāṇāṃ ca saha śāsanaṃ yuktaṃ bṛhadrathantarādivat /
GSP33brssgo2u:8410: yathā bṛhadrathantarayoḥ sarvatra sahaprayujyamānatvena sāmatvena vā sāmyātsahapāṭhastathā karaṇaiḥ sahopakaraṇatvena sāmyātprāṇasya pāṭha iti na hetvasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8420: rūpādyālocanādibhirvṛttibhiryathāsvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ jīvaṃ prati karaṇabhāvo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8421: apicaikādaśaiva kāryajātāni rūpālocanādīni parigaṇitāni yadarthamekādaśa prāṇāḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ natu dvādaśamaparaṃ kāryajātamadhigamyate yadarthamayaṃ dvādaśaḥ prāṇaḥ pratijñāyeteti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8423: akaraṇatvāc ca na doṣas tathā hi darśayati / BBs_2,4.11 /
GSP33brssgo2u:8429_0: tathāhi śrutiḥ prāṇāntareṣvasaṃbhāvyamānaṃ mukhyaprāṇasya vaiśeṣikaṃ kāryaṃ darśayati
GSP33brssgo2u:8429_1: prāṇasaṃvādādiṣu- 'atha ha prāṇā ahaṃśreyasi vyūdire' ityupakramya 'yasminva utkrānte
GSP33brssgo2u:8429_2: śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataramiva dṛśyate sa vaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ' (chā. 5.1.6,7)
GSP33brssgo2u:8430_0: iti copanyasya pratyekaṃ vāgādyutkramaṇena tadvṛttimātrahīnaṃ yathāpūrvaṃ jīvanaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:8430_1: darśayitvā prāṇoccikramiṣāyāṃ vāgādiśaithilyāpattiṃ śarīrapātaprasaṅgaṃ ca darśayantī
GSP33brssgo2u:8431: 'tāvanvariṣṭhaḥ prāṇa uvāca mā mohamāpadyathāhamevaitatpañcadhātmānaṃ pravibhajyaitadbāṇamavaṣṭabhya vidhārayāmi,
GSP33brssgo2u:8433: 4.3.12) iti ca supteṣu cakṣurādiṣu prāṇanimittāṃ śarīrarakṣāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8435: 'tena yadaśnāti yatpibati tenetarānprāṇānavati' iti ca prāṇanimittāṃ śarīrendriyapuṣṭiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8436: 'kasminnvahamutkrānta utkrānto bhaviṣyāmi kasminvā pratiṣṭhite pratiṣṭhāsyāmi' iti,
GSP33brssgo2u:8437: 'sa prāṇamasṛjata' iti ca prāṇanimitte jīvasyotkrāntapratiṣṭhe darśayati // 11 // @#----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:8443: nanu yadbhogopakaraṇaṃ tatsaviṣayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā cakṣurādikaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8445_1: nirviṣayasyāpi prāṇasya śarīravadbhogopakaraṇatvamakṣataṃ na tu cakṣurādivajjñānakarmakaraṇatvamasti
GSP33brssgo2u:8452: tena prāṇena yadaśnāti jīvastvena prāṇakṛtāśaneneti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo2u:8459: yatkāraṇaṃ pañcavṛttirayaṃ vyapadiśyate śrutiṣu 'prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samānaḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8467: yathā manasaḥ pañca vṛttaya evaṃ prāṇasyāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8468: śrotrādinimittāḥ śabdādiviṣayā manasaḥ pañca vṛttayaḥ prasiddhāḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8469: natu kāmaḥ saṃkalpaḥ ityādyāḥ paripaṭhitāḥ parigṛhyeran /
GSP33brssgo2u:8471: nanvatrāpi śrotrādinirapekṣā bhūtabhaviṣyadādiviṣayāparā manaso vṛttirastīti samānaḥ pañcasaṃkhyātirekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8472_0: evaṃ tarhi 'paramatamapratiṣiddhamanumataṃ bhavati' iti nyāyādihāpi yogaśāstraprasiddhā
GSP33brssgo2u:8473: bahuvṛttitvamātreṇa vā manaḥ prāṇasya nidarśanamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8483: kāmādivṛttivajjñāne 'pi pañcatvaniyamo nāstītyaruciṃ svayamevodbhāvya pakṣāntaraṃ gṛhṇāti-nanvatrāpītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8501: nanu vibhutvamapi prāṇasya samāmnāyate- 'samaḥ pluṣiṇā samo maśakena samo nāgena sama ebhistribhirlokaiḥ samo 'nena sarveṇa (bṛ. 1.3.22)
GSP33brssgo2u:8503: taducyate- ādhidaivikena samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpeṇa hairaṇyagarṇeṇa prāṇātmanaivaitadvibhutvamāmnāyate nādhyātmikena /
GSP33brssgo2u:8504: apica samaḥ pluṣiṇetyādinā sāmyavacanena pratiprāṇivartinaḥ prāṇasya pariccheda eva pradarśyate tasmādadoṣaḥ // 13 // @#----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:8506: FN: pluṣirmaśakādapi sūkṣmo jantuḥ, nāgo hastī /
GSP33brssgo2u:8513: śrutyā vibhutvamiti virodhe ādhyātmikaprāṇasyālpatvamādhidaivikasya vibhutvamiti viṣayabhedācchrutyoravirodha iti samādhatte-taducyata iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8514: kiñcopakrame prāṇasya pluṣyādisamatvenālpatvokteḥ sama ebhistribhirlokairiti virāḍdehasāmyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8525_0: te punaḥ prakṛtāḥ prāṇāḥ kiṃ svamahimnaiva svasmai kāryāya prabhavantyāhosviddevatādhiṣṭhitāḥ
GSP33brssgo2u:8525_1: prabhavantīti vicāryate- tatra prāptaṃ tāvadyathā svakāryaśaktiyogātsvamahimnaiva
GSP33brssgo2u:8526: apica devatādhiṣṭhitānāṃ prāṇānāṃ pravṛttāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ tāsāmevādhiṣṭhātrīṇāṃ devatānāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgāccharīrasya bhoktṛtvaṃ pralīyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:8528: evaṃ prāptaṃ idamucyate- jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8530: jyotirādibhiragnyādyabhimāninībhirdevatābhiradhiṣṭhitaṃ vāgādi karaṇajātaṃ svakāryeṣu pravartata iti pratijānīte /
GSP33brssgo2u:8534: nahi devatāsaṃbandhaṃ pratyākhyāyāgnervāci mukhe vā kaścidviśeṣasaṃbandho dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8537: tathānyatrāpi vāgeva brahmaṇaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ so 'gninā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca' (chā. 3.18.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:8539: 'sa vai vācameva prathamāmatyavahatsā yadā mṛtyumatyamucyata so 'gnirabhavat' (bṛ. 1.3.12)
GSP33brssgo2u:8552: sa prāṇo vācaṃ prathamāmudgīthakarmāṇi pradhānāṃ anṛtādipāpmarūpaṃ mṛtyumatītyāvahanmṛtyunā muktāṃ kṛtvā agnidevatātmatvaṃ prāpitavān /
GSP33brssgo2u:8554_0: 'vācā hi nāmānyabhivadati cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyati'iti tṛtīyāśrutyānvayavyatirekavatyā
GSP33brssgo2u:8555: naca svakārye śaktānāmapi vāgādīnāmacetanatvādadhiṣṭhātrapekṣā na virudhyata iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8558: tathā caikatrānekabhoktṛṇāṃ virodhāddurbalasya jīvasya bhoktṛtvaṃ na syāditi pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8561: vāyuḥ prāṇādhiṣṭhātā bhūtvā nāsāpuṭe prāviśaditi vyākhyeyamityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8565: sa prāṇo vācaṃ prathamāmudgīthakarmaṇi pradhānāmanṛtādipāpmarūpaṃ mṛtyumatītyāvahanmṛtyunā muktāṃ kṛtvā agnidevatātmatvaṃ prāpitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8566: kiñca mṛtasyāgniṃ vāgapyeti vātaṃ prāṇaḥ cakṣurādityamityādiśrutirapyadhiṣṭhātradhiṣṭheyatvasaṃbandhaṃ dyotayatītyāha-sarvatreti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8575: yadapyuktaṃ devatānāmevādhiṣṭhātrīṇāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgo na śārīrasyeti tatparihriyate-
GSP33brssgo2u:8577: satīṣvapi prāṇānāmadhiṣṭātrīṣu devatāsu prāṇavatā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātasvāminā śārīreṇaivaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ śruteravagamyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8578: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'atha yatraitadākāśamanuviṣaṇṇaṃ cakṣuḥ sa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo darśanāya takṣuratha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā gandhāya ghrāṇam' (chā. 8.124)
GSP33brssgo2u:8583: FN: atha dehe prāgapraveśānantaraṃ yatra golake etacchidramanupraviṣṭaṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ tatra cakṣuṣyabhimānī sa ātmā cākṣuṣaḥ tasya rūpadarśanāya cakṣuḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8587_0: atha dehe prāṇapraveśānantaraṃ yatra golake etacchidramanupraviṣṭaṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:8587_1: tatra cakṣuṣyabhimānī sa ātmā cākṣuṣaḥ tasya rūpadarśanāya cakṣuḥ yadyapyātmā karaṇānyepakṣate
GSP33brssgo2u:8587_2: tathāpi jñeyajñānatadāśrayāhaṅkārānyo veda sa ātmā cidrūpa eva,
GSP33brssgo2u:8588: karaṇāni tu gandhādipravṛttaye 'pekṣyante na caitanyāyeti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8589: kiñca yo 'haṃ rūpamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhaṃ śṛṇomīti pratisaṃdhānādekaḥ śārīra eva bhoktā na bahavo devā ityāha-apiceti //15//
GSP33brssgo2u:8594: tasya ca śārīrasyāsmiñśarīre bhoktṛtvena nityatvena puṇyapāpopalepasaṃbhavātsukhaduḥkhopabhogasaṃbhavācca na devatānām /
GSP33brssgo2u:8595: tā hi parasminnaiśvarye pade 'vatiṣṭhamānā na hine 'smiñśarīre bhoktṛtvaṃ pratilabdhumarhanti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8596: śrutiśca bhavati- 'puṇyamevāmuṃ gacchati na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacchati' (bṛ. 1.5.3)
GSP33brssgo2u:8597: iti śārīreṇaiva ca nityaḥ prāṇānāṃ saṃbandha utkrāntyādiṣu tadanuvṛttidarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8600: tasmātsatīṣvapi karaṇānāṃ niyantrīṣu devatāsu na śārīrasya bhoktṛtvamapagacchati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8602: kadāciddevānāmatrabhoktṛtvaṃ kadācijjīvasyetyaniyamo 'stvityāśaṅkya svakarmārjite dehe jīvasya bhoktṛtvaniyamānmaivamityāha-sūtrakāraḥ-tasya ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8604: devatānāṃ tu parasvāmikarathasārathivadadhiṣṭhātṛtvamātramiti vyākhyāntaramāha-śārīreṇaiva ca nitya iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8605: yathā pradīpādiḥ karaṇopakārakatayā karaṇapakṣasyāntargatastathā devāḥ karaṇopakāriṇa eva na bhoktāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8607: devānāṃ tu karaṇopakārābhijñātayā sārathivadadhiṣṭhātṛtvamiti na jīvenānyathāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8608: devānāmadhiṣṭhātṛtvenāsmindehe bhoktṛtvānumānaṃ tu 'na ha vai devān pāpaṃ gacchati'ityuktaśrutibādhitam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8609: tasmāt 'cakṣuṣā hi rūpāṇi paśyati'iti śruteḥ sādhanatvamātrabodhitvādagnirvāgbhūtvetyādyadhiṣṭhātṛdevatāpekṣābodhakaśrutibhiravirodha iti siddham //16//
GSP33brssgo2u:8614: ta indriyāṇi tadvyapadeśād anyatra śreṣṭhāt / BBs_2,4.17 /
GSP33brssgo2u:8617: kiṃ mukhyasyaiva prāṇasya vṛttibhedā itare prāṇā āhosvittattvāntarāṇīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8621: tathāhi śrutirmukhyamitarāṃśca prāṇānsaṃnidhāpya mukhyātmatāmitareṣāṃ khyāpayati- 'hantāsyaiva sarve rūpamasāmeti ta etasyaiva sarve rūpamabhavan' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8625: tasmādyathaikasyaiva prāṇasya prāṇādyāḥ pañca vṛttaya evaṃ vāgādyā apyekādaśeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8630: te prakṛtāḥ prāṇāḥ śreṣṭhaṃ varjayitvāvaśiṣṭā ekādaśenjadriyāṇītyucyante /
GSP33brssgo2u:8633: iti hyevañjātīyakeṣu pradeśeṣu pṛthakprāṇo vyapadiśyate pṛthaktcendriyāṇi /
GSP33brssgo2u:8638: prāṇasya tvindriyatvaṃ na śrutau smṛtau vā prasiddhamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8640: tattvaikatve tu sa evaikaḥ sanprāṇa indriyavyapadeśaṃ labhate na labhate ceti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssgo2u:8643: FN: asyaiva mukhyaprāṇasya rūpaṃ asāma bhavemeti saṃkalpya,
GSP33brssgo2u:8646: tānyeva prāṇavṛttivyatirekeṇa na santītyākṣepaṃ pratyāha-ta indriyāṇi tadvyapadeśādanyatra śreṣṭhāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8648: hanta idānīmasyaiva mukhyaprāṇasya sarve vayaṃ svarūpaṃ bhavāmeti saṃkalpya te vāgādayastathābhavannityabhedaśrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8652: te prāṇāḥ śreṣṭhādanyatra anye iti pratijñārthatvena padatrayaṃ vyācaṣṭe-tattvāntarāṇyeveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8654: prāṇā indriyāṇītyaparyāyaśabdābhyāmanyatvokteriti hetūpapādanārthatvena punastāni sūtrapadāni yojayati-ka ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8663: siddhānte manasaḥ pramopādānatvādātmavadanindriyatvamiṣṭaṃ tato notsargabādha iti kecit /
GSP33brssgo2u:8664: kiñca 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca'iti pṛthagjanmavyapadeśātsvatantravastubheda ityāha-vyapadeśabhedaścāyamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8665: ekasmin vākye prāṇa indriyaśabdamaikyāllabhate punaruktibhayānna labhate ceti vyāghāta ityarthaḥ //17//
GSP33brssgo2u:8671: bhedena vāgādibhyaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvatra śrūyate- 'te ha vācamūcuḥ' (bṛ. 1.3.2)
GSP33brssgo2u:8672: ityupakramya vāgādīnasurapāpmavidhvastānupanyasyopasaṃhṛtya vāgādiprakaraṇam 'atha hemamāsanyaṃ prāṇamūcuḥ' ityasuravidhvaṃsino mukhyasya prāṇasya pṛthagupakramāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8673: tathā 'mano vācaṃ prāṇaṃ tānyātmane 'kuruta' ityevamādyā api bhedaśrutaya udāhartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8676: bhedaśruteriti sūtreṇa prakaraṇabhedo heturukta iti na paunaruktyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8677_0: te ha devāḥ śāstrīyendriyamanovṛttirūpā asurāṇāṃ pāpavṛttirūpāṇāṃ jayārthamudgīthakarmaṇi
GSP33brssgo2u:8677_2: vācamanṛtādidoṣeṇa vidhvaṃsitavantosurā ityevaṃ krameṇa sarveṣvindriyeṣu pāpagrasteṣu
GSP33brssgo2u:8677_3: paścādatheti prakaraṇaṃ vicchidya prasiddhamāsye bhavamāsanyaṃ mukhyaṃ prāṇamūcustanna
GSP33brssgo2u:8677_4: tadgāyeti tena prāṇenodagātrā nirviṣayatayā saṅgadoṣaśūnyenāsurā naṣṭā ityasurāṇāṃ
GSP33brssgo2u:8685: suṣupteṣu vāgādiṣu mukhya eko jāgarti sa eva caiko mṛtyunānāpta āptāstvitare /
GSP33brssgo2u:8687: viṣayālocanahetutvaṃ cendriyāṇāṃ na prāṇasyevañjātīyako bhūyāllakṣaṇabhedaḥ prāṇendriyāṇām /
GSP33brssgo2u:8694_0: iti vāgādīnīndriyāṇyanukramya 'tāni mṛtyuḥ śramo bhūtvopayeme tasmācchrāmyatyeva
GSP33brssgo2u:8694_1: vāk' iti ca śramarūpeṇa mṛtyunā grastatvaṃ vāgādīnāmabhidhāya 'athemameva nāpnodyo
GSP33brssgo2u:8698: tasmāttadavirodhena vāgādiṣu parispandalābhasya prāṇāyattatvaṃ tadrūpabhavanaṃ vāgādīnāmiti mantavyaṃ na tādātmyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8702: iti mukhyaprāṇaviṣayasyaiva prāṇaśabdasyendriyeṣu lākṣaṇikīṃ vṛttiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8711: etadeva prāṇaśabdasyendriyeṣu lakṣaṇābījaṃ śrutau 'tasmādeta etenākhyāyanta'iti parāmṛṣṭam,
GSP33brssgo2u:8718: satprakriyāyāṃ tejobannānāṃ sṛṣṭimabhidhāyopadiśyate- 'seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇīti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8723_0: yathā loke cāreṇāhaṃ parasainyamanupraviśya saṃkalayānītyevañjātīyake prayoge cārakartṛkameva
GSP33brssgo2u:8725: apica ḍitthaḍavitthādiṣu nāmasu ghaṭaśarāvādiṣu ca rūpeṣu jīvasyaiva vyākartṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8733: tathā kuśakāśapalāśādiṣu paśumṛgamanuṣyādiṣu ca pratyākṛti prativyakti cānekaprakārā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8734: sā khalu parameśvarasyaiva tejobannānāṃ nirmātuḥ kṛtirbhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8736: tathāhi- 'seyaṃ devataikṣata' ityupakramya 'vyākaravāṇi' ityuttamapuruṣaprayogeṇa parasyaiva brahmaṇo vyākartṛtvamihopadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8741: tena hi saṃbandhe vyākaravāṇītyayaṃ devatāviṣaya uttamapuruṣa aupacārikaḥ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo2u:8742: naca girinadīsamudrādiṣu nānāvidheṣu nāmarūpeṣvanīśvarasya jīvasya vyākaraṇasāmarthyamasti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8743: yeṣvapi cāsti sāmarthyaṃ teṣvapi parameśvarāyattameva tat /
GSP33brssgo2u:8744: naca jīvo nāma parameśvarādatyantabhinnaścāra iva rājñaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8754: tacca trivṛtkaraṇamagnyādityacandravidyutsu śrutirdarśayati- 'yadagre rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejasastadrūpaṃ yacchuklaṃ tadapāṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya' (chā. 6.4.1) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8756: sati ca rūpavyākaraṇe viṣayapratilambhādagniritīdaṃ nāma vyākriyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8758: anena cāgnyādyudāharaṇena bhaumāmbhasataijaseṣu triṣvapi dravyeṣvaviśeṣeṇa trivṛtkaraṇamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo2u:8761: aviśeṣeṇaiva copasaṃhāraḥ - 'yadu rohitamivābhūditi tejasastadrūpam' ityevamādiḥ 'yadavijñātamivābhūdityetāsāmeva devatānāṃ samāsa iti' (chā. 6.4.6.7) evamantaḥ // 20 // @#----------------------
GSP33brssgo2u:8764: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ tejobannātmanā tryātmikāṃ kariṣyāmīti śrutiḥ pañcīkaraṇopalakṣaṇārthā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8765: utpattirutpādaneti ca kāryakartrorvyāpārau prasiddhau tatra jagadutpattiśrutivirodhaḥ atītena pādadvayaina nirastaḥ,
GSP33brssgo2u:8768: sthūlabhūtotpādane tvasti śrutivipratipattiriti tannirāsārthamāha-saṃjñāmūrtikḷptistu trivṛtkurvata upadeśāt /
GSP33brssgo2u:8773: hanta idānīṃ devatāḥ sūkṣmā anupraviśyeti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8774: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ tejobannātmanā tryātmikāṃ kariṣyāmīti śrutiḥ pañcīkaraṇopalakṣaṇārthā /
GSP33brssgo2u:8776: evaṃ sthūlīkṛteṣu bhūteṣu prāṇināṃ vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti paradevatāyāstātparyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8778: pūrvapakṣe jīvasyaiva bhautikasraṣṭṛtvādbrahmaṇaḥ sarvasraṣṭṛtvāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8779: jīvenetyasya vyākaravāṇītipradhānakriyāpadena saṃbandha iti pūrvapakṣamāha-tatra prāptamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8780: paradevatāyā akartṛtve kathamuttamapuruṣaprayoga ityāśaṅkya prayojakatvātkartṛtvopacāra ityāha-yathā loka iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8787: nanu tarhi praveśakriyā jīvakartṛkā vyākaraṇamīśvarakartṛkamiti kartṛbhedāt kṛtvāpratyayo na syādityata āha-naca jīvo nāmeti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8788: vastutastu sūryo jale praviṣṭa iti pratibimbabhāvākhyapraveśe sūryasyaiva kartṛtvaprayogājjīvātmanā praveśe 'pīśvara eva karteti kṛtvāśrutiryukteti bodhyam /
GSP33brssgo2u:8789: nanvabhedaścejjīva eva vyākartā kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkya kalpanayā bhinnasya tasyāśaktatvācchrutivirodhācca maivamityāha-parameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8790: pratyekaṃ mahābhūtasargasya prāguktatvādiha vyākaraṇavākye yatnapūrvakaṃ sthīlabhautikasarga ucyata iti pāṭhavyatyayena sūtrasūcitaṃ śrutyarthamāha-trivṛtkaraṇapūrvakamiti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8794: nanvagnyādīnāṃ taijasānāmeva śrutāvudāharaṇadbhūjalayosatryātmakatvaṃ na vivakṣitamityata āha-anena ceti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8796: yatkapotarūpādikaṃ kṛṣṇatvādiviśeṣākāreṇa vijñātamiva bhavati taddevatānāṃ samudāyarūpamityarthaḥ //20//
GSP33brssgo2u:8800: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ bahistrivṛtkṛtānāṃ satīnāmadhyātmamaparaṃ trivṛtkaraṇamuktam- 'imāstisro devatāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpya trivṛttrivṛdekaikā bhavati' (chā. 6.4.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8804: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'annamaśitaṃ tredhā vidhīyate tasya yaḥ sthaviṣṭho dhātustatpurīṣaṃ bhavati yo madhyamastanmāṃsaṃ yo 'ṇiṣṭhastanmanaḥ' (chā. 6.5.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8814: uttarasūtreṇāśaṅkitaṃ doṣaṃ nirasitumādau śaṅkāviṣayamādhyātmikatrivṛtkaraṇaṃ darśayatīti bhāṣyārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo2u:8815: nanvannamayaṃ māṃsādi kathaṃ bhaumamityata āha-trivṛtkṛtā bhūmireveti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8820: atrāha- yadi sarvameva trivṛtkṛtaṃ bhūtabhautikamaviśeṣaśruteḥ 'tāsa trivṛtaṃ trivṛtamekaikāmakarot' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8821: kiṅkṛtastarhyayaṃ viśeṣavyapadeśaḥ 'idaṃ teja imā āpa idamannam' iti /
GSP33brssgo2u:8832: vyavahāraśca trivṛtkṛtarajjuvadekatvāpattau satyāṃ na bhedena bhūtatrayagocaro lokasya prasiddhyet /
GSP33brssgo2u:8833: tasmātsatyapi trivṛtkaraṇe vaiśeṣyādeva tejobannaviśeṣavādo bhūtabhautikaviṣaya upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo2u:8843: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmadgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
